postTitle: Digital Marketing Coach
descContent:
Dear Future Marketing Coach,

We're looking for a Coach who is amazing at helping freelancers implement the
marketing plans we create for them.

This role is a top priority at 6 Figure Creative. Why? Because our flagship
coaching program, **Clients By Design** , is growing fast, and our current
coaching team only have a few spots left on their rosters.

The #1 struggle most creatives face is that **they have no idea where their
next client is coming from** , and everything we do inside Clients By Design
is to help creative freelancers solve that problem (for good).

We joke that our mission is to plunge humanity into chaos by helping all eight
billion people become 6 Figure Creatives. The reality is that **our mission is
to help one person at a time with a 1-on-1 relationship** , and that's where
you come in.

If the idea of working 1-on-1 with some of the most talented freelancers in
the world (for example, Grammy-winning music producers) to help solve the #1
issue freelancers face, then keep reading...

### What You'll Do:

As a Marketing Coach, your role is to help your roster of 50-75 clients
successfully execute the Continuous Clients Marketing Roadmaps that are
custom-tailored for them.

You'll give them feedback as they work through implementing our playbooks,
help them overcome _any_ roadblocks holding them back from making progress,
and you'll be responsible for holding them accountable for completing their
roadmaps.

As a Marketing Coach, you will own your client's success in the program.
You'll also work closely with Brian Hood (founder) to create and deploy better
playbooks and resources to support all of our clients.

**Here are your 3 main responsibilities:**

  * **Client Onboarding:** You will get each of your clients up to speed so they have a full understanding of how to get the most out of this program. You'll ensure they feel taken care of (instead of "lost in the shuffle"), and they know _exactly_ what to do during their crucial first 30 days.
  * **1-on-1 Client Attention** : You'll help your clients progress through their playbooks and marketing plan with the confidence of knowing they're not making major mistakes along the way. You will give them the feedback and support they need to get past any roadblocks, as well as the accountability and encouragement necessary to keep going for the long haul.
  * **Conflict Resolution** : You will quickly and effectively resolve conflicts within your client roster so that everyone is happy, encouraged, and taking action toward completing their marketing plans.

The decisions you help your clients make will change the trajectory of their
lives forever, so this role is not for the faint of heart. You HAVE to be
willing to do what it takes to help someone make tough decisions with their
best interest in mind.

**In your role as a Marketing Coach, you'll be accountable for three
numbers:**

  1. Monthly Client Retention: The % of your client roster you retain each month.
  2. Total # of clients on your roster: Part of your compensation is based on this number.
  3. Client Happiness Score: The % of clients who give you a positive rating each month.

###

### What Success In This Role Looks Like:

Your #1 outcome over the next six months: 50+ clients on your roster with 95%+
of your roster retained each month.

**30 Day Targets**

  * You know our playbooks and coaching process well enough to start onboarding new clients
  * You've onboarded your first few clients

**60 Day Targets**

  * You know our playbooks backward and forwards
  * You're up to 15 active clients on your roster

**90 Day Targets**

  * You've ramped up to 25-30 active clients and you're ready to take on more
  * Your Client Happiness Score is 95%+

**180 Day Targets**

  * You have 50+ clients on your roster
  * 95%+ of your clients are retained each month
  * Your Client Happiness Score is 95%+

### Who you'll work with:

You will report directly to Brian Hood, our founder (i.e. the guy writing this
job description).

I'll work with you to become a better coach, grow and develop personally and
professionally, and possibly even **grow into a larger role** as we scale

You'll be the 6th coach to join our team, which means you'll be a part of a
growing small team.

My goal for you is for you to absolutely LOVE what you do and also be
fulfilled by the impact you're making on the clients you serve.

### What you'll learn

If you crave variety in your work and love the idea of helping people overcome
brand-new challenges every single day, this is your potential dream job.

Not only will you be affecting the lives and businesses of the clients you
coach, but you'll also be impacting each and every client _they_ work with as
well.

**During your time working alongside us, you'll learn**

  * The intricacies of what it takes to create strong and lasting relationships with our clients and make a meaningful impact in their lives.
  * How to build systems that provide support to each and every client as they develop their own client acquisition machines.
  * The inner workings of the 6 Figure Creative, as well as the hundreds of different businesses we work with.

**If you've been running your own business,** but you're feeling the drain of
working "alone in a cave" these past several years, you'll love the amount of
human-to-human interaction you'll have at this role. Two of our coaches have
(or built and sold) their own marketing agencies.

**If you come from the startup community** and you're burnt out from working
long hours while wearing multiple "hats" at your company, you'll love the
focus and structure this role will bring you. Three of our coaches were heads
of marketing a 7 figure, multi-7 figure, and even an 8 figure startup.

**If you come from corporate America** and you're tired of feeling like a
small cog in a massive machine, you'll love the amount of direct impact you'll
have on your clients' lives in this role. So far, no of our coaches came from
corporate america... but maybe you could be the first?

Join me in creating a positive impact and making a lasting difference in the
world of creative freelance businesses.

### Where you'll work:

We're a 100% remote company with a small, tight-knit team of 10 people spread
across the globe — from Vermont, New Jersey, Nashville, Oregon, Las Vegas,
Pennsylvania, and California to Portugal, Romania, and even New Zealand. **You
can work from wherever you do your best work.**

  * Coffee shop? Cool.
  * Your own home office? Even better.
  * Costa Rica for the summer? Send us pics pls.
  * We care more about outcomes than clock-ins.

### Why We Exist As A Company:

The reason 6 Figure Creative exists as a company is to help freelancers earn
more money _without_ selling their souls.

Our flagship coaching program, **Clients By Design** , solves the #1 problem
holding freelancers back from success: They have no idea where their next
client is coming from.

The program is built around creating highly-personalized marketing plans for
our clients and coaching them through every single step of the process as they
implement each playbook.

We believe that the education system is fundamentally broken. Universities
will gladly charge their students $100k+ for a creative degree and _never_
teach them the most important skills and strategies for how to actually get an
ROI from their investment.

The coaching program you'll be a part of exists to help the best creatives in
the world change the trajectory of their careers (and lives) by learning the
skills universities failed to teach them.

It takes more than passion to succeed, and everything we do is built around
giving our clients the strategies, tools, processes, guidance, coaching, and
accountability they need to have successful businesses.

I look forward to working with you!

 _-Brian Hood  
Founder _

**P.S.** Here's [the complete hiring
scorecard](https://6figurecreative.com/hiring-scorecard) for this role.

**Requirements**

### **What We're Looking For**

**Required (don't have these? Please don't apply.)**

  * You are a complete marketing nerd who has 5+ years of digital marketing experience
  * You LOVE diving into a broken marketing machine to find the root cause of why it's not working.
  * You have exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to manage dozens of clients and priorities simultaneously **without letting things slip through the cracks**
  * You have strong leadership and coaching skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire clients
  * You are an excellent communicator, and comfortable on video
  * You are detail-oriented enough to add the words "client acquisition machine" to your application (bonus points if it's shoehorned into your Loom video with a nod and a wink).
  * You are confident, and never shy away from a challenge

### Preferred Qualifications:

**Nice to have stuff that sets you apart**

  * You have been paid to coach clients (or team members) in digital marketing
  * You are available to coach full-time (40 hours per week) during normal US working hours
  * You have experience working with clients in various remote settings including email, online communities, asynchronous video, and synchronous 1-on-1 zoom calls
  * You have a gift for helping other people feel like the most important person on the planet while talking to and working with them
  * You have a background as a successful creative freelancer
  * You live +/- 1 hour of Central Standard Time

**Benefits**

  * Work from home (or anywhere in the world) - we're 100% remote!
  * Health, vision, and dental insurance for you and your family
  * $250 monthly home cleaning service (because _**nobody**_ loves cleaning, right?)
  * $1,000/yr home office upgrade allowance

###

### Compensation: $65,000-$125,000+

  * Salary: $55,000
  * Variable Compensation: $10,000-$70,000+

Your variable compensation is based on the number of active clients on your
roster plus the number of new clients successfully onboarded each month. We
add more clients to your roster as long as you're hitting your target KPIs.
(See [the hiring scorecard](https://6figurecreative.com/hiring-scorecard) for
compensation details)

* * *
jobCategory: 市场营销,教育,咨询,客户服务,用户增长

postTitle: Senior AI / LLM Engineer (Python)
descContent:
BetterBugs | Remote | Full-time | <https://betterbugs.io>

We’re building debugging intelligence for modern software teams. BetterBugs
captures rich technical context at the moment a bug occurs and turns it into
actionable insights for developers — not screenshots, not back-and-forth.

Our next leap: AI that understands bugs, not just describes them.

Senior AI / LLM Engineer (Python) : Build production LLM systems that
understand real-world bug context (logs, stack traces, network, user actions).
Design agent workflows for root-cause analysis, bug triaging, and debugging
assistance. Implement RAG pipelines grounded in codebases, historical bugs,
and execution data. Own prompting, evaluation, reliability, and observability
of AI outputs. Build and operate Python services (FastAPI) powering AI
features in production. Strong Python, hands-on LLM/agent frameworks, Docker;
bonus for dev tooling or observability experience.
jobCategory: AI,后端开发,算法,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: IS Mechanical Designer II
descContent:
##  About Us

At ENFRA, we blend a rich history with a forward-looking vision. With over 100
years of experience, we are a pillar of stability in the energy infrastructure
industry and a leader in innovative energy solutions. Our commitment to
leveraging emerging technologies ensures that we remain at the forefront of
the Energy-as-a-Service sector.

We believe in growth—not just for our business, but for our people. Our team
members have the opportunity to advance their careers in a supportive
environment that values continuous learning and development. We embrace
innovation and encourage creative problem solving to tackle the energy
infrastructure and energy challenges of tomorrow.

Inclusion is at the heart of our culture. We strive to create a workplace
where every voice is heard and valued, fostering a collaborative environment
where diverse perspectives drive our success.

Join us to be part of a legacy of excellence and a future of groundbreaking
advancements. At ENFRA, stability, innovation, and growth are more than just
values—they are the pillars of our continued success.

##  Overview

The IS Mechanical Designer II will design mechanical systems, components, or
assemblies using engineering principles.

##  Responsibilities

  * Works closely with project managers, engineers and contractors to create unique high-level concepts and designs for all assigned projects.
  * Works closely with the team to ensure the successful execution of goals of all assigned projects.
  * Conducts field surveys to identify existing equipment types and system capabilities.
  * Produces design documents including drawings, system flow diagrams and architecture, wiring diagrams, construction details, and equipment scheduling.
  * Delivers concepts and designs according to strict project deadlines.
  * Contributes to all areas of the creative process and department.
  * Performs work under direct supervision.
  * Handles basic issues and problems and refers more complex issues to higher-level staff.
  * Assist with the development of technical reports or related documents.
  * Provides leadership, coaching, and/or mentoring to team members.
  * Other duties as assigned or required.

##  Qualifications

#### Required Education, Experience, and Qualifications

  * Associate degree in HVAC Technology, Building Systems Engineering, Construction Management, or related field
  * 2-4 years' experience with building construction, especially mechanical, electrical, plumbing, or automatic temperature controls.
  * Proficiency in AutoCAD and REVIT
  * Strong technical skills
  * Effective oral and written communications skills
  * Vision and Creativity
  * Ability to meet deadlines
  * Planning skills
  * Possesses beginning to working knowledge of the subject matter.
  * Detail-oriented and willing to tackle various ongoing projects in a fast-paced environment.
  * Excellent multitasking skills, with the ability to perform duties outside of the scope of work when necessary.

#### Preferred Education, Experience, and Qualifications

  * Bachelor of Science in Engineering degree
  * Building Automation System design and sequence writing experience - Preferred systems include Siemens, JCI, Honeywell, Trane, Struxureware, and Tridium
  * HVAC Design and Commissioning experience - Preferred systems include Chilled Water, Heating Water, Condenser Water, and Steam
  * Higher Education and Healthcare design experience

#### Travel Requirements

  * 10-25% of time will be spent traveling to job site(s)/office location.

#### Physical Activities

  * Ascending and descending ladders, stairs, scaffolding, ramps, poles
  * Climbing stairs.
  * Remaining in a stationary position, often standing or sitting for prolonged periods
  * Moving about to accomplish tasks or moving from one worksite to another
  * Repeating motions that may include the wrists, hands and/or fingers

#### Environmental Conditions

  * Outdoor elements such as precipitation and wind
  * Low temperature
  * High temperature
  * Noisy environment

#### Physical Demands

  * Light work that includes adjusting and/or moving objects up to 20 pounds

##  Pay Range

USD $27.92 - USD $37.29 /Hr.

##

ENFRA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer of Minorities, Women,
Protected Veterans, and Individuals with Disabilities, and participates in the
e-Verify program. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for
employment without regard to race, creed, color, religion, sex, age, sexual
orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, disability, or
any other classification protected by law.

* * *
jobCategory: 项目管理,设计,技术支持

postTitle: Product Designer
descContent:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we're building and are
continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this
to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by
world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and
executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer,
Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

Duna is growing fast, and we're really excited to bring our third designer
onboard, alongside Coen van Hasselt (ex-Adyen) and Joost van der Ree (ex-
Uber).

_"Compliance and business onboarding is notoriously complex, and the user
experience is often terrible. Exceptional design is a crucial element that
sets Duna apart - it's at the core of our product. That’s why we put an
immense amount of effort into how our users interact with the product. We
aspire to craft clean and intuitive solutions for very complex problems. I'm
excited to strengthen our team and design culture with this person!"_ — Duco,
Founder

###  
Since your role with us will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a
crisp overview.

### **What you'll be doing in this role**

  * **Build and maintain a modular design system** — create a system that powers both live implementations and Figma prototypes.

  * **Design complex onboarding flows** — architect journeys that adapt to modular, multi-step customer needs.

  * **Apply a conversion-focused mindset** — measure, test, and refine every step of the user experience.

  * **Prototype quickly and systematically** — test ideas fast and refine based on customer feedback.

  * **Collaborate with engineering** — work closely with front-end and back-end teams to ensure designs translate seamlessly into production.

  * **Shape our design culture** — set foundations and standards that help the team scale.

### **What we're looking for**

  * **4–6+ years of experience** — designing complex products or workflows (B2B SaaS, enterprise tools, or compliance/fintech experience a plus).

  * **Systems thinking** — you see beyond individual screens to the long-term structure of design systems. 

  * **Analytical rigor** — you treat interactions and journeys as testable, optimizable hypotheses.

  * **Clear communicator** — you document decisions, trade-offs, and learnings transparently.

  * **Comfort with ambiguity** — you can navigate complex system logic and still move quickly.

  * **Curiosity and inspiration** — you draw from diverse influences and go deeper than the obvious references.

  * **Big ambitions** — you want to build something that matters.

  
A final note before you apply: please read through our website in detail.
You'll find the fundamentals there: what we believe in, how we work, and why
we're building this company.

We're a remote-first, fast-moving team of builders looking for exceptional
people who love to create, build, and ship. Beyond passion and grit, we highly
value curiosity, authenticity and kindness.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you!

_PS. We are looking to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds.
So even if you don't check all the boxes, we welcome your application!_

* * *
jobCategory: UI&UX,设计

postTitle: Financial Controller
descContent:
**Description**  

### Work with U.S. Startups and C-Suite Executives as an Oceans Financial
Controller  
  
About Oceans  
[Oceans](http://oceansxyz.com/) is an outsourcing firm pairing the best talent
in Sri Lanka with CEOs, Founders, and Executives in the U.S.  
  
The Role: Financial Controller  
Oceans is seeking highly ambitious candidates in Sri Lanka to become Financial
Controllers

### **Responsibilities**

  * Develop and implement financial strategies, policies, and procedures to ensure effective financial management
  * Monitor and analyze financial performance, including budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis
  * Provide accurate and timely financial reports, statements, and analysis to support decision-making at all levels of the organization
  * Ensure compliance with accounting standards, regulations, and company policies
  * Oversee cash flow management, working capital, and risk management activities
  * Identify areas for cost reduction and efficiency improvement and implement appropriate measures
  * Coordinate with external auditors for timely completion of audits and ensure compliance with audit requirements
  * Establish and maintain strong internal controls to safeguard company assets and ensure accuracy of financial records
  * Manage and mentor the finance team, providing guidance, and training

  
  
**Requirements**  

  * **Language** : Professional fluency in English, with excellent communication skills (reading, writing, speaking)
  * **Experience** : 8+ years in Accounting and Finance sector. Big four or national accounting firm audit experience is preferred
  * **Essential Skills** : Certified Public Accountant (CPA) preferred 
  * **Education** : Undergraduate degree preferably in Business Administration with an emphasis in Finance/Accounting; related work experience accepted

### Who Should Apply  
This role is ideal for experienced Financial Controllers who are excited to
work for, and learn from, U.S.-based Executives.

  
  
**Benefits**  

  * Unique lucrative opportunity to work with global start ups that could 10x your career.
  * Fully Remote work.
  * Competitive pay and always paid in USD.

* * *
salary: 竞争力薪资，以美元支付
jobCategory: 财务,金融,项目管理

postTitle: appflame - Middle / Senior Product Manager
descContent:
We are **appflame** , a product IT company. We create life-changing products
that break the rules of the game in the category. Geographically, we are
located in Ukraine, but in reality – all over the world.

We are looking for the daring and enthusiastic people. Those who are fans of
creating real products and dream of launching and developing cool startups.
You have ambitions, and we have comfortable conditions for their
implementation.  
  
Your project: **AdConnect.** It is a business that specializes in building
communication platforms, as well as SaaS solutions for traffic management and
increasing user retention. Our project portfolio includes: web products in the
social discovery, advertising network, SaaS solution for user retention. Our
products have millions of users from all over the world – North and South
America, Europe, Australia, and the list of markets is constantly growing.

**You will:**

  * Own a key product area — from idea to measurable impact, driving growth in engagement, retention, and monetization.
  * Turn insights into action — discover user needs, define hypotheses, and translate them into clear product experiments.
  * Shape the roadmap — prioritize initiatives that balance user delight, trust, and revenue.
  * Collaborate cross-functionally — work closely with engineers, designers, analysts, and marketing to deliver meaningful results fast.
  * Lead experiments and A/B tests — validate ideas quickly, learn continuously, and scale what works.
  * Improve monetization loops — optimize credit usage, paywalls, and bonus mechanics for sustainable revenue growth.**  
**

**From you:**

  * 3–5+ years of experience in product management within B2C digital products — ideally communication, dating, or social platforms.
  * Familiarity with global markets (US, UK, Canada, Europe, LATAM) and cultural nuances in user behavior.
  * A proven track record of moving metrics — you’ve owned and improved KPIs like retention, ARPPU, or conversion.
  * Strong data literacy — you make decisions based on insights, not opinions (SQL, Tableau, or similar).
  * Excellent prioritization and execution skills — you can turn chaos into clear roadmaps and deliver results fast.
  * Experience in experimentation and A/B testing — you know how to design, run, and interpret experiments.
  * A growth mindset — you learn fast, challenge assumptions, and care deeply about both product and people.
  * Knowledge of user acquisition and paid marketing funnels.**  
**

**Will be an advantage:**

  * Experience working with communication, dating, or social discovery products at scale.
  * Experience with transactional or credit-based models will be a plus.
  * Leading cross-functional teams or guiding teammates will be a plus.

**Your journey to the job offer:** message from the recruiter > interview >
test > final interview > job offer.

**Why appflame?**

  * Involvement in Ukrainian products that compete with the world's best players.
  * The ability to implement your ideas, not the feeling of a cog in the system.
  * Meaningful and useful products, created not just for shareholders to earn money.
  * A sense of yourself among your people who are charged with results.
  * Work with the global market and a huge audience.
  * Direct contact with Snapchat, Facebook, Google, Apple, and access to their best practices.
  * Well-established processes and no barriers to growth within the company.
  * Transparent evaluation of work based on personal performance indicators.
  * Powerful social package and fair compensation.

We provide all conditions for your talents to be fully revealed.

We are loyal to our people. Our loyalty doesn't fade at the end of the working
day. We do not leave our people alone with their problems, neither
professional nor personal.

Join us.

__________

We are against all types of discrimination, bullying, and stereotypes. We
provide equal employment opportunities regardless of race, skin color,
religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status,
health status or any other characteristics.

* * *
jobCategory: 产品经理,用户增长,数据分析,项目管理

postTitle: Principal Engineer's and Senior Engineer's
descContent:
Prove AI | Principal Engineer's and Senior Engineer's | Remote but must be based in the US | Very attractive base salary + equity + benefits

Prove AI is an AI management platform that helps organizations centralize and
manage their AI models while maintaining strict oversight of data access and
usage. Built on distributed ledger technology, Prove AI provides tamper-proof
oversight, ensuring organizations can set and enforce guardrails to mitigate
risk and optimize AI performance.

Senior Engineer's - experienced, hands-on engineers who can take end-to-end
ownership of complex full-stack systems—spanning TypeScript, React, Node.js,
and generative AI integrations—and operate effectively in a fast-moving,
early-stage environment.

Principal Engineer's - Lead the technical aspects of the engineering team,
mentor engineers, set high standards in architecture and developer-experience,
architecture and developer-experience standards, and influence senior
leadership across all business functions with clear trade-off narratives and
mechanisms that scale.

Candidates must have Full stack experience as well as AI/ML experience

postTitle: Staff SWE - EMR Platform
descContent:
Natera | Staff SWE - EMR Platform | Austin, TX | Remote | $170-190K base + equity + bonus

THE MISSION:

Help providers and patients make life-changing medical decisions with
accurate, timely genomic test results. Our EMR team builds the
interoperability backbone that connects hundreds of healthcare organizations
to Natera's testing platform.

THE CHALLENGE:

• Build next-generation EMR integration platform handling thousands of daily
transactions

• Wrangle healthcare standards (HL7, FHIR, CDS) across 100+ organizations with
varying implementations

• Create scalable workflows for test ordering, results delivery, and medical
record exchange

• Transform legacy healthcare data into modern, structured formats

WHAT YOU'LL BUILD:

• Real-time message processing systems handling patient orders and lab results

• Integration adapters for major EMR systems (Epic, Cerner, etc.)

• APIs and workflows that ensure critical test results reach the right
clinicians quickly

TECH STACK:

TypeScript, Node.js, Jest, Cypress, infrastructure-as-code

TEAM:

Small, high-impact team managing full-stack ownership

Healthcare/Epic experience helpful but not required - we'll teach you the
domain.

The Electronic Medical Record (EMR) space has interesting technical
challenges: creating flexible systems that handle both strict standards and
real-world healthcare data chaos, all while maintaining HIPAA compliance and
sub-second response times.

Contact: astruthers@natera.com or linkedin.com/in/code-lorde
jobCategory: 后端开发,全栈开发,DevOps/MLOps,数据开发,技术支持

postTitle: 招募跨境独立站合伙人：携手打造下一个出海品牌
descContent:
我们是一个已有初步成型能力的跨境团队，目前**独立站搭建与流量获取**的技术板块已就位。现诚邀1-3名合伙人加入，补全关键拼图，共同从0到1打造一个具有长期价值的品牌。

* * *

#### **一、我们是谁？我们的优势是什么？**

1.  **核心团队已就位**：我们拥有成熟的独立站建站技术和专业的流量增长负责人，技术端基础牢固。
    
2.  **清晰的启动规划**：项目已有初步方向和市场分析，并非从零开始的空想。我们具备快速将想法落地为网站并导入流量的能力。
    
3.  **我们的目标**：不是做短期爆款，而是通过精细化运营和品牌建设，建立一个有口碑、可持续盈利的跨境品牌。
    

#### **二、我们在寻找什么样的合伙人？**

我们优先寻找能弥补以下任一或多项关键能力的伙伴：

*   **角色A：产品与供应链合伙人**
    
    *   **你的价值**：你是产品的灵魂。深刻理解茶叶品类，具备强大的**选品眼光**、**供应链资源**（国内采购或海外货源）及**质量控制**能力。能负责产品开发、采购、物流、库存管理等全链条。
        
*   **角色B：运营与品牌合伙人**
    
    *   **你的价值**：你是品牌的塑造者。擅长**品牌定位**、**内容创意**、**用户运营**和**销售转化**。能制定整体运营策略，管理客服体系，通过故事讲述和用户体验提升客户忠诚度和复购率。
        
*   **角色C：资金与资源合伙人**
    
    *   **你的价值**：你是项目的加速器。认可项目前景，愿意投入一定的**启动资金**，并可能带来关键的**行业资源**、**渠道资源**或**本地化（目标市场）资源**。
        

#### **三、合作方案（框架）**

我们秉持 **“优势互补，风险共担，利益共享”** 的原则，合作模式可协商，旨在建立长期稳固的伙伴关系。

1.  **股权架构**：
    
    *   采用 **“资金投入 + 人力贡献”** 综合估值的方式，初始设立合伙公司（或LLC）。
        
    *   技术团队（站建+流量）已投入的人力及资源将折算为初始股权。
        
    *   新合伙人根据其承诺投入的 **“资金”**、 **“专项能力/资源”** 和 **“未来全职参与的时间”** 协商确定股权比例。目标是在启动阶段，核心全职合伙人整体持有大部分股份。
        
2.  **分工与决策**：
    
    *   明确各合伙人核心职责，在自己的领域内拥有高度自主权和决策权。
        
    *   重大战略决策（如大额投资、核心产品线变更、关键人事）由所有合伙人共同协商投票决定。
        
3.  **投入与收益**：
    
    *   **投入**：初期可能需要合伙人投入部分启动资金（用于采购、广告等），并投入全部或大部分精力。
        
    *   **收益**：
        
        *   股权分红：项目盈利后，根据股权比例进行利润分红。
            
        *   薪资：在项目达到稳定现金流后，可为全职参与的核心合伙人发放具有市场竞争力的基本薪资，与分红分离。
            
        *   资产增值：共同创造并拥有品牌这一核心资产的所有权。
            
4.  **我们的承诺**：
    
    *   技术团队将全力保障独立站的稳定、高效及流量的持续获取与优化。
        
    *   完全透明的财务管理和定期的业务同步。
        
    *   开放、平等、尊重的合作氛围，一切以公司发展和品牌成功为核心。
        

* * *

#### **如果你：**

*   对跨境电商有激情，认同品牌化、长期主义的道路。
    
*   在某一个我们需要的领域（产品、运营、资源）有扎实的经验和资源积累。
    
*   具备创业精神，有责任心，抗压能力强，愿意与我们并肩作战。
    
*   正在寻找一个 **“技术端已就绪，只待东风”** 的优质项目。
    

**那么，我们非常期待与你对话！**
**我们目前在山东淄博！**
salary: 股权分红+薪资（项目稳定后）
jobCategory: 销售,市场营销,运营,项目管理

postTitle: 远程 HRBP，需求 3 人
descContent:
[英国游戏事业部 HRBP （侧重业务线）] ：需求 3 人  
  
国内远程办公：月薪 10k-20k 人民币，工作时间 17 点-凌晨 1 点（试用期内配合英国时差）  
试用期：3 个月  
[ HRBP （侧重业务线）] 岗位职责  
1\. 深入理解游戏业务与数据  
深入参与游戏项目全生命周期（立项、研发、测试、上线、运营），熟悉核心业务指标（ DAU 、流水、留存、付费率等），基于业务节奏制定人力与组织策略。  
2\. 作为业务负责人的思想伙伴  
与游戏线负责人定期复盘版本/项目表现，从组织、人效、人才视角提出专业意见，在团队编制、项目节奏、关键角色配置上共同决策，而不是被动执行。  
3\. 组织与团队战斗力建设  
结合项目形态设计组织架构、角色分工与协作机制（策划/程序/美术/运营等），识别团队短板，推动补位与优化，确保关键项目节点具备足够“火力”。  
4\. 关键人才与梯队经营  
明确游戏线关键岗位与核心人才名单（主策、主程、主美、主运等），制定差异化用人策略：引进、培养、保留与激励，构建项目负责人及骨干梯队。  
5\. 绩效与激励紧贴项目结果  
将绩效目标与版本质量、项目进度、业务指标挂钩，参与制定项目激励方案（版本奖、专项奖等），推动绩效反馈与激励结果真正影响业务行为。  
6\. 组织健康与高压环境管理  
关注项目冲刺期与长期运营中的加班、情绪与风险，及时预警人与团队问题，平衡“冲刺效率”和“可持续输出”，营造既能打硬仗又不失控的团队氛围。  
  
\----  
可直接添加 TG：Skyewen20251  
有意向投递简历到 Email 邮箱： [zygs2151@gmail.com](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
jobCategory: 人力资源,项目管理,咨询

postTitle: 资深云运维工程师 (AWS/Linux方向)
jobTitle: 资深云运维工程师 (AWS/Linux方向)
descContent:
工作性质：远程兼职 / 项目制  
薪资范围：时薪 400 元 或 项目总包  
项目背景  
某出海科技初创团队，需构建一套标准化的云端基础设施自动化流水线。  
目标：针对内部研发和测试环境，制作一系列安全、标准、预装特定软件栈的 Linux 黄金镜像 (Golden Images)。  
岗位职责  
1\. 镜像流水线搭建  
o 使用 Packer 和 GitHub Actions，搭建全自动的 AWS AMI 构建流水线，实现代码提交即自动打包。  
2\. 配置管理与加固  
o 编写 Ansible 剧本，对 Ubuntu / Rocky Linux 进行系统初始化、内核优化及安全加固（需符合 CIS Level 1 标准）。  
3\. 环境预装  
o 编写脚本自动部署 Docker、Nginx、Python 环境及 SSL 证书自动配置工具。  
4\. 文档交付  
o 提供完整的部署文档和维护手册。  
任职要求  
• 精通 AWS EC2 体系，深刻理解 AMI 机制。  
• 必须精通 HashiCorp Packer 和 Ansible（硬性要求，只会 Shell 脚本不符合）。  
• 具备强烈的 Linux 系统安全意识（防火墙、SSH 加固、权限管理）。  
• 良好的代码规范，交付的脚本需具备可读性和可维护性。
jobCategory: DevOps/MLOps,运维,安全

descContent:
岗位职责  
  
带领一个小型 AI 技术团队（ 3-6 人），负责 AI 技术在交易所业务场景中的落地，包括但不限于风控、用户增长、客服、数据分析与智能化工具。  
负责团队的工作规划、目标拆解、任务分配与进度把控，保证交付质量与效率。  
与业务、产品、区块链研发、数据团队等跨部门协作，推动 AI 技术与交易所核心业务的深度结合。  
跟踪 AI 前沿技术及区块链行业应用趋势，推动创新方案在平台的探索与应用。  
指导团队成员成长，建立高效的工程文化和技术规范。  
任职要求  
  
计算机、人工智能、数据科学等相关专业，本科及以上学历。  
具备 5 年以上 AI/机器学习/大数据等相关工作经验，其中至少 2 年以上团队管理或项目带队经验。  
熟悉深度学习、NLP 、推荐系统、风控建模或智能客服等方向中的一个或多个，有实际落地经验。  
对数字货币、区块链行业有认同感，有交易所、金融科技或区块链相关经验者优先。  
有大厂背景（如头部互联网/金融/AI 公司）或创业公司 0→1 经验者优先。  
具备良好的沟通能力、跨部门协作能力和目标驱动思维。  
  
  
  
投递请联系  
VX1：bellafafa_  
TG1:@fuseiijiang  
  
VX2：1424983319  
TG2：@Ellen9987
jobCategory: AI,算法,项目管理,数据分析,区块链

postTitle: 12k | 制造业工厂视频采集 / 内容拍摄负责人 | 广东、浙江、江苏
jobTitle: 制造业工厂视频采集 / 内容拍摄负责人
descContent:
# 📹 招聘｜制造业工厂视频采集 / 工厂内容拍摄负责人

> ⚠️ 本岗位强烈依赖【制造业工厂资源】，请在投递前认真阅读岗位说明。

---

## 💼 岗位信息

- **岗位名称**：制造业工厂视频采集 / 内容拍摄负责人  
- **合作方式**：全职 / 长期合作（非纯远程，需要下工厂）  
- **底薪**：12,000 元 / 月 
- **工作区域**：  
  - 常驻或长期活动于 **广东 / 浙江 / 江苏**  
  - 制造业工厂密集区域优先  

---

## 🧩 工作内容

### 1️⃣ 工厂资源拓展与沟通（核心）

- 利用你**已有的制造业资源和人脉**
- 直接对接 **工厂老板 / 管理层 / 负责人**
- 成功说服工厂配合进行**视频拍摄与内容展示**

> 本岗位**不适合从 0 开始开发工厂资源**的人

---

### 2️⃣ 工厂实地视频拍摄

- 进入真实制造业工厂进行拍摄
- 拍摄内容包括但不限于：
  - 生产流程
  - 设备运行
  - 工人工作场景
- **可亲自上手参与部分工人操作**，进行视频的拍摄

---

### 3️⃣ 多工厂任务执行

- 根据项目需求，跑不同工厂完成拍摄任务
- 能独立完成：
  - 工厂沟通
  - 拍摄协调
  - 现场执行

---

## 🎯 每月 KPI（硬性）

- **每月至少联系并落地 5–10 家可拍摄的制造业工厂**
- 并完成对应的**视频拍摄交付**
- 以“能真实拍摄并完成”为最终结果

---

## ✅ 我们希望你

### 🔑 这是一个【资源型岗位】

- 你**已经拥有**制造业工厂资源
- 手上有**多位工厂老板 / 决策层的直接联系方式**
- 熟悉制造业生态，知道如何与工厂打交道

---

### 🚗 行动力与执行力

- 愿意跑工厂、进车间
- 不介意工厂环境
- 能适应频繁出差和现场工作

---

### 📈 结果导向

- 能稳定按月完成 KPI
- 对结果负责，而非过程型岗位

---

## ❗ 请务必确认你适合这个岗位

如果你目前：
- 没有稳定的制造业工厂资源  
- 无法直接联系到工厂老板或核心负责人  
- 需要从零积累工厂关系  

👉 **请谨慎投递，本岗位不匹配**

---

## 💰 薪资与回报

- **底薪：12,000 元 / 月**
- 额外：项目激励 / 拍摄成果奖励（具体可谈）
- 对资源强、执行力强者，长期回报空间充足

---

## 📩 投递方式（建议附带）

请在投递时**简单说明**：

1. 你目前掌握的制造业工厂资源（数量 / 行业 / 地区）
2. 是否可常驻广东 / 浙江 / 江苏
3. 是否有工厂拍摄 / 工厂相关工作经验

> 资源描述越清晰，沟通效率越高

---

期待真正**有资源、能落地、能跑工厂**的你。
jobCategory: 内容创作,视频剪辑,项目管理

postTitle: Full Stack Product Engineer
descContent:
### **What we're building**

[Jiga](https://jiga.io/about-us/) is on a mission to help engineers build
physical products faster. Think `npm install` for mechanical engineers - we're
building the infrastructure that makes hardware development as fast as
software.

### **How we actually work**

We’re a small remote team made up of the best of the best. Our team members
are distributed around the globe. While most of our product and engineering
talent is located in Europe and Israel, you’ll also work with people from the
US and Asia. Most of our work is made async, which is the secret sauce of our
success.

**High trust, low bullshit:** We don't count hours or peek over your shoulder
on Slack. We trust you to get your work done and tell us when something's
wrong. You'll have real ownership over what you build: which means you'll make
a lot of decisions about architecture and functionality without endless
approval cycles. (If that sounds terrifying, we're probably not a good fit. If
that sounds exciting, keep reading.)

**Question everything:** See something that doesn't make sense? Say it. Have a
better way to do something? Just do it. We actually mean it when we say we
want people to challenge the status quo and improve things. Our internal motto
is “Don’t drink the kool-aid”

**No stupid Meetings:** One weekly all-hands. One dev team sync. That's
literally it. Everything else happens async in Slack or Loom. Your calendar
will be beautifully, gloriously empty.

**Actually friendly, not corporate friendly:** We play games online every week
(current favorite: Make it Meme). Once a year we fly everyone somewhere
beautiful for our offsite (Greece, here we come). We genuinely like hanging
out together, which turns out to be way better than forced "team building
exercises."

**What we value in engineering:**

**Simple > Complicated.** Simple code, simple architecture; Simple solutions
are better than complex ones.

**Ship it, then improve it.** Perfection is the enemy of done. Launch now,
iterate forever.

**Product > Engineering.** Every line of code should make our users' lives
better. We're not here to show off our algorithmic prowess - we're here to
solve real business problems.

### **Financials**

Jiga is fully funded, cashflow positive, with growing revenue MoM. We're
completely transparent about our runway and finances - ask us anything.

### **You'll love it here if**

  * **You want to actually own things.** Not "ownership" where you need three approvals to change a button color. Real ownership where you decide what to build, how to build it, and when to ship it.
  * **You're genuinely full-stack** \- you're equally happy building a slick UI component or optimizing a database query. There's no task you'd refuse because it's "not your specialty."
  * **You care about the product, not just the code**. You want to understand  _why_ we're building something and you'll push back if it doesn't make sense.
  * **You are motivated to run a marathon** and ring the bell with us in 3-4 years from now.
  * **Bureaucracy makes you want to scream**. Multiple approval layers, process for the sake of process, corporate theatre - if these sound like your nightmare, welcome home.
  * **You love shipping.** Like, you get genuinely excited when you push to production. That "it's alive!" feeling never gets old.
  * **You work fast** because you're having fun, not because someone's watching you.

### **This might not be for you if**

  * You hate ambiguity. You prefer clear, detailed task assignments and well-defined requirements
  * You like having management to check in, review and verify your work multiple times until it’s perfect
  * You're looking for a cuddly, 9-5, corporate job where you can coast a bit
  * You like the smell of gasoline and motor oil while driving to the office every day (sorry, we are 100% remote)
  * You like weeks of architecting over-complicated solutions

(No judgment if that's what you want - it's just not what we are.)

### **What you need**

  * 3+ years building full-stack web applications end-to-end
  * Strong at React + Node.js. MongoDB experience is a great plus.
  * Experience building complex applications - you understand clean architecture, security, scaling, performance, and maintainability
  * Solid data modeling fundamentals
  * Product company experience (you've felt the joy and pain of real users)
  * Some overlap with GMT+3 working hours so we can actually talk to you sometimes

### **What we offer**

No ping pong tables. No beer kegs. No "unlimited vacation" that nobody takes.
No ice cream fridge at the office. Oh right, we don't even have an office.

Here's what we do have:

  * **A small team where you matter** \- we never compromise on people, that means you are part of the best team in the world.
  * **Zero bureaucracy** \- we hate process theatre as much as you do
  * **Real ownership and responsibility** \- make decisions, ship code, own the outcomes. Have real impact on the product from day 1.
  * **Complete flexibility** \- work from anywhere, set your own hours, take time off when you need it (parents and DMs are very welcome)
  * **Genuinely high trust** \- we trust you to do great work and be honest when things go sideways
  * **A team that actually likes each other** \- international, diverse, genuinely friendly people who enjoy working together
  * **Generous stock options** \- we’re looking for partners to run a marathon with us, you will get a life-changing shares when we get to the finish line
  * **Competitive salary and PTOs** \- so you can also enjoy, relax and recharge
  * **Self-development budget** for books, courses, conferences, whatever helps you grow
  * **Annual offsite** in beautiful places (greece, here we come!)
  * **Fast-paced environment** with tons of creative freedom
  * Hard, interesting problems with a **team that's positioned to win big**

* * *
jobCategory: 全栈开发,前端开发,后端开发

jobTitle: WEB 前端工程师,Golang 工程师,Flutter 工程师,C++交易系统开发工程师
descContent:
Position：WEB 前端工程师（ 2 个 HC ）  
Job Type: Full-Time, Remote  
PS :  
1 、全日制 211/985 计算机软件相关专业本科及以上学历；最近至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景。  
2 、深入理解主流前端框架（ React ）；  
3 、5 年左右前端开发经验，精通 React 生态，熟悉高并发、性能调优、内存泄漏排查。  
  
  
Position：Golang 工程师（ 5 个 HC ）  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
PS：  
1 、全日制双一流/211/985 本科及以上计算机专业，3/10 年工作经验（最近几年至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景，无 web3 任职经验要求），  
2 、熟练掌握 Golang 高并发编程，并理解其原理。  
3 、丰富的 GoZero 、Gin 和其他 Golang 框架经验。  
4 、熟练掌握中间件技术，包括 MySQL 、Redis 和 Kafka ，以及它们的基本原理。  
5 、开发和维护分布式微服务架构的能力。  
  
  
Position : Flutter 工程师（ 3 个 HC ）  
Job Type: Full-Time, Remote  
PS  
1\. 全日制双一流/211/985 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，3/7 年工作经验（最近几年至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景，无 web3
任职经验要求），  
2 、熟悉 Dart ，对 Flutter 组件化有一定的理解和实践，  
3 、负责公司 Web3/金融产品的移动端 Flutter 开发，能够独立分析、根据需求进行设计，并完成相应的代码编写。  
4 、有 Socket 处理、K-line 或 ioslate 经验者优先。  
5 、有股票、Web3/金融产品相关经验者优先。  
  
  
Position：C++交易系统开发工程师（ 2 个 HC ）  
Job Type: Full-Time, Remote  
PS：  
1 、必须全日制 211/985 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，3-7 年工作经验，有证券、期货、外汇或高频交易系统开发经验。  
2 、负责高性能交易系统的核心模块研发，包括行情接入、订单处理、风控引擎、撮合逻辑等。  
3 、参与系统架构设计与优化，提升系统的吞吐量、稳定性和可扩展性。  
4 、精通 C++11/14/17 标准，熟悉 STL 、Boost 等常用库，具备扎实的编程功底。  
5\. 熟悉数据结构、算法和操作系统原理，对低延迟和高并发场景有深入理解。  
6\. 良好的团队合作能力和沟通能力，能承受较强的工作压力（会有很多技术难点需要解决的压力）。  
  
  
请携带简历咨询，谢谢；  
TG：@jtx_2023  
E: [justinxu@futuretalent.com.cn](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)

2.社媒账号运营：操盘海内外社媒账号，负责营销渠道和用户增长方式的探索和开拓，有清晰的营销活动目标及实现链路
3. 创意内容输出：发布制作有料有趣的内容，负责从营销获客到整个用户体验全链路的监控和分析

【希望你是】
1. 热爱内容营销，有运营海内外社媒平台或经营个人账号的经验为加分项
2. 优秀的文案撰写制作能力，对内容具有一定的审美和判断力，或能够有效使用AI创作或优化
3. 有ownership，有自己的产品和增长思维，细心、认真、负责，对工作产出有较高的标准

【我们是】
由于团队分布式办公，在充分的信任和尊重基础上给大家积极探索的机会，也希望你是有ownership，闲不下来总想折腾的个体。我们彼此认真对待每一分精力和每一个idea，会尽可能给你一些有帮助的输入、反馈及成长机会🚀 我们希望能成为每个人各自成长的伙伴，从同事到马拉松搭子 （我司马拉松报名费报销）🏃‍♀️

postTitle: 【全职Java高级后端工程师招聘】月薪3-4w 远程
descContent:
本公司是一家总部位于加拿大的 房地产智能分析软件公司，专注于为私募基金、资产管理机构和投资团队提供 房地产承销与资产管理自动化 平台。我们正在构建的是一套以 Java / 分布式系统 / 微服务架构 为核心的工程级产品，用技术替代大量低效、重复、容易出错的人工分析工作，让复杂的房地产决策变得更清晰、更可靠。我们面向的是全球专业机构客户，业务复杂、数据密集、对系统稳定性与工程质量要求极高。我们是一支 远程优先、技术导向 的国际化团队，现面向中国市场招聘 顶级 Java 后端工程师，欢迎对系统架构、分布式系统和长期工程演进有追求的工程师加入我们。

你将负责什么（核心职责）
•	设计、开发并持续演进 Java / Spring Boot 后端核心服务
•	对现有系统进行 模块化拆分，逐步从单体 / 半单体演进为 清晰可控的微服务架构
•	构建 高并发、可扩展、可观测 的分布式系统，支撑机构级客户使用
•	设计稳定的 服务边界、接口契约（REST / 内部 RPC），避免隐性耦合
•	深度参与 核心业务逻辑 设计与实现（房地产承销、现金流建模、资产与租约数据处理）
•	与前端、数据 / AI 模块协作，保证系统在复杂业务下的整体一致性
•	为未来 企业级客户、多租户、跨团队协作 提前做好架构与技术选型准备

我们希望你具备的能力
必须项（硬要求）
•	3–7 年 Java 后端开发经验
•	扎实的 Spring Boot / Spring 生态（Spring MVC / Data / Transaction 等）
•	有真实的 微服务架构经验（服务拆分、服务间通信、基础治理）
•	理解分布式系统中的核心问题，包括但不限于：
o	一致性、幂等性、事务边界如何设计
o	网络延迟、失败重试、降级与容错的取舍
•	熟悉常见后端基础设施：
o	MySQL / PostgreSQL（索引、事务、SQL 性能）
o	Redis（缓存场景、常见坑）
o	消息队列（Kafka / RabbitMQ / Pulsar 任一）
•	能写 工程化、可维护、可长期演进 的代码，而不是一次性脚本

加分项（不是必须，但很重要）
•	有 系统重构、技术债治理 的实际经验
•	理解并实践过 DDD / Clean Architecture / 模块化设计（不要求教条）
•	有高并发或复杂业务系统 的实战经验
•	有云原生经验（Docker / Kubernetes / AWS / GCP / 阿里云）

我们不适合什么样的人
•	只会堆业务代码，不关心系统结构与长期成本
•	习惯“先写再说”，不思考服务边界与后果
•	技术决策严重依赖他人
•	需要大量 hand-holding 才能推进工作的工程师

你能得到什么
•	真实的系统级问题（不是表单后台或管理系统）
•	架构设计与技术决策空间，而不是照着旧代码维护
•	与 强工程背景的创始人和核心工程人员 直接协作
•	对技术方向与结果负责，并拥有话语权
•	完全远程（Remote-first），长期合作导向
company: 加拿大房地产智能分析公司
jobCategory: 后端开发,DevOps/MLOps,数据开发

postTitle: 全栈开发工程师（远程）(Next.js / Supabase)
descContent:
**背景**
我们是一个很小的外包团队（核心成员已经合作十年有余）。手上一直陆陆续续有项目，其中一个项目最近的需求突然增多，雇主需要增加一名开发人员，因此来电鸭寻找合适的人选，不仅是为了这个项目，也为了今后更多的合作可能。最初可以 partime 按时薪结算的形式合作，90 - 180 元/小时，具体薪资按照面试结果评定。如果项目稳定可以转为 fulltime 合作，合作愉快的情况下薪资仍有洽谈空间。团队成员都是非常靠谱、真诚、踏实的伙伴，希望借此机会可以结识更多合拍的伙伴。

**核心技能要求**
 - 全栈开发：负责产品功能模块的端到端实现，从前端到后端及数据库
 - AI 辅助开发：熟练运用 AI 辅助工具（主要使用 Cursor）进行高效编码与问题解决
 - 远程协作：通过文档、PR 评论等方式有效参与团队协作
 - 质量保证：在 AI 辅助下编写高质量、可维护的代码，完成自我测试
 - 自主交付：具备高度自主性，能够按照任务优先级按时交付
 - 产品思维：能够从用户角度思考产品功能，主动理解业务需求并将其转化为可行的技术方案
 - 设计能力：具备良好的 UI/UX 设计审美，能利用 AI 开发工具实现精美且风格一致的页面

**技术栈要求**（不要求精通，但要能快速上手）：
 - 熟悉现代 React 开发理念，能在 AI 辅助下使用 Next.js 新特性
 - 了解 TypeScript 基础，能通过 AI 完善类型定义
 - 能通过 AI 工具使用 Tailwind CSS 快速构建 UI
 - 理解组件化开发思想，能利用 Radix UI/shadcn 等现有组件库
 - 熟悉 Supabase 的基本概念，能在 AI 帮助下配置数据库和认证

**AI 开发能力要求**
 - 需求转译能力
   - 能将产品需求转化为 AI 可理解的开发任务
   - 能拆解复杂问题为顺序可执行的步骤
 - 代码判断能力
   - 能评估 AI 生成的代码质量
   - 知道何时接受 AI 的方案，何时需要调整方向
   - 能识别 AI 代码中的潜在问题
 - 迭代与调试能力
   - 能通过有效对话引导 AI 迭代优化代码
   - 掌握与 AI 协作诊断和修复 bug 的高效方法
 - 架构把控能力
   - 在 AI 编写代码时保持架构一致性
   - 确保 AI 生成的代码符合项目规范
   - 管理 AI 生成代码的复杂性

**远程工作硬性要求**
 - 异步沟通能力：能够通过文档、PR 描述、评论清晰表达技术方案
 - 自我管理能力：能够自主规划工作、管理时间、保持高效产出
 - 科学上网能力：能够稳定访问 GitHub、Vercel、AI 服务及相关文档等海外开发必需资源

**其他要求**
 - 熟练的英文阅读、写作能力，基础的英文口语、听力能力。
 - 添加联系方式后，请直接发送你的问题清单（如有）以及简历，无论合适与否，我们都会给予响应。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,前端开发,AI,UI&UX,DevOps/MLOps

任职经验要求），

postTitle: Senior Frontend Engineer, Senior Software Engineer
jobTitle: Senior Frontend Engineer, Senior Software Engineer
descContent:
Kadoa | Multiple roles | Remote | Full-Time | <https://kadoa.com>

We’re on a mission to give humans and LLMs reliable and fast access to web
data.

Web scraping used to be the same for decades (brittle scripts that break
constantly). We're automating that end-to-end with LLMs that build and
maintain data pipelines. We're also heavily focused on making ethical scraping
the default (robots.txt checks, rate limiting, etc.).

All 3 founders have spent years in the trenches writing web scraping and ETL
software and still do it almost every single day. We’re making sure every team
member can do the best work of their career at Kadoa.

We are looking for people who share our passion for software craftsmanship,
data, and AI.

We are growing fast, have a no-bullshit culture, and try to minimize the
distance between the code you write and the customers who use it.

We have openings for:

\- Senior Frontend Engineer: <https://www.kadoa.com/careers/frontend-engineer>

\- Senior Software Engineer: <https://www.kadoa.com/careers/senior-software-
engineer>

If that sounds like you, please email me at (adrian at kadoa dot com) and
mention HN in the subject line. AI slop applications will be filtered out
immediately ;)

postTitle: Software Engineers / DevOps
descContent:
Common Prefix | Software Engineers / DevOps | Greece | Remote | Full-time

Common Prefix is a blockchain research & development company. Blockchain
technologies enable large-scale economic coordination through shared,
programmable ledgers. Our mission is to solve the foundational scientific and
engineering challenges standing in the way of mainstream adoption,
particularly around interoperability, scalability, and usability. We combine
formal scientific research with production-grade engineering. Our team
publishes in top-tier peer-reviewed venues and builds open-source
infrastructure used across major blockchain ecosystems. We have contributed to
advanced systems including Axelar, XRPL, Sui, and Flashbots, and are trusted
partners to protocols building critical infrastructure.

What we're looking for:

Software engineers who can solve problems, are smart, get things done, and
enjoy working on the bleeding edge, learning about cryptography, and working
from first-principles.

Tech stack: Doesn't matter, we'll teach you. But we work mostly with Rust, Go,
and TypeScript.

descContent:
IPinfo.io | Various Roles | Remote (Anywhere) | Fulltime / Partime / Contract | <https://ipinfo.io>

IPinfo is a leading provider of IP address data, including geolocation, VPN
and residential proxy detection, mobile carrier data, and over 20 other
context tags. Our API handles over 120 billion requests per month, and we also
license our data for use in many products and services you’ve likely
interacted with.

We’re a fast-growing, bootstrapped company with a globally distributed team of
around 60 people. Our data powers customers such as Cloudflare, T-Mobile,
SpaceX, DemandBase, and Clearbit, among many others. We also sponsor and
contribute to academic conferences like ACM IMC and ACM CoNEXT, staying
closely connected with the internet measurement and research community.

\- Data Engineer - Geolocation team - read more and apply at
<https://ipinfo.bamboohr.com/careers/76?source=aWQ9Mjg%3D>

\- Research Scientist - read more and apply at
<https://ipinfo.bamboohr.com/careers/74?source=aWQ9Mjg%3D>

We're always on the look out to strong software or data engineers with an
internet measuremenet / analysis background to join our team too.

postTitle: [志愿搬运/远程] 招募合伙人
jobTitle: 工程师技术合伙人、UI合伙人、产品经理合伙人
descContent:
⚠️ \* 此信息是社区志愿者的友情搬运转发，旨在帮助大家获得更多的工作机会。联系方式皆保留，有意可自行联系，也请说明来自“电鸭社区”。

*   信息的真实性、实效性需要大家自行识别判断，社区和搬运志愿者无法为此做出负责，请理解。
# 
在做背单词和恋爱脱单的软件，准备上web端，小程序，iOS，Android。招募工程师技术合伙人和UI合伙人以及产品经理合伙人。先把产品做出来再招募运营小伙伴。

微信或电话：18315852058。备注来意。

如果有投资人对项目感兴趣也欢迎联系。
目前还没有成立公司，先做产品，成型后注册公司后加入需要付费功能推广，盈利均分。
特点翻转背单词，正面英语，反面汉语，一点击就翻牌子，还有快闪背单词，一点击英语就中心向四周缩放scale成汉语。还有上传任意pdf等文件实现点击单词查看单词翻译的功能，并自动加入个人词库。还有教育版短视频应用，类似抖音，但是内容是英文电影片段，点击字幕查看单词翻译。或者如果能抓取任意网站的字幕文件并实现在该网站点击字幕查看单词翻译而不是句子翻译的功能这样的浏览器插件。有竞品已经实现YouTube之类的字幕翻译，可直接模仿。再有就是很好奇有没有自然拼读法语音接口，见Google搜索how to pronunciate xxxx，可以出现自然拼读法按照音节跟读。已经找到分割文字接口，以及语音接口，不知道如何按照每个音节发音时间对应。
再就是一个恋爱脱单交友软件：我已经思考很久，罗列一下功能。取其精华去其糟粕。

1.匿名表白。输入QQ邮箱或其他邮箱或手机号，可以通过企业邮箱或企业短信来表白。次数进行限制。付费无上限，分享到微信群或朋友圈获得一次免费机会，一人仅有一次。

2.相亲卡片，UI设计成层叠卡片，可转发到朋友圈和微信群。【tinder】虚拟礼物。

3.通过公众号情感文字留住用户。

4.抄袭tinder，左滑右滑的卡片。筛选搜索功能。择偶标准和自我介绍和才艺展示或者对ta想说的话用语音表达。

5.一起唱歌（接歌）

6.附近的人。

7.男生点击喜欢后，给被喜欢的女生发送邮件，女生点击确认后，给男生邮件，然后互相可以看到联系方式，比如邮箱和微信号。

8.一周cp活动，付费一元点击参与，随机匹配男女，联系方式发送到你的邮箱。七天里，每天给发送一个任务活动。下周可继续参加。

9.录制自我介绍和择偶标准和才艺展示短视频，还有直播相亲，红娘主持，上麦收费。

10.爱情银行，你存一部分钱，作为恋爱经费，去周围合作的商家消费的时候，可以获得价值比花的钱更多的物品。比如酒店，旅行，衣食住行一切消费。

11.恋爱存款一个是满一周年或者结婚，给更多的钱，比如1314元，521元。开始恋爱存521元，结婚平台返1314元。

12.你有喜欢的女孩，想给她在七夕节买东西，你在平台输入女生地址和手机号，就可以在平台的合作商家购买礼物，并且附赠一张卡片，上面写着你想说的话和该平台的你的id。

13.匿名倾诉，漂流瓶的功能，可以选择公开广场，可以同时发送给多人，收到多人回复。

14.恋爱上的心理问题，可以引入心理咨询师专业回复。

15.模仿婚礼纪，邀请亲朋好友参加婚礼，虚拟礼物，做婚恋一条龙，婚庆服务，彩礼的车平台推荐，婚房平台推荐。有了孩子，月嫂推荐，家政服务，保洁推荐。

16.一元留一个，一元拿一个微信号或QQ号。

17.择偶标准帖（仿知乎），可按条件筛选

18.高校表白墙，每个人可选择自己的高校，发表白贴，交友贴，失物招领贴等等，可评论互动。

19.传话服务。用于通过演唱和电话传递几句话。收费。
salary: 盈利均分，暂无固定薪资

postTitle: 制造业视频数据分析师 | 6k｜可远程｜制造业视频数据｜女生友好
descContent:
视频数据分析师（偏制造业视频数据标注方向）
---------------------

6k｜可远程｜制造业视频数据｜女生友好

### 薪资待遇

6000 元 / 月（税前）

长期稳定项目，表现优秀可长期合作

### 工作内容

*   负责制造业相关视频数据标注、整理与校验（汽车、工业工程、服装加工等）
    
*   按项目要求进行数据分类、质量检查与规范维护
    
*   使用 Excel 进行数据记录、统计和管理
    
*   对标注数据进行基础分析，发现问题并及时反馈
    
*   快速学习不同制造业的生产流程，并应用到数据标注标准中
    
*   对接国内数据供应商，沟通标注要求、进度与质量
    
*   配合美国团队进行跨时区沟通（偶尔晚间会议或消息同步）
    

### 任职要求

*   理工科背景优先（工程类、自动化、工业工程、计算机等）
    
*   做事细心、耐心、有责任感，能长期专注数据工作
    
*   熟练使用 Excel（表格整理、基础函数、统计）
    
*   学习能力强，能通过搜索资料、文档、视频快速理解新行业流程
    
*   具备良好的沟通能力，能与供应商和团队顺畅协作
    
*   能接受并适应跨时区（美国）沟通
    

### 加分项

*   有数据标注、数据整理、数据分析相关经验
    
*   有制造业、工厂流程、工业视频相关理解
    
*   有远程工作或跨时区协作经验
    

### 我们希望你是

*   工作稳定、靠谱，注重细节
    
*   对流程型、标准化的数据工作不排斥
    
*   擅长记录、整理、复盘
    

### 工作方式

*   国内远程办公
    
*   工作节奏稳定，任务目标清晰
jobCategory: 数据分析,AI,项目管理

postTitle: [实习] Casbin 开源社区《Talent 2026》远程开源项目预选生招募中！
descContent:
## Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026

### “Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026”是什么？

“Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026”（以下简称 Talent 2026 ）是由 Casbin
开源社区举办的一项面向高校学生的编程活动，旨在鼓励在校学生积极参与 Casbin 社区旗下开源软件的开发维护，促进国内优秀开源软件的蓬勃发展。

2020 年，Casbin 以开源社区的身份首次参加了由 Google 公司主办的[Google Summer of Code
2020](https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/archive/2020/organizations/6587176113930240/)
和由中科院软件所、OpenEuler 社区主办的[开源软件供应链点亮计划-开源之夏 2020](https://summer-
ospp.ac.cn/2020/) 。在上述活动中，Casbin 社区共派出 7 位来自国内外（中国、法国等）互联网一线的资深社区导师，共培养、指导了国内外
15 名学生（ 14 位中国同学、1 位印度同学）进行为期 3 个月的开源编程活动。Casbin 项目已毕业的同学，有的成长为 Casbin
项目核心维护者、以开源大牛的身份活跃于 GitHub ，有的毕业后全职加入腾讯微信事业部等互联网头部公司，有的凭借在 Casbin
社区的出色经历拿到全球顶级投行 Morgan Stanley （摩根士丹利）的 offer ，在工业界和学术界发挥着重要作用。

2021 年和 2022 年，Casbin 社区继续参加上述两项活动，Google Summer of Code 和开源软件供应链点亮计划-
开源之夏，题目的数量与招纳的学生人数均创下新高。

活动 | 学生人数 | 最终考核通过人数  
---|---|---  
GSoC 2020 | 3 | 3  
开源之夏 2020 | 12 | 10  
GSoC 2021 | 9 | 9  
开源之夏 2021 | 11 | 11  
GSoC 2022 | 12 | 11  
开源之夏 2022 | 6 | 5  
  
为了在非暑期时间能够继续促进 Casbin 开源软件的发展，同时挖掘有潜力的学生作为 Google Summer of Code 2026 和开源之夏
2026 （若该赛事仍举行并且 Casbin 社区获得参加资格）的有力竞争者，Casbin 社区将自筹资金，在 Google Summer of Code
等活动的闭幕期间，开展常态化的“Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026”活动，针对 Casbin
社区旗下开源软件的开发与维护提供 mini
项目，并向全国高校学生开放报名。学生可自主选择感兴趣的项目进行申请，并在中选后获得该软件资深维护者（社区导师）亲自指导的机会。

根据项目的难易程度和完成情况，参与者可获取“Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026”活动奖金和加盖 Casbin
社区公章的参与（实习）证明。

**“Talent 2026”项目在 2026 年第六次举办，与 Google Summer of Code 等活动类似，不同点是“Talent
2026”在非 GSoC 申请时间举行，与 GSoC 等活动是互补的关系。**

  1. Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026 官网： <https://github.com/casbin/Talent2026>
  2. Google Summer of Code 官网： <https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/>
  3. Google Summer of Code 中文介绍： <https://github.com/gsoc-cn/gsoc-cn> 或 <https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/27823910> 或 <https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/27330699>
  4. 开源软件供应链点亮计划-开源之夏活动官网： <https://summer.iscas.ac.cn/>

### 活动的主要参与方有哪些？

活动组织方：Casbin 开源软件社区。

活动参与方主要角色为学生和导师。

  1. 学生：学生自由选择项目，与导师沟通实现方案并撰写项目计划书。被选中的学生将在导师指导下，按计划完成开发工作，并将成果贡献给社区。社区评估学生的完成度，主办方根据评估结果发放资助金额给学生。
  2. 社区：社区提供项目列表和描述，并安排项目对应的导师，导师与申请者沟通方案、并从申请者中选中一位承接项目。在为期三个月的开发周期中，导师指导学生进行对应项目的开发工作。
  3. 导师：社区针对每一个项目指定一个导师，与学生一起制定合适的开发计划和方案，指导学生按计划完成开发。

### 本项目的资助额度是多少？

资助金按月发放，分为基础资助金：600 元 + 奖金：0~400 元 （均为每月税后，根据上手快慢程度及技术栈匹配程度会有浮动，项目开始前会协商好。）

## Casbin 开源项目介绍

Casbin 是一个强大的、高效的开源访问控制框架，支持 Go, Java, Node.js, Javascript (React), Python,
PHP, .NET, C++, Rust 等十几种语言。Casbin 开源项目创立于 2017 年，核心维护团队有二十多人。Casbin
在业界具有广泛影响力。目前已经被 Intel 、VMware 、Orange 、RedHat 、T-Mobile 等公司开源使用，被腾讯云、Cisco
、Verizon 等公司闭源使用。具体详见 Casbin 主页。Casbin Go 主项目目前 GitHub 19000+ stars
，加上所有语言的实现、插件等可达到 30000+ stars 。

Casbin 技术已经被列入多个国内外权威机构、政府部门的白皮书：

  1. 国家广电总局《广播电视和网络视听区块链系统》白皮书（第 85 页）： [http://www.nrta.gov.cn/module/download/downfile.jsp?classid=0&filename=e2ed95c223c34e38aa163b01030655aa.pdf](http://www.nrta.gov.cn/module/download/downfile.jsp?classid=0&filename=e2ed95c223c34e38aa163b01030655aa.pdf)
  2. 美国国家标准与技术研究院（ NIST ）《 Attribute-based Access Control for Microservices-based Applications Using a Service Mesh 》白皮书（第 10 页）： <https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-204B.pdf>

Casbin 也曾经在国际上进行多次线下宣讲：

  1. 新加坡政府技术部 Open Government Products： <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTT84oplR9o>
  2. 俄罗斯最大在线旅游平台 [tutu.ru](http://tutu.ru)： <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z5dUxH4PqYM>

具体请了解 Casbin 官网： <https://casbin.org/>

## 可选项目列表

所有可选项目详见：
[https://github.com/casbin/Talent2026#可选项目列表](https://github.com/casbin/Talent2026#%E5%8F%AF%E9%80%89%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8)

## 候选人要求

### 工作职责：

  * 每周与项目导师进行线上讨论，完成项目规定的开发任务。项目导师由开源项目创始人或其他核心成员担任；
  * 积极参与开源社区的建设，参与代码提交、解决 Issue 、审核 PR 等日常工作；
  * 配合完成官方要求的材料提交等事项，包括项目申请书撰写、社区反馈任务完成度追踪等。

### 职位要求：

  * 本科、硕士或博士在读（已毕业、工作的无法参加）；
  * 对开源软件、开源社区感兴趣；
  * 熟悉一种或多种编程语言，有较强的工程能力，代码格式清晰规范，善于团队协作；
  * 有一定英文读写能力，能够熟练运用英语在 GitHub 进行开发、协作；
  * 较强的沟通能力和逻辑表达能力。

### 具有以下条件者优先：

  * 熟悉 Go, Javascript 、React 等语言或框架、Web 系统、分布式系统、微服务架构，有相关项目经验；
  * 在 GitHub 较为活跃，有自己的开源项目，或参与过知名开源项目；
  * 可以在项目结束后继续长期参与开源社区的开发、建设或维护。

## 投递要求

申请学生需要同时完成以下“联系社区”和“官网投递”两个环节：

### 1\. 联系社区（ 2026 年 1 月 1 日 - 2026 年 12 月 31 日）

  1. 加入《 Casbin 访问控制社区群》（ QQ 大群）：[546057381](https://qm.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm/qr?k=G1a9A8TvsnySygiE0y3RcAll9FEazX-G&jump_from=webapi&authKey=OxuOi/et2Zzw7vuRzQFAnsO9sLJlJonNYtM9BRObV6lJs8nWKfjozA8qNmS4mdbx)
  2. 加入《 Casbin 明日之星预选生计划-Talent for Casbin 2026-群》（ QQ 小群）：[540163681](https://qm.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm/qr?k=0Hbu5gOSLXUkENTtGaoG0zMqjyixr4ke&jump_from=webapi&authKey=3l1AOq4ChaGgbj4/cHCPXLk/UzYWJigc02l30lKUJH37Wxu+eZxXyKXx7rNXElZV) ，联系导师，与导师沟通项目细节和方案，完成社区指定的 Easy Tasks

![qrcode-casbin](https://cdn.casbin.com/activity/qrcode-casbin.png) ![qrcode-
talent](https://cdn.casbin.com/activity/qrcode-talent.png)

### 2\. 官网投递（ 2026 年 1 月 1 日 - 2026 年 12 月 31 日）

发送 [中文简历 PDF ] 至 Casbin 社区官方邮箱： admin@casbin.org

postTitle: Preconstruction Design Phase Manager I- Solar
jobTitle: Preconstruction Design Phase Manager I- Solar
descContent:
**Description**  

Mortenson is seeking an experienced **Design Phase Manager I** (DPM) to join
our Solar group who can interact with staff at all levels, remain flexible,
resourceful, proactive, and efficient in a dynamic environment, anticipate and
solve problems creatively, and ensure the owner’s vision is translated into
design solutions and construction parameters, while demonstrating excellent
communication skills and attention to detail, and potentially managing two
projects simultaneously or one larger project.

As a DPM, you'll use your utility scale solar experience to actively engage
with a variety of stakeholders (EORs, clients, internal team members) to
manage the design process. You'll skillfully guide and facilitate
conversations ensuring alignment between all parties while connecting the dots
across technical and financial domains. You see the bigger picture but can
also work through contract details and analyze risk. You're a project manager
at heart who wants to get in at the ground level, at the front-end of
construction. Design impactful projects from the ground up.

**Location:** Any home base location in the United States; preference given to
those that can work from our MN-HQ or any regional office

**Travel:** flexible; varies based on project locations

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Manage the design process and work closely with customers/owners to define project expectations

  * Facilitate solicitation, selection, and contracting with designers for design-build projects

  * Develop and present project proposals

  * Create detailed project design phase and baseline construction schedules

  * Conduct detailed construction planning, including subcontractor selections and site utilization

  * Lead design team in incorporating constructability, logistics, and customer expectations

  * Guide estimating team in developing technical design aspects and cost documentation

  * Manage design phase costs, including estimates, value engineering, and budget management

  * Ensure regulatory approvals and risk management requirements are met

  * Oversee and mentor design phase team members, providing resources and support

  * Conduct performance evaluations and participate in hiring decisions

  * Model exceptional customer relations and gather feedback during the design process

  * Manage site work and logistics efficiently, providing improvement suggestions

  * Perform other duties as assigned

**QUALIFICATIONS**

  * Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, or Architectural Engineering, Construction Management, Estimating, or equivalent field 

  * Minimum of six years relevant experience

  * Utility scale solar experience highly preferred 

  * Strong teamwork orientation, initiative, communication, problem-solving, and leadership skills

  * Detail orientation sufficient to organize and manage multiple project tasks

  * Possess basic understanding of construction law and generally accepted business practices

  * Microsoft Office, project, and pertinent web application skills at an intermediate level

  * Proven positive and professional attitude, and strong customer service skills

  * Ability to interpret and communicate Mortenson policies 

  * Ability to travel up to 50%

**A few benefits offered include:**

 _(for Non-Craft & Non-Union Craft working 25+ hours / week)_

  * Medical and prescription drug plans that includes no additional cost vision coverage 

  * Dental plan 

  * 401k retirement plan with a generous Mortenson match 

  * Paid time off, holidays, and other paid leaves 

  * Employer paid Life, AD&D, and disability insurance 

  * No-Cost mental health tool and concierge with extensive work-life resources

  * Tuition reimbursement 

  * Adoption Assistance 

  * Gym Membership Discount Program 

**The base pay range for this role is $110,700 - $166,100.** (Actual range is
higher for the following office locations: Denver, CO and Chicago, IL – 5%,
Seattle, WA, and Portland, OR – 10%, Washington, D.C. – 12.5%).

Base pay is positioned within the range based on several factors including an
individual’s knowledge, skills, and experience, with consideration given to
internal equity. This position is eligible for Mortenson’s incentive plan.

**#LI-GL1 #LI-remote**

**Please make note:**

  * Visa sponsorship is not offered for this position. 

  * Our postings are typically open a minimum of 5 days and an average of 44 days. 

**ABOUT MORTENSON**

As a top builder, developer, and EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and
Construction), our expertise spans markets like sports, renewable energy, data
centers, healthcare, and more. We are builders at heart, working to ensure the
built environment has a lasting positive impact.

Let’s Redefine Possible®

**Equal Employment Opportunity**

Your uniqueness brings new and creative perspectives to the team. Mortenson is
committed to providing equal opportunities of employment (EOE) to all
individuals, regardless of your race, religion, gender, national origin, age,
veteran status, disability, marital status or any other legally protected
category.

**Other Items to Note**

  * Mortenson reserves the right to hire any individual without legal or financial obligation on unwanted solicitations.  _No agency emails, calls, or solicitations are accepted_ without a valid agreement.

  * Must be currently legally authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H1B status, 0-1, TN, CPT, OPT, etc.). We are unable to sponsor or take over sponsorship of an employment Visa at this time.

  
  

* * *
jobCategory: 项目管理,咨询

postTitle: 兼职招聘】资深前端工程师（Vue 3.4 + Uniapp / 医药商城项目）
descContent:
🌟 项目简介

本项目为一个已上线的医药类商城（H5+小程序），目前处于功能迭代与体验优化阶段。项目采用最新的前端技术栈，追求性能与最大化的移动端适配。

🛠️技术栈要求

核心框架：掌握掌握Vue 3.4+ (必须精通Composition API)及Uniapp体系。

工程化：熟悉Vite配置、组件化开发及性能优化。

环境便利：具有多余的微信内置浏览器(WebView)及iOS Safari兼容性处理经验。

工具：熟练使用 Git（我们将提供私有 Gitea 仓库进行协作）。

🎯你需要解决的核心痛点（请阅读后再申请）

微信环境疑难杂症：解决H5/小程序运行正常，但在微信内置浏览器下，购物车、订单确认页、个人中心由于回调授权或JS-SDK签名导致无法打开/卡死的问题。

全面屏车辆：深度优化iOS Safari顶栏（刘海/灵动岛）及底栏（Home Indicator）的安全区域车辆（Safe Area），去除背景断层与点击桌面。

交互优化：修复吸底组件在移动端键盘弹出、地址栏动态伸缩时的视觉错位问题。
jobCategory: 前端开发

postTitle: 【兼职AI应用（视觉情绪识别及管理）工程师招聘】
descContent:
【兼职AI应用工程师招聘】
我们正在开发一款面向青少年的情绪管理APP，核心是通过表情识别捕捉用户情绪，结合豆包大模型提供心理引导，初期会优先用于帮助有抽动症、抑郁症等情况的孩子调节情绪。
一、招聘岗位：AI应用工程师（兼职）
工作地点：远程
招聘人数：1-2名
工作周期：2个月（2026年2月-3月），需在3月底前完成APP基础版本开发调试。
二、岗位职责：
 
负责接入火山引擎豆包视觉大模型API，实现实时表情识别功能，需能准确识别开心、焦虑、烦躁等8种以上情绪。
完成表情识别模块与APP前端的对接，确保从摄像头采集画面到情绪结果输出的延迟低于1秒。
调用豆包大模型API，根据识别出的情绪生成适合青少年的引导话术，需支持话术的个性化调整。
优化API调用逻辑，避免重复请求，确保免费额度内可满足日常测试及初期100人以内使用。
三、任职要求：
基本要求：
大专及以上学历，计算机或相关专业，有1年以上Python开发经验。
熟悉HTTP/HTTPS协议，能独立完成API接口的调用、调试和异常处理。
有火山引擎、阿里云等大模型API接入经验，了解表情识别或计算机视觉基础概念。
优先条件：
有过心理类或教育类APP开发经验者优先。
了解青少年心理特点，或有相关产品适配经验者优先。
四、薪酬福利：
薪资：项目总费用5-8万，分三期支付，完成API对接、功能联调、上线测试各支付一期。
福利：可提供项目成果署名，后续若项目推进顺利，可优先转为全职或长期合作。
五、应聘方式：
请将个人简历（含相关项目案例，尤其是API接入案例）发送至邮箱。
邮件主题请注明“AI应用工程师+姓名+可到岗时间”，附件命名同主题。
筛选通过后，会在3个工作日内联系进行技术面试，主要沟通API接入方案和项目时间规划。
发布日期：2026年1月2日
有效期至：2026年1月20日
jobCategory: AI,算法,客户端开发,全栈开发

postTitle: [志愿搬运/远程全职]游戏外设/硬件产品经理招聘
jobTitle: 游戏外设/硬件产品经理
descContent:
⚠️ \* 此信息是社区志愿者的友情搬运转发，旨在帮助大家获得更多的工作机会。联系方式皆保留，有意可自行联系，也请说明来自“电鸭社区”。

*   信息的真实性、实效性需要大家自行识别判断，社区和搬运志愿者无法为此做出负责，请理解。
# 
我们是谁：
飞智，专注打造产品竞争力的游戏外设品牌。飞智核心团队来自复旦大学，有一批深具游戏情怀的小伙伴，坚持技术和设计创新，具有极度开放和不断成长的公司文化，期待与更多优秀的小伙伴共同成长。
我们在寻找充满激情与创造力的硬件产品经理，如果你既是产品打造高手，又是资深游戏玩家、电子发烧友，渴望用硬核技术重新定义游戏体验——这里就是你实现梦想的舞台！

你将主导这些酷炫挑战：
1. 洞察未来战场，深挖全球游戏外设市场趋势，分析玩家行为与需求，捕捉创新机会；
2. 定义新产品，为产品竞争力负责，实现商业成功；
3. 主导整机产品从概念设计到量产的完整闭环，主导跨部门作战与攻关，整合研发与供应链资源；
4. 负责产品全生命周期管理，产品生命周期替代计划。

职位要求：
我们期待这样的超级队友：
1. 全日制本科及以上学历，电子/机械/工业设计相关专业优先；
2. 3年+消费电子硬件产品经验，成功打造过爆款者优先；
3. 具备优秀的市场价值洞察能力，体验设计能力，资源整合能力，能够快速响应变化，积极解决问题；
4. 加分Buff：资深游戏玩家、电子产品发烧友、拆机能手、科技趋势雷达

我们的优势：
1. 国内游戏外设赛道市占率Top1
2. 公司近三年销售规模平均增速30%以上，稳定持续增长
3. 五天七小时工作制，弹性工作，没有加班文化
4. 丰富的培训和成长机会，定期组织外部培训和国内外参展
5. 扁平化管理，简单、开放、平等的人际关系
6. 员工利润共享，一年两次晋升和调薪的机会

postTitle: Media Specialist – Google & Facebook
descContent:
We are looking for a skilled Paid Media Specialist to oversee, optimize, and
scale advertising campaigns across Facebook and Google platforms.

Key Responsibilities

Plan, execute, and continuously optimize Facebook and Google Ads campaigns

Track daily campaign performance and transform data into actionable insights

Optimize budgets, bidding strategies, audiences, and targeting to improve CPC,
CPA, CTR, and ROAS

Test, analyze, and iterate ad creatives, audiences, and landing pages to scale
top-performing campaigns

Collaborate closely with design, content, and sales teams to ensure aligned
and effective marketing strategies

Stay informed about platform updates, industry trends, and emerging paid media
opportunities

What Will Make You Stand Out

A background in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or a related field

Minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience managing Facebook Ads and Google Ads
campaigns

Strong understanding of Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and conversion
tracking

Data-driven, detail-oriented, and highly organized

Excellent communication skills with the ability to handle multiple projects at
the same time

What We Offer

A collaborative and supportive working environment

Freedom to test new ideas, experiment with strategies, and continuously
optimize performance

Fully remote work with flexible working hours

Opportunities to work on impactful projects with brands across diverse
industries

How to Apply

Please send your CV to: hr@dsocialglobal.com

mso-fareast-language:#0400; mso-bidi-language:#0400; } @page{mso-page-border-surround-header:no; mso-page-border-surround-footer:no;}@page Section0{ } div.Section0{page:Section0;}

**你好，未来的技术联创伙伴：**

我是“牧牧向导”的创始人。我们已上线的小程序，并非从零开始的幻想，而是一个**已验商业模式、亟待技术重构与激活的“半成品”**。我们已完成最复杂的商业逻辑梳理，现在，只差一位技术掌舵人，将它变为一台高效、可信的生态引擎。

我们寻找的不是执行者，而是能**理解商业本质、用代码构建规则、并愿与我们共享未来的技术合伙人**。如果你渴望一个深度绑定、全程参与、并用技术直接定义产品走向的机会，这封信正是为你而写。

**�� 这是一次怎样的合作？**

这是一份 **“技术联合创始人”级别的邀约**。我们以极简现金启动，用股权绑定长期利益，并将产品的技术未来托付于你。

**回报构成**

**具体说明**

**现金保障**

**首期****6****,000元人民币**，作为第一阶段核心开发工作的直接报酬，按里程碑支付，保障启动无忧。

**股权绑定**

**5%的公司注册股权**，通过正式《股权授予协议》锁定，分4年成熟。你不是临时工，而是公司的共同拥有者。

**未来主导权**

项目验证成功后，App及所有重大版本迭代由你**优先主导并签约实施**。你是平台技术蓝图的绘制者与建造者。

**�� 第一阶段核心任务：重构“经济系统”与体验（4-6周）**

本次开发将严格围绕 **《牧牧向导平台分账结算与运营优化方案》** 执行。这不仅是界面优化，更是对平台底层经济逻辑的系统性重构。优先级如下：

**P0 优先级：构建可信的“经济心脏”与合规基石**

这是本次开发的重中之重，是平台能否激活的关键。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**1\. 分账规则引擎**

开发可配置的分账规则中心，同时支持 **“向导服务费”** 与 **“产品分销佣金”** 两套独立逻辑。这是平台的经济规则大脑。

固化商业模型，确保每一笔收入都能被清晰、自动地拆分给各方（向导、服务商、经纪人、平台）。

**2\. 向导钱包与结算**

重构钱包为 **纯现金账户**，集成收入分类（服务费/佣金）、**自动税务计算与代扣**、清晰提现流程。

让向导对收入绝对信任，实现合规化运营，规避核心财务风险。

**3\. 城市服务商结算模块**

开发自动计算 **“城市月度净收入”** 的引擎，并生成可在线确认、可打印的标准化《结算单》，支撑 **“三七分成”** 合作模式。

建立与城市合伙人的信任基石，实现复杂合伙分成的自动化、透明化。

**4\. 合规与审计接口**

构建监管数据上报接口与全量订单分账数据存证体系，确保资金流清晰、可追溯、可审计。

满足长期合规要求，为规模化作准备。

**P1 优先级：提升流量转化与核心体验**

在可靠的经济系统之上，优化用户获取与转化的关键界面。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**旅游首页重构**

重构信息架构与视觉，强化搜索、目的地推荐与核心价值传达。

降低用户决策成本，提升首页到列表页的转化率。

**向导主页优化**

重塑信息展示（服务、评价、信任标签），优化编辑流程。

提升向导个人品牌，增强用户信任，提高详页到咨询的转化。

**P2 优先级：培育生态与运营提效**

丰富平台生态，赋能合作伙伴。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**社区模块优化**

重构社区首页与互动形式，支持城市达人发布“微线路”等内容。

提升用户粘性与活跃度，构建内容生态。

**商家/服务商后台**

优化服务商子后台，提供数据看板、结算单确认、简易产品发布模板。

提升本地合作伙伴的运营效率和体验。

**P3 优先级：个人化体验完善**

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**“我的”模块重构**

整合订单、钱包、资料管理，提升用户管理个人资产的效率与体验。

**�� 我们希望你具备怎样的特质？**

· **全栈能力与系统架构思维**：能熟练驾驭小程序前后端，并对设计交易、分账、多角色权限的**复杂业务系统**有浓厚兴趣或实战经验。

· **深刻的产品与商业理解力**：你能读懂“三七分成”背后的商业意图，而不仅仅将其视为一个功能。你的代码是在构建规则，而不仅仅是实现界面。

· **创业者的担当与节奏感**：能主动推进，对交付结果负责，能在远程协作中保持高效、透明的沟通。

· **一份技术人的纯粹与热忱**：你相信技术可以重塑商业，并愿意亲手参与这个过程。

**�� 为什么这个机会与众不同？**

1. **核心价值明确**：你无需从0到1猜测商业模式。我们将最复杂的**商业逻辑与分账模型**已完全梳理清晰，你挑战的是用最佳技术方案实现它。

2. **低风险，高绑定，高成长**：用一个月时间和基础保障，换取一个真实公司的股权，并锁定未来技术主导权。你的代码将直接决定平台的效率和扩展性。

3. **路径清晰，一步一印**：从小程序“经济系统”重构，到App全面升级，你的每一个决策都至关重要，成长轨迹清晰可见。

**�� 如何开启这次并肩作战的对话？**

如果你已被“构建平台经济系统”的挑战所吸引，并准备好以技术合伙人的身份承担重任，请通过以下方式联系我们。

**请在来信中，帮助我们更好地了解你：**

1. 一段简短的自述：你对“技术合伙人”角色的理解，以及为何对此机会感兴趣。

2. 1-2个最能体现你**技术深度**与**业务理解力**的项目经历（附链接或简述）。

3. （强力加分项）你对“牧牧向导”**分账结算系统**或**向导钱包体验**的任何初步思考或技术实现设想。

**我们寻找的，是一位能共同定义未来的创始团队成员。**  
**期待与你，从重构经济系统的第一行代码开始。**
jobCategory: 全栈开发,后端开发,产品经理,运营,项目管理

postTitle: Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer (NestJS + React) – SaaS Platform
jobTitle: Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer (NestJS + React) – SaaS Platform
descContent:
Enrollio is a fast-growing SaaS platform serving children’s dance and
performing arts studios. We are rebuilding and scaling our core systems and
are hiring a Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer who can own major parts of
our NestJS + React monorepo.

This is a long-term, full-time role. We’re looking for someone who thinks like
a product engineer—not a task-taker. Someone who cares about reliability,
clean architecture, debugging deep issues, and building scalable systems.

* * *

## **What You’ll Work On**

  * Fix high-priority bugs across our parent portal, studio portal, and backend

  * Own reliability of enrollment + payment flows (Stripe PaymentIntents + Elements)

  * Build and improve NestJS REST APIs and module architecture

  * Improve backend stability, error handling, and logging

  * Refactor legacy features for performance and long-term maintainability

  * Implement UI improvements across React, Vite, Zustand, TanStack Query

  * Work inside a TypeScript monorepo (backend + studio portal + parent portal)

  * Collaborate with support/ops when urgent issues arise

  * Assist with our ongoing backend restructure and migration

  * Be available during EST working hours (with flexibility for emergencies)

* * *

## **Our Tech Stack**

**Backend:** NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB Atlas, Redis (BullMQ), Stripe,
GoHighLevel API, Mailgun, SendGrid, Brevo, Google Cloud (App Engine, Cloud
Build), Jest, Sentry  
**Frontend:** React 18, Vite, TypeScript, Zustand, TanStack Query, Tailwind,
Radix UI, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion  
**Architecture:** Monorepo, domain-driven, fully typed, reliability-focused

* * *

## **Must-Have Experience**

  * 5+ years full-stack engineering

  * Strong TypeScript across backend + frontend

  * Deep experience with NestJS and React

  * Experience with Stripe PaymentIntents + subscription billing flows

  * Production MongoDB experience

  * Ability to debug complex issues across multiple layers

  * Strong English communication

  * Ownership mindset; reliable and proactive

* * *

## **Bonus Experience (Not required but valuable)**

  * BullMQ or similar queue systems

  * GoHighLevel API

  * MongoDB performance tuning

  * GCP deployments

  * Sentry, logging, observability

  * Stabilizing or refactoring large SaaS architectures

  * Understanding race conditions, idempotency, concurrency issues

* * *

## **What We Offer**

  * Long-term, stable role (40 hours/week)

  * Direct work with the founder + ops team

  * Remote, flexible schedule with PH overlap

  * Competitive salary

  * Opportunities to grow into Lead/Senior roles

  * A chance to own major parts of a platform used by hundreds of businesses

* * *

## **How to Apply**

Send us:

  1. A brief intro

  2. Resume or LinkedIn

  3. GitHub or code samples

  4. A short explanation of a difficult bug you fixed

  5. Experience with NestJS, React, and Stripe

  6. Expected monthly salary

  7. Availability to start

Email: **brad@enrollio.ai**  
Subject: **Senior Full-Stack Engineer – Enrollio**

* * *
jobCategory: 全栈开发,后端开发,前端开发,DevOps/MLOps,技术支持

postTitle: Remote Inside Sales
descContent:
Account Executive - Inside Sales  
**About US  
  
** We are a financial services start up focusing on helping US consumers
improve their credit.  
  
Here you can feel good about helping people while working from home and
earning a generous commission package.  
  
We offer a $1,000 USD training draw for your first month, no lead costs, and
tons of growth opportunity.  
  
If you are a seasoned Sales Professional with near native English language
proficiency, we want to hear from you!**  
**  
**Compensation  
  
** This is a 100% commission role (draw or commission, whichever is higher)  
  
OTE (first year) for top reps is $4,500/Month  
  
Average OTE (first year) is $3,000/Month**  
  
**  
**What will you be doing?  
  
** Help inbound callers understand their credit situation and provide
consultations with the goal of enrolling them in one of our services should
they be a good fit.  
**  
What will make you successful?**  
  
You will be directly compensated for your ability to help meet business
targets: daily KPI goals, clients assisted, and revenue collected.  
  
Goal Oriented – self-starters who can meet and exceed sales goals  
  
Learners – always looking to improve and grow  
  
Tech savvy – able to navigate digital tools

* * *
jobCategory: 销售,金融,客户服务,咨询

postTitle: 【硬核兼】全栈能力，嵌入工程师，音视频底层 + Gemini Live API 多模态打样 (POV 视觉方向)
jobTitle: 全栈开发工程师（嵌入式+AI方向）
descContent:
【核心任务】

硬件调通：实现 App 稳定调取外置 UVC 摄像头流。

AI 集成：对接 Google Gemini Multimodal Live API (WebSocket)，实现实时视频帧发送与语音回传。

屏幕联动：利用 MediaProjection 权限抓取手机屏幕（如导航/订单界面），实现“外部视角+手机内部屏幕”双流识别。

后台运行：确保在手机锁屏或切换到第三方 App 时，AI 语音交互不断线。

【对你的期待】

精通 Android ios原生开发，有处理 UVC 驱动或 Camera2 接口的实战经验。

熟悉音视频推流（WebRTC/WebSocket）及图像压缩处理。

对大模型 API 接入有经验者优先。

能够接受“快速迭代、小步快跑”的打样逻辑，UI 只要能用就行，重点在底层逻辑稳定性。

【合作方式】

性质：远程兼职，项目制交付。

周期：预计 1-2 周内跑通 MVP 流程。

预算：专项协调，如全栈¥8000 - ¥12000（根据实现质量和进度可谈，支持阶段性分批支付）。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,客户端开发,AI,算法,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: 【兼职顾问】高级RAG算法专家/架构师
descContent:
我们目前正在研发一款面向律师群体的“AI知识库”产品（类法律网盘+RAG问答）。 内部技术团队为 Java 背景（Spring AI + Spring Alibaba + Elasticsearch），AI 落地经验尚浅。项目处于从 0 到 1 的关键架构设计与 MVP 落地阶段。
----------
【我们需要您做什么】 
1，您可以写代码，也可以不写。
    可以不要求您全职写代码，而是需要您的经验与视野（每周 2-4 小时远程会议/文档评审）：
2，架构把关： 评审我们的 RAG 技术路径图（包括数据解析、切片策略、混合检索、重排序等环节），指出潜在坑点。
3，技术选型： 针对法律场景，推荐最合适的开源模型（如 Embedding/Rerank 模型选型）、工具链（如 PDF 解析工具、向量库配置）。
4，难点攻关： 针对“表格解析”、“长文本检索准确率低”、“引用溯源”等具体痛点提供成熟的解决思路。
5，团队指导： 协助内部 Java 团队理解 AI 工程化逻辑，指导 Prompt 优化策略。

【对您的要求】
1，硬性要求： 拥有搜索推荐或 NLP 算法落地经验，熟悉 LLM RAG 完整链路。
2，实战经验： 必须亲自落地过基于 LangChain/LlamaIndex/Spring AI 或自研框架的 RAG 项目，熟悉 Elasticsearch 混合检索、BGE/M3 等模型调优。
3，技术栈： 熟悉 Python AI 生态，若了解 Java/Spring AI 生态更佳（便于沟通）。
4，加分项： 有法律、金融或企业级知识库项目经验者优先。

【合作方式】
1，方式： 远程兼职、偶尔现场（均可），按时薪或月度顾问费结算。
2，周期： 预计 1-3 个月（视项目进展可长期）。
3，保密： 需保密
salary: 按时薪或月度顾问费结算
jobCategory: 算法,AI,咨询,DevOps/MLOps,项目管理

postTitle: 【远程/长期】视频剪辑（月薪5k+）
descContent:
💡 项目简介
我正在经营一个专注于宇宙/天文/硬核科普领域的自媒体频道。内容具有较高的视觉要求，旨在通过震撼的画面带观众探索星辰大海。目前需要寻找一位对宇宙充满好奇心、视觉表现力强的视频剪辑助理。

📌 工作内容
核心任务： 负责频道长视频的后期制作（视频长度通常在 5-15 分钟）。

协作模式： 我提供完整的文案剧本和录音音频；你负责素材搜集（影视/模拟动画/实拍）、画面剪辑、特效花字、BGM 适配及字幕。

更新节奏： 每周产出一期高质量视频。

✅ 岗位要求
审美过硬： 宇宙题材需要极强的画面表现力，要求能精准找素材，且画面调色、构图大气震撼。

工具熟练： 熟练使用 PR、AE（能做简单空间特效加分）、Final Cut 或剪映专业版。

逻辑感： 能理解天文科普文案，用画面精准匹配科学概念。

靠谱守时： 接受远程协作模式，不消失，按时交付。

💰 薪资待遇
固定月薪：5000 元/月（按每周一更计算）。

增长空间： 如果你能力非常突出、审美惊艳且合作愉快，薪资完全可以再商量，我也非常愿意为顶尖才华支付更高的报酬。

试剪说明： 筛选简历后，我会邀请候选人进行一段 1-2 分钟的付费试剪（试剪表现好直接入职）。

🚀 如何申请
请发送以下信息至 邮箱：

作品集： 请务必附上 1-2 个你最满意的长视频作品（如果有科普或视觉大片类作品优先）。

个人简介： 简单介绍你的剪辑经历和目前的可支配时间。

对宇宙题材的理解： 简单聊聊你对制作这类视频的视觉想法。谢谢！
jobCategory: 视频剪辑,内容创作,设计
