postTitle: CUSTOMER SUCCESS MANAGER (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
jobTitle: CUSTOMER SUCCESS MANAGER (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
descContent:
**SalesCloser.ai currently has the position of****Customer Success
Manager****available, and we’re excited to tell you about it!**

  

**OVERVIEW**

We are searching for a Customer Success Manager to join our team on a full-
time basis. This new role is a fully remote position, and the successful
individual could be based anywhere in the world; however, the preferred
working time zone must be Pacific Time. Overseeing our small Sales Closer
Customer Success Team, this position will work closely with all teams to
ensure the success of our Partners. Together with all Teams, the Customer
Success Manager is responsible for the continued success of Salescloser.ai

  

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

• Initially reporting to the VP of Sales, partner closely with Sales and
Product teams to ensure customer success goals align with business objectives.

• Lead the design and execution of customer success strategies that enhance
user adoption, engagement, and retention across the customer lifecycle.

• Drive customer value realization by implementing programs that increase
product usage, customer satisfaction, and lifetime value.

• Collaborate cross-functionally to identify opportunities that improve the
customer journey and reduce churn.

• Act as the voice of the customer, ensuring feedback from customer
interactions is shared with internal teams to support continuous improvement.

• Foster a customer-first culture across all teams by promoting
accountability, empathy, and proactive problem-solving.

• Oversee support operations, ensuring fast resolution times, scalability of
help channels, and continuous improvement of customer experience.

• Manage key accounts and at-risk customers, implementing strategies to
strengthen relationships and maximize renewals.

• Develop and monitor KPIs for success metrics, including NPS, retention,
expansion revenue, and time-to-value.

• Own and manage the customer success budget, optimizing resources for maximum
efficiency and impact.

• Collaborate with Product and Data teams to conduct customer insights and
feedback analysis, driving actionable improvements.

• Support, mentor, and grow a high-performing Customer Success organization,
including Account Managers, Support Specialists, and Success Managers.

• Recruit, coach, and empower team members, fostering professional growth and
operational excellence.

• Cultivate a culture of collaboration, transparency, and integrity that
drives both team and customer loyalty.

• Perform other leadership duties as required to ensure customer satisfaction,
team performance, and business success.

• Other duties as assigned.

  

**QUALIFICATIONS**

• A minimum of 5-7 years of experience in Customer Success, Account
Management, or a related role within a SaaS environment

• Strong leadership, coaching, and stakeholder management skills

• A degree or diploma that contributes to the organization is considered an
asset

• Experience in sales is considered an asset

• Capacity to manage global teams and complex projects seamlessly

• Must be detail-oriented, creative and have a passion for helping partners
and Team Members achieve their goals

• Self-motivated with the ability to establish and maintain solid
relationships through a client-first mentality

• Must be technical, analytical, results-driven and have the ability to
multitask in a fast-paced environment

• Organized, administratively strong, and have solid writing, phone, and
general communication skills

• Strong analytical and troubleshooting abilities to handle escalated issues
and develop creative solutions for customers.

• Excellent communication skills, with the ability to provide clear,
empathetic guidance to customers and constructive feedback to team members.

• Deeply committed to customer satisfaction, capable of fostering a service-
first culture within the team.

• Fluent in English (spoken and written); knowledge of an additional language
is an asset.

**WORK ENVIRONMENT**

• Given the nature of this role, it is expected that the successful candidate
will provide their own workstation, computer, headset, and have a fast and
reliable internet connection. This position may be required to download and
utilize company software.

• Due to the nature of this role, we may verify backgrounds, including
conducting employment reference, criminal record and credit checks.

• Once hired, the successful candidate must provide a valid government-issued
photo ID as part of their onboarding process.

• The individual must be prepared to work standard business hours based on
Pacific time.

  

**GREAT REASONS TO APPLY FOR THIS ROLE**

• Fully remote position allowing you to **work from your home anywhere in the
world !**

• Exciting and dynamic environment with a great leadership team

• Comprehensive training program and regular performance reviews to facilitate
your success

• Competitive compensation based on experience and proven abilities

• Great referral programs with incentives and bonuses

• Unbelievable product discounts when you use our products for your own
business

• A global workforce of multi-cultural and talented colleagues

• A close-knit operation with amazing growth opportunities for your personal
development

• Corporate headquarters in beautiful Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

  

**ABOUT US**

SalesCloser is an advanced conversational AI platform that acts as a virtual
sales agent, capable of delivering personalized sales calls, demos, and
follow-ups in real time and in multiple languages. The platform enables
businesses to automate and scale their sales operations, improving efficiency,
reducing hiring costs, and driving higher conversion rates.

  

Powered by advanced AI technology and a growing portfolio of patent
applications, SalesCloser delivers a scalable, high-margin solution designed
to redefine how companies engage with buyers and customers across a range of
business interactions.

  

For more information, visit the SalesCloser website at:
[https://salescloser.ai](https://salescloser.ai/).

  

**APPLICATION PROCESS**

**If you are interested in applying for this exciting opportunity, please
provide an updated resume in English (PDF or Word formats only), quoting the
position title in the subject line of your cover letter.**

[SalesCloser.ai](http://SalesCloser.ai) is an equal-opportunity employer
committed to hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture
that does not discriminate on the basis of disability, status, or any other
basis protected under legislation

We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position;
however, due to the volume of applications we receive, we are unable to
respond to phone, email, or agency inquiries.

  

**Internal Applications close on Monday, December 29, 2025, at 4:00 pm Pacific
Time**

postTitle: 优创软件开发招聘Java应用软件开发工程师
descContent:
公司简介：



昆明优创软件开发有限公司成立于2025年7月15日，是中卓集团旗下子公司，坐落于“美丽春城”昆明。在两家上市公司和一家上市药业公司创始人刘源老先生带领下，已从小型公司发展壮大为大型上市公司，在职员工499人，469人参加社保，实际控股人8人。



公司核心团队由热衷技术、充满激情与创新精神的工程师组成，具备深厚行业知识与丰富经验，能为客户提供优质服务。研发团队持续探索新网络科技趋势，确保产品和服务处于行业前沿。



主要业务涵盖品牌官网搭建、网上商城、小程序、APP开发及自媒体运营等。借助先进网络科技，助力客户优化业务流程、提升运营效率、保障数据安全。解决方案广泛应用于金融、挂号叫号、教育、零售等行业，获客户信任与好评。



企业文化秉持“创新、协作、客户至上”。坚信唯有不断创新，方能在瞬息万变的市场中站稳脚跟，鼓励员工积极提想法建议，推动公司发展。强调团队协作，认可集体力量无穷。始终将客户需求置于首位，竭力提供超客户期望的服务，致力于推动数字化世界共同进步，为客户提供更优案例解决方案。 





岗位职责：



1. 负责软件项目的需求分析、设计、开发、测试及部署等工作，确保项目质量与进度；

2. 参与软件项目的技术选型、架构设计和技术难题攻关；

3. 按照项目要求编写相关技术文档，包括但不限于需求分析、设计文档、测试文档等；

4. 参与代码审查，提高代码质量，确保代码的可维护性和可扩展性；

5. 配合产品、测试、运维团队，保证项目的顺利交付和稳定运行；

6. 对现有软件产品进行维护和优化，提高产品性能和用户体验；

7. 积极参与技术交流和分享，提高个人和团队的技术能力。

任职要求：



1. 本科或专科以上学历，计算机相关专业，2-3年及以上软件开发经验；

2. 熟练掌握至少一门编程语言，如Java、Python、C++、C#等；

3. 熟悉常用数据库，如MySQL、Oracle、MongoDB等；

4. 熟悉常用开发框架，如Spring、Django、React等；

5. 熟悉软件开发流程和项目管理方法，具备良好的代码规范和文档编写能力；

6. 具备良好的团队协作和沟通能力，能承受工作压力，有责任心；

7. 有大型项目开发经验、开源项目贡献者优先。

薪资待遇：五险一金，绩效奖金，月底业绩，零食下午茶，管理规范，法定节假日休息，周六周日双休，加班补贴 ，高温补贴 ，话补，美女帅哥超多很好相处
salary: 五险一金，绩效奖金，双休
jobCategory: 后端开发,全栈开发

postTitle: next.js-api方式支付集成paypal
descContent:
需要经验的一位伙伴，一定要有经验，【api集成过 paypal】，没有接入过的勿扰；谢谢！

1、项目是next.js 需要接入 paypal api
2、项目类似于电商平台，目前支付系统已经做好，已经接入过其他支付平台，购物车的数据都有
3、目前需要在用户点击 Check out 的时候（之前是点击支付直接到 Stripe支付页面），目前一点需要弹一个选择的窗口，分别是 Stripe 和 Paypal； 点击 Paypal之后的逻辑需要新开发；

开发内容：
1、点击 Check out  的弹窗选择，点击Stripe走之前逻辑，点击 Paypal走新开发的逻辑；
2、目前Paypal商户测试环境的key都准备好了，需要现在支付对接Paypal；（一定要有经验）；

要求：
1、熟悉next.js
2、认真，负责
3、需要在周日前完成
4、完成后付款

预算：1000RMB，或者私聊详谈。如果提前完成有不少于300奖励。


后续：如果做的棒的同学可以长期合作。或转为远程全职。

postTitle: Virtual Assistant (Bilingual with Vietnamese and English Required)
jobTitle: Virtual Assistant (Bilingual with Vietnamese and English Required)
descContent:
We are seeking a **Virtual Legal Assistant** to join our fully remote team.
This position is perfect for a highly organized and detail-oriented
professional who thrives in a fast-paced legal environment and wants to
contribute to the success of a growing modern legal practice. **Fluency in
both Vietnamese (spoken and written) and English is required.** Candidates who
can speak and understand all three Vietnamese dialects (Northern, Central, and
Southern) are strongly encouraged to apply. **Experience working with a North
American law firm is a significant advantage.** The role requires availability
to work **Monday through Friday, from 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM Eastern Standard
Time.**

**Key Responsibilities**

  * **Calendar & Schedule Management:** Coordinate and manage appointments, court dates, and internal meetings. Ensure efficient time allocation and avoid scheduling conflicts.
  * **Document & File Management:** Maintain electronic files, organize legal documents, and manage case-related databases.
  * **Legal Forms & Templates:** Draft, edit, and maintain legal templates and forms to align with firm standards.
  * **Client Intake:** Assist with onboarding new clients by collecting and organizing essential information and documentation.
  * **Correspondence & Communication:** Prepare and format legal letters, memos, emails, and other professional communication.
  * **Legal Research:** Conduct online research including public records and legal databases as needed.

**Soft Skills We Value**

  * Strong verbal and written communication skills
  * Flexible, adaptable, and eager to learn
  * Professional, client-service mindset
  * Proactive and responsive in a fast-paced, changing environment
  * Collaborative team player with the ability to work independently

**Hard Skills & Qualifications**

  * Fluent in **English and Vietnamese** (spoken and written) – **Required**
  * Minimum of **2 years** of experience in a legal assistant, administrative support, or logistics coordination role (remote experience preferred)
  * Strong time-management, prioritization, and organizational skills
  * Proficiency with legal or office management software and tools
  * Ability to tailor and modify templates for a variety of legal needs

* * *
jobCategory: 法务,客户服务,项目管理

postTitle: Managing Editor
descContent:
**The role:**

We're looking for an **exceptional Managing Editor** with strong
organizational skills to own content production operations using GrowthX
Pipelines. You'll produce content end-to-end, evaluate and improve workflows,
and ensure every deliverable meets our quality bar before it ships.

You'll partner closely with Directors and Account Strategists who own client
relationships and set priorities, then execute flawlessly to deliver client-
ready content on schedule.

Your editorial judgment is paramount. While you'll leverage powerful AI
workflows to produce content, your value lies in your ability to edit,
rewrite, and polish content to a high bar of quality.

You understand how AI works and will help shape our systems to get closer to
100% perfect outputs with each iteration, consistently reducing work for
yourself and others by articulating improvements that make the GrowthX product
better.

For this role, we ask that you’re available Monday to Friday, from **8:00 AM
to 12:00 PM PST.**

## **What You'll Do**

  * **Shape assignments from strategy into detailed briefs** that AI can execute with structure, research, angle, keywords, and CTAs. Making them clear enough that outputs need minimal editing and connect to outcomes customers care about.

  * **Execute content production through AI pipelines** : manage inputs, context, and artifacts for each workflow and review research outputs before content generation. Own content creation from draft through to published state.

  * **Maintain the quality bar** by ensuring everything published exceeds customer standards, catching issues before customers see them, maintaining brand voice and accuracy, and knowing when to ship and when to refine.

  * **Analyze content performance** to identify what's actually driving results, spot patterns in what works, recommend doubling down on winners, and feed insights back to Account Strategists.

  * **Shape the design of AI workflows** to produce better outputs over time by refining context, suggesting changes to improve quality, documenting what works and what doesn't, and pushing systems closer to 100% perfect outputs.

  * **Identify automation opportunities** in existing content processes and implement solutions that eliminate manual work and increase efficiency.

  * **Collaborate with Account Strategists and team members** to implement workflow solutions that meet specific client needs and content requirements.

## **What We're Looking For**

  * **Editorial taste and judgment** : You know what good content looks like, can tell when something will work for an audience, have a quality bar you enforce, and know the difference between perfect and good enough.

  * **Obsessed with what actually works** : You watch performance, notice patterns, see which topics and formats drive results, understand SEO and AEO deeply, and connect the dots that move the needle for brand visibility and organic growth.

  * **Speed without sacrificing quality** : You know which details matter, batch similar work, use systems and templates, and don't waste time on things that don't impact the reader or results.

  * **Deep understanding of how AI works** : Not just "I use ChatGPT." You understand prompts, context windows, artifacts, input shaping, when AI will struggle vs. excel, and you're obsessed with making AI better through better inputs and workflows.

  * **Systems thinker** : You don't just fix individual outputs. You look for patterns, figure out what's causing consistent issues, improve the inputs and document what works so it compounds.

  * **Obsessed with the details that matter** : You catch things others miss, ensure accuracy and brand consistency, but you're pragmatic about what deserves attention.

  * **Care about outcomes, not just outputs** : You want content that drives results for customers and understand that technically perfect content that doesn't perform is still a failure.

  * **Experience with SEO tools and platforms** (Ahrefs, SEMrush, Google Analytics, Search Console) including hands-on keyword research and on-page optimization.

  * **Analytical mindset** with proven ability to identify process inefficiencies, diagnose root causes, and implement practical solutions.

## Nice To Have

  * Experience with content management systems (WordPress, Webflow, etc.) and publishing platforms.

  * Background in content operations or editorial workflow management.

  * Familiarity with project management tools (Asana, Linear, ClickUp).

* * *
jobCategory: 内容创作,运营,AI,项目管理

postTitle: xWow-下一代媒体创作平台-产品方向的UIUX招聘
descContent:
Hi，我们是xWoW，由导演+互联网创业者+技术宅组建的创新小组，致力于打造一个服务于AI原住民的内容生产与价值流转平台。
我们正在找一个偏产品的Designer（全职或兼职）加入我们，作为我们的早期团队成员。

**我们的目前状态：**
我们在快马加鞭的完善主流程的落地，预计在1个月内主线功能能完成。

**我们需要“你”是这样的一个画像：**
我们不需要10 年大厂经验，但我们需要的是直觉、审美和野心。
Gen Z Native：你大概率在30岁以下，你是AI的原住民，你反感传统软件那种沉闷功能排版和颜色。
审美洁癖与先锋派：你喜欢的是类似于Shopify Editions之类的充满设计感，甚至 Web3的那些那种大胆、高饱和、高对比度的视觉冲击力。你敢在复杂的网站功能里做减法，引入“潮牌”元素。
产品思维 (PM + UI)：我们没有专职 PM，你就是产品设计师。我们一起讨论关于产品的每个方面，然后你需要自己梳理 User Flow，画出Wireframe，最后输出像素完美的 UI。
AI Cyborg：你是一个“赛博格”。你日常习惯使用AI梳理逻辑，在工作中熟练使用AI工具。你拥抱AI，它是你的一部份。
Global Vision：你的信息源来自 X (Twitter)、Product Hunt、Dribbble 和 Awwwards。你有良好的英语阅读能力，了解硅谷和全球最新的设计趋势。

**你要做什么？**
定义视觉语言：从 0 到 1 打造属于我们的 Design System。
全链路设计：负责从需求梳理、交互逻辑到高保真 UI 的全过程。
参与并优化工作流：将复杂的 AI 视频生成参数，转化为直观、优雅的可视化组件。

**硬性要求：**
产品线稿思考到UI UX作品集，作品集里有体现你复杂逻辑的处理能力和独特视觉张力的设计，或者是你的思考。
精通工作软件，熟练使用AI融入工作流程。
极强的自驱力（远程办公，结果导向）。

**我们目前能提供什么？**
100% Remote：全球任何地方办公，只要你有网，如果Base的话，上海是个好的选择。
直接沟通：没有层级，没有废话，高效决策。
薪资：面议，我们希望你热爱这份创造的工作，同时我们也为你的能力匹配相对应的薪资。
是否兼职：如果你现在有工作，但是你的作品让我们惊艳，同时你也喜欢我们做的事情，我们也欢迎兼职。
jobCategory: UI&UX,设计,产品经理,内容创作

postTitle: [招聘 | 远程全职 | 年总包 50~150w] 后端开发 和 机器学习工程师 - 新加坡初创
jobTitle: 后端开发 和 机器学习工程师
descContent:
关于我们：

Atria 是⼀家强大的由 AI 驱动的⼴告创意⼯作流平台，和顶级营销团队有广泛合作，如 Ryze Superfoods 、Solawave 、Loop
Earplugs 等品牌，以及 Power Digital 、Inspire Digital 、Disruptive Digital 等领先代理商都使用
Atria 进行增收，通过发布更多成功广告来实现增长。

关于团队：

• 全远程团队，⽆地点限制，最好位于亚太时区以便于沟通

• 团队成员主要来⾃腾讯、字节、微软、亚⻢逊等国内外知名⼤⼚

• ⽇常开发以中⽂为主，灵活使⽤英语进⾏跨国协作

[岗位一] Senior/Expert 后端工程师；年总包 50-150w ，同时覆盖高级和专家两个级别

职位概述：

我们正在招聘 ⾼级/专家 后端⼯程师加⼊我们的远程团队。作为核⼼后端⼯程师，你将负责设计和维护公司核⼼的后端服务与应⽤，确保产品快速迭代与持续交付。

职位职责：

• 设计、开发及维护⾼质量的 Python 应⽤和后端服务。

• 与跨职能团队紧密协作，共同定义产品需求、设计并发布新功能。

• 保障应⽤程序的性能、质量及响应能⼒。

• 快速识别并修复性能瓶颈和软件缺陷。

• 协助维护代码质量、项⽬结构及⾃动化流程。

任职要求：

• 计算机科学、软件⼯程或相关专业本科及以上学历。

• 5 年以上后端开发经验，熟悉 Python 。

• 熟悉 FastAPI 或其他类似的 Python 框架。

• 熟练使⽤ MySQL 或类似的数据库。

• 熟悉 Elasticsearch ，并具备搜索与数据分析⽅⾯经验。

• 熟悉云服务，如 AWS Lambda, SQS, S3, CloudFront 等。

• 有优秀的问题解决能⼒，能独⽴⾼效进⾏远程⼯作。

• 有良好的沟通能⼒和团队协作精神。

• 具备基本的英语⼝语表达能⼒，能进⾏⽇常沟通。

[岗位二] Senior 机器学习/深度学习工程师；年薪 80-150w

职位概述：

掌握端到端机器学习流程：从问题定义、数据管道搭建，到模型训练、评估及生产环境部署。你将打造稳定可靠的系统，推动核心指标提升——而非仅交付模型本身。

职位职责：

• 将产品问题转化为机器学习解决方案及可量化目标。

• 搭建可靠的数据管道与特征工程，保障数据质量。

• 训练、评估深度学习/机器学习模型，并持续迭代优化。

• 将模型落地生产（含 API 接口/批处理任务），监控模型性能并持续改进。

• 与产品、设计及工程团队紧密协作，快速交付有影响力的成果。

任职要求：

• 扎实的工程能力：熟练掌握 Python 语言，具备软件设计、测试、代码评审及性能优化经验。

• 扎实掌握机器学习基础（监督/无监督学习）、深度学习知识及模型评估方法。

• 具备 MLOps 工具使用经验（含实验跟踪、持续集成/持续部署、容器技术、云计算）。

• 熟练使用至少一种主流云计算平台（ AWS/GCP/Azure ）。

• 具备基础英语读写说能力，可应对技术文档相关工作。

加分项：

• 产品思维：能够界定最小可行产品（ MVP ）范围，在模型准确率与运行速度间做合理权衡，并制定清晰的成功指标。

• 大语言模型（ LLM ）相关经验：包括提示词工程 / 检索增强、模型微调、模型蒸馏、推理优化。

• 广告领域经验：涉及广告排序 / 创意优化、归因分析或竞价系统。

我们提供：

• 弹性远程⼯作模式，⿎励深度⼯作与异步协作

• 具有市场竞争⼒的薪资福利

• ⼩团队⾼所有权，直接参与关键路线图与技术决策

• 与前沿⽣成式 AI / ⼴告技术同频成⻓的机会

• 丰富的职业发展通道，与公司共同成⻓

应聘方式：

投递简历至邮箱，邮件标题和简历命名皆为：

姓名 - Backend （ Senior ）-来自 V2EX or

姓名 - Backend （ Expert ）-来自 V2EX or

姓名 - Machine Learning -来自 V2EX
jobCategory: 后端开发,AI,算法,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency at SafetyWing
jobTitle: The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency at SafetyWing
descContent:
### 🏅 How will we choose the winner?

We are looking for someone who’s not afraid of getting vulnerable and sharing
their story with the SafetyWing community and beyond. If you have always
dreamt of sustaining a digital nomadic lifestyle, we want to hear from you!

  
**Requirements**

You should:

  * Be 18+
  * Have a story, not a résumé — we want your honesty, not perfection
  * Be willing to share parts of your journey (photos, reflections, updates)
  * Be comfortable being featured in SafetyWing content (social, blog, newsletter)
  * Have the ability to take time off / work remotely during the project period
  * Hold a passport valid for at least 6 months 

  
**How We’ll Choose the Winner**

We will look for someone who:

  * Has a clear “why.” A genuine desire for change, adventure, or reinvention
  * Shows vulnerability. We want to hear your story!
  * Shows commitment to embarking on this digital nomad journey
  * Has a story that resonates. Something others can see themselves in
  * Has curiosity. People who think deeply about life, who question norms

We’re not picking the person with the most likes or the prettiest video.  
We’re picking the one whose story moves us, and the one we can genuinely help
take their next step.

_  
  
_🚀 We look forward to hearing from you!  
  
  
**Personal Data consent:**  
By applying to this contest, you give your consent for us to process your
personal data for the following purposes:

  * Using the information you provide to process your application for this contest. 
  * Get exciting updates on our upcoming campaigns, product updates and new product releases.

_You can always withdraw your consent by sending an email to_[
_dpo@safetywing.com_](mailto:dpo@safetywing.com) _or clicking our Unsubscribe
button in any of our marketing/campaign emails._

Calling all current and aspiring digital nomads: your dream opportunity is
waiting!  
  

SafetyWing is funding one persons next global adventure with up to $4,000 in
reimbursements to help you on your journey as a digital nomad.  
  

Whether you are a seasoned world explorer or someone who has always dreamt of
far-off places, this could be your moment! The only requirement to apply is a
deep desire to travel widely and live freely.  
  
**Who is SafetyWing?**

SafetyWing envisions a world where borderless living is accessible and safe.
We want to unlock your global aspirations by helping you explore the world,
with the peace of mind that comes with knowing you’re in good hands.

### 🌎 What’s in it for you:

  * Support to build your ideal version of freedom worth US$4,000 (think flights, accommodations, skill building and more)
  * Mentorship from the SafetyWing team (learn from other nomads!)
  * Guidance on visas, insurance, budgeting, and logistics
  * Access to our global community

  
**What your US$4,000 reward could cover:**

_Reimbursed only — you must show proof of every expense._

  * Flights to your chosen destination 
  * Accommodation for your first month 
  * Coworking pass or workspace setup 
  * Local transport, SIM card, and basic setup costs 
  * Skill-building or career growth 
  * Work tools/equipment needed to support your nomad adventure 
  * Visa fees or document renewals
  * Any practical relocation cost directly tied to starting or upgrading your nomad life 

  
🧪 Important guidelines

  * No cash is given directly
  * We reimburse up to US$4,000 only for approved, proven costs. Anything above $4,000 and/or anything without proper receipts will not be reimbursed
  * You must keep all receipts
  * Everything must be tied to starting or sustaining your digital nomad life

### 📝 How to apply

Tell us your story!  
  

Submit:

  1. A 1–2 minute long video to introduce yourself, and tell us why we should fund your adventure. Post the video to any of your socials (LinkedIn, Instagram orTikTok), tag us, and link it below. Don’t submit the application without linking to your video. Some things you might want to tell us:
     * Why you’re excited about the The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency (required)
     * What’s your “I need a new life” moment?
     * Why are you drawn to the digital nomad lifestyle?
     * What’s the funniest, weirdest, or most chaotic sign the universe gave you to apply?
     * What version of you are you trying to unlock with this opportunity?
     * What would winning this unlock that you can’t unlock alone right now?
     * If your future self could send you one message, what would they say?
     * Which part of your story makes you think: “Yeah… they should pick me”?
     * Why do you think the world needs your story right now?
     * What’s the most chaotic thing about you that secretly makes you a great nomad candidate?
  2. Answer a few written questions
  3. Tell us how you’d spend $4,000 towards your dream life
  4. Upload a résumé
jobCategory: 内容创作,市场营销,项目管理,用户增长,客户服务

postTitle: Enterprise Account Manager at Metabase
descContent:
Metabase is the easiest way for people to get insights from their data, from
tiny startups who get up and running quickly to major corporations with tens
of thousands of users. That's why people [love
us](https://www.metabase.com/love).

  

We bring data tools with the elegance and simplicity of consumer products to
the crufty world of enterprise business intelligence. We provide an
opinionated open source starting point for how companies should measure,
analyze and share their data, which is used by tens of thousands of companies.

  

Metabase is looking for our first Account Manager to support our new cross
sell motion. We have recently released Metabot, our new AI product, and
releasing some even bigger things next year that are primed to make some
splashes. We have thousands of customers today that we think will gain a lot
of value from these products and are searching for the initial team that will
help build and run the new selling motion.

This is a 0-1 type of role that doesn’t have existing process today. You will
be supported as we build things out, but the role will demand building out
process, designing playbooks, in addition to managing and closing pipeline.

It will undoubtedly be an exciting thing to work on as it could be a key part
of our next phase of growth.

Metabase is looking for our first Account Manager to support our new cross
sell motion. We have recently released Metabot, our new AI product, and
releasing some even bigger things next year that are primed to make some
splashes. We have thousands of customers today that we think will gain a lot
of value from these products and are searching for the initial team that will
help build and run the new selling motion.

This is a 0-1 type of role that doesn’t have existing process today. You will
be supported as we build things out, but the role will demand building out
process, designing playbooks, in addition to managing and closing pipeline.

It will undoubtedly be an exciting thing to work on as it could be a key part
of our next phase of growth.

### What you’ll do:

* Define and build target account plans
* Build and refine new product positioning
* Manage pipeline from creation to close

### What we’re looking for:

* Experience being the first person in a role of its kind at a company
* Ability to iterate on technical product messaging
* Ability to manage an active opportunity pipeline
* Experience assisting customers with technical proof of concepts
* Familiarity with tooling that will help with the job: Clay, Unify, Salesforce, etc.

### Qualities we look for:

* Ownership
* Comfortable with experiments
* Strong ability to sell
* Technical aptitude

**If there's anything more you'd like to tell us about you or your interests,
use the "additional information" section on the application page. We are real
humans looking at applications and we love to hear what you have to say!**

  

We're a global team (50% outside the US), fully distributed (from Thailand to
California), who get things done asynchronously, with plenty of uninterrupted
time, supporting each other to do the best work of our careers. We offer
flexibility (define your own schedule and work from wherever you want),
autonomy, and an environment that fosters growth, learning, and development.
We're relentlessly user-focused and believe in building long-term value, not
short-term hacks. And we raised a $30M Series B to take our approach to the
next level for years to come.

  

For U.S. applicants: Metabase participates in the federal E-Verify program,
which confirms employment authorization of newly hired U.S. based employees.
E-Verify is not used as a tool to pre-screen candidates and is only initiated
upon hire.

Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/EVerifyParticipationPoster.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

[Right to Work
Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/IER_RightToWorkPoster%20Eng_Es.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

postTitle: Video Editor at Chili Piper
descContent:
### **About Chili Piper**

Chili Piper is a B2B SaaS startup. Our product helps clients turn inbound
leads into qualified meetings instantly, helping revenue teams connect to
buyers faster. We are a fully remote global team dedicated to solving
interesting problems, helping others, and having fun.

We’re growing fast and we're ready to take over the world (in the most civil
and appropriate way possible, of course).

### **Job description**

At Chili Piper, video is becoming a core GTM asset. Not just a format, but a
powerful way to explain our product, build trust with our audience, and
support revenue across the funnel. In 2026, our goal is to build a strong in-
house video capability that supports brand, demand, product, sales, and events
in a consistent and strategic way.

We’re hiring a **Video Editor / Video Content Lead** to own video and help
turn what we build, launch, and experience into clear, high-impact video
assets. This role reports to **Rox, VP of Marketing** , and works closely with
Product Marketing, Sales, Leadership, and Events.

**Role overview**

As a Video Editor at Chili Piper, you’ll:

  * own video editing as a core GTM capability in 2026

  * support brand, product, demand, sales, and events with video

  * turn launches, product updates, customer stories, and events into reusable assets

  * help make Chili Piper’s products easier to understand through clear visual storytelling

  * document Chili Piper: capture our product, people, culture, leadership, and GTM evolution through video

### **What we’re looking for**

We’re looking for someone with strong video editing skills and a clean, modern
style, who’s comfortable working on both short-form and long-form video. You
know how to turn raw footage into clear, on-brand stories, you work fast
without sacrificing quality, and you’re reliable and detail-oriented. You’re
also comfortable collaborating closely with Marketing, Product Marketing,
Sales, and Leadership, and you enjoy working in a cross-functional, fast-
moving environment.

**Experience**

You have 2-4 years of experience in video editing or video content roles, with
proven experience editing B2B, product, or brand videos. You can show a strong
portfolio that includes social, product, or event content, and you’re
comfortable using modern video editing tools.  

### **Interview process**

We like to keep things simple and transparent. Here’s what you can expect if
you apply:

**1\. Application review**

We’ll review your background and experience to make sure there’s a good fit
for the role.

**2\. Culture add interview**

A first chat to get to know you: what drives you, how you like to work, and
what unique perspective you’d bring to Chili Piper.

**3\. Assessment**

A short, practical assignment to see how you think and approach real product
marketing challenges. It’s not a test, we just want to see your creativity and
thought process.

**4\. Executive interview**

The final step. We’ll talk about your bigger picture: your passion for tech,
your understanding of our product, and why Chili Piper feels like the right
next step for you.

### **Additional Information**

**Why you'll love being a part of our team:**

Our team loves Chili Piper because [we’re building the company of the future.
](https://www.chilipiper.com/post/company-of-the-future)

  * Work with an immensely talented global team

  * Work in a business that’s run fairly and transparently

  * Competitive pay based on market rate wherever you live

  * We lead by example--showing industry peers and leaders how to innovate, improve, and grow--while having fun

**How we work:**

  * **Freedom and flexibility.** We’re a 100% distributed team working from around the world, and we've been fully remote since 2016.  _**Our team members can work from wherever they want**_ in the world, as long as they show up on our weekly all hands meeting on Zoom.

  * **Solve interesting problems.** The software landscape has exploded. There are dozens of solutions for each problem. We want to be different. We come up with new angles on existing problems or invent better solutions to help companies with their sales and marketing. Then we turn these ideas into beautiful, smart software.

  * **Autonomy and ownership.** Working on a distributed team means you don’t have someone micromanaging you or looking over your shoulder to make sure you’re getting things done. We’re a team of do-ers who take full ownership for their results.

  * **Be helpful.** Our first value as a company is help. Help our customers be successful. Help our prospects get the right information and make the right decision whether or not it includes our products. Help our team members reach their full potential.

**The perks:**

  * Unlimited vacation (and we _do_ mean it, and we _do_ take it!)

  * Generous health, dental, and vision insurance

  * Any equipment/software/tech that you need to do your job

  * Annual professional development stipend of $2,000 USD

  * Equity - all Pipers receive stock options

  * Annual company retreat for a week of bonding and adventure (previous retreat locations include Paris, Morocco, Tulum, Iceland, Ibiza, and India!)
salary: 竞争力薪资，按市场定价

postTitle: SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT  (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
jobTitle: SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT  (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
descContent:
**SalesCloser.ai currently has the position of Solutions Architect available,
and we’re excited to tell you about it!**

  

**OVERVIEW**

We are searching for a Solutions Architect to join our team on a full-time
basis. This is a fully remote position, and the successful individual could be
based anywhere in the world. You will work with an amazing team, building
relationships and ensuring the products and services offered by SalesCloser.ai
are utilized by clients throughout Canada and the US.

  

The Solutions Architect is responsible for showcasing, teaching, and guiding
new customers on how to properly set up and configure AI agents using the
platform. This role does not focus on building every agent on behalf of the
client, but instead ensures customers understand best practices,
configurations, and workflows so they can successfully create and manage their
own AI agents.

  

Acting as a key bridge between Sales, Technical Account Managers, and Customer
Success, this role owns the onboarding experience from kickoff through
handoff, ensuring customers leave onboarding confident, informed, and aligned
with platform standards. In collaboration with the Customer Success
Department, the Solutions Architect is responsible for the success of
SalesCloser.ai.

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

• Lead onboarding sessions that demonstrate how to set up, configure, and
manage AI agents.

• Educate customers on best practices and recommended configurations for
building effective AI agents.

• Help customers translate their business goals into clear agent structures,
prompts, workflows, and inputs.

• Guide clients through onboarding steps while empowering them to complete
configurations independently.

• Set and manage onboarding expectations in collaboration with Sales and
Technical Account Managers.

• Maintain proactive communication with customers, providing updates,
feedback, and clear next steps.

• Collect and validate required information and assets needed for successful
agent creation.

• Oversee onboarding timelines, milestones, and scheduled tasks.

• Ensure onboarding completion meets client expectations and internal quality
standards.

• Identify knowledge gaps and provide additional guidance, training, or
documentation as needed.

• Coordinate a smooth handoff to the Customer Success Team Lead once
onboarding is complete.

• Other duties as assigned

  

**QUALIFICATIONS**

• Minimum 3 years of experience in client onboarding, enablement,
implementation support, or customer success roles.

• Experience teaching or guiding customers through technical or semi-technical
tools.

• Strong ability to explain complex concepts in clear, non-technical language.

• Client-first mindset with strong relationship-building skills.

• Organized, detail-oriented, and comfortable managing multiple onboarding
processes.

• Comfortable working cross-functionally while owning the onboarding
experience.

• As part of a diverse team, the ability to work both independently and
collaboratively in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment

• Organized, administratively strong, great time management, and have solid
writing, phone, and general communication skills

• Fluent in English (spoken and written). Knowledge of a second language is
considered an asset

  

**WORK ENVIRONMENT**

• It is expected that the successful candidate will provide their own
workstation, computer, and headset, and have a fast and reliable internet
connection. Certain roles will be required to utilize and or download company-
approved software.

• The individual must be prepared to work standard business hours on Pacific
Time.

• Due to the nature of this role, we may verify backgrounds, including
conducting employment references, criminal record, and credit checks.

• Once hired, the successful candidate must provide a valid government-issued
photo ID and proof of residential address as part of their onboarding process.

  

**GREAT REASONS TO JOIN OUR TEAM !**

• Fully remote position allowing you to **work from your home anywhere in the
world !**

• Exciting and dynamic environment with a great leadership team

• Comprehensive training program and regular performance reviews to facilitate
your success

• Competitive compensation based on experience and proven abilities

• Great referral programs with incentives and bonuses

• Unbelievable product discounts when you use our products for your own
business

• A global workforce of multi-cultural and talented colleagues

• A close-knit operation with amazing growth opportunities for your personal
development

• Corporate headquarters in beautiful Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

  

**ABOUT US**

SalesCloser is an advanced conversational AI platform that acts as a virtual
sales agent, capable of delivering personalized sales calls, demos, and
follow-ups in real time and in multiple languages. The platform enables
businesses to automate and scale their sales operations, improving efficiency,
reducing hiring costs, and driving higher conversion rates.

  

Powered by advanced AI technology and a growing portfolio of patent
applications, SalesCloser delivers a scalable, high-margin solution designed
to redefine how companies engage with buyers and customers across a range of
business interactions.

  

For more information, visit the SalesCloser website at:
[https://salescloser.ai](https://salescloser.ai/).

  

**APPLICATION PROCESS**

**If you are interested in applying for this exciting opportunity, please
provide an updated resume in English (PDF or Word formats only), quoting the
position title in the subject line of your cover letter**

****

SalesCloser.ai is an equal-opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse
workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture that does not discriminate on
the basis of disability, status, or any other basis protected under
legislation

We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position;
however, due to the volume of applications we receive, we are unable to
respond to phone, email, or agency inquiries.

  

**Internal Applications close on Tuesday, December 23, 2025, at 4:00 pm
Pacific Time**
jobCategory: AI,客户服务,技术支持,项目管理,咨询

postTitle: AI Trainer at Anuttacon
descContent:
🎮 Our Culture:

Our culture thrives on creativity, communication, and collaboration. Around
here, the work is the game. You’ll have fun, make real connections, and
actually see the impact of what you do.

🎮 About Us:

Anuttacon’s mission is to create immersive and personalized virtual worlds
where players can form unique connections and deeper experiences in digital
spaces. We are dedicated to leveraging different perspectives, voices, and
backgrounds to promote a thoughtful and humanistic approach to technology.
Through research-driven and explorative AI, we aim to create real-time
interactions that seamlessly blend text, audio, visuals and beyond.

🎮 About the Role:

We’re looking for individuals with diverse expertise to join our data team as
AI Trainers. In this role, you will directly be involved in improving the
accuracy and performance of our models.

🎮 Responsibilities:

  * Annotate content in a variety of media to support game design, such as dialogues, quests, character interactions, and scenes
  * Ensure accuracy and consistency in the data to optimize players’ gaming experience
  * Support in-depth world building, comprehensive characters, mini-plots, personality profiles, and other relevant details
  * Annotate and evaluate model responses against our evaluation rubrics in an effort to improve dialogue and overall interactions to achieve the best user experience possible
  * Collaborate with our research and product teams to develop state-of-the-art large language models

🎮 About You:

  * Native or fluent in English
  * Have a passion for gaming, especially those experienced in narrative games
  * Strong attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work in a flexible, dynamic environment
  * Ability to follow complex guidelines and apply them consistently
  * Good communication skills; able to give and receive feedback effectively

🎮 Nice to Haves:

  * Degree and/or experience in the following fields are a plus:
  * Storytelling, creative writing, copywriting, or content development
  * Media, film, video, audio, or narrative design
  * Performing arts, voice work, or expressive presentation
  * Marketing, communications, or audience engagement
  * Psychology, philosophy, or other fields focused on human behavior and thought
  * STEM disciplines with a strong emphasis on clarity and structure
  * Previous experience working with AI/ML concepts or working with data analysis, data manipulation, data reporting. 

🎮 Compensation & other expectations:

  * US Hourly rate: $25 (but depending on your role and qualifications). Compensation varies based on location and experience. International rates will differ.
  * Able to dedicate 20-40+ flexible hours per week based on your availability
  * There will be exciting opportunities for bonus and growth!

l 高效实现租房业务核心功能，包括地图找房、房源展示、即时通讯、预约看房等

l 编写清晰技术文档，参与代码评审，共建团队技术质量  
  
岗位要求：  
核心技术能力：  
l 熟练掌握Kotlin，具备Java基础  
l 精通Jetpack Compose或XML布局开发，能高效实现复杂界面与列表  
l 熟悉MVVM架构，能熟练运用ViewModel、LiveData等组件  
l 精通Retrofit + OkHttp网络请求及Moshi/Gson数据解析

l 有高德/百度/腾讯地图SDK集成经验，能实现地图找房、位置标记等功能  
l 有即时通讯SDK（如腾讯云IM、环信等）集成经验者优先  
l 有支付SDK（微信、支付宝）或Webview与H5混合开发经验者优先  
l 具备线上问题排查与性能优化经验，关注应用崩溃率等稳定性指标  
  
重要加分项：  
l 具备Flutter跨平台开发经验，有实际项目开发经历者优先  
l 熟悉Dart语言，了解Flutter框架核心概念和常用组件  
l 有Flutter与原生代码混合开发经验者优先考虑  
l 有租房、房产或生活服务类APP开发经验  
l 了解模块化、组件化开发及Git流程  
  
综合能力：  
l 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历  
l 具备优秀的问题分析、解决能力，对技术有热情  
l 良好的沟通协作精神，能适应快节奏的团队开发  
l 对用户体验敏感，能主动提出产品改进建议  
l 具备AI辅助编程能力，熟悉使用现代编程助手工具（如GitHub Copilot、Cursor、Trae等）提升开发效率  
l 能够有效利用AI工具进行代码生成、调试和优化，并与团队开发流程良好结合

postTitle: (远程 可兼职) 硅谷 GenAI 创业团队招前端，获头部 VC 投资并入选硅谷顶级孵化器 StartX
descContent:
[产品介绍] Zaisland 是一款以 GenAI
驱动的新一代社交平台。通过构建个性化、交互性的社交经历，创造有趣、轻松的社交体验，实现人与人之间的真诚联结，建立多元、活力的社区空间。
产品已完成一轮前期测试，获得头部 VC 投资并入选硅谷顶级孵化器 StartX ，将于今年 2 月在北美首发 Beta 版本。团队成员包括前美元 VC
投资人、互联网大厂产品经理、高级工程师，毕业于 Stanford GSB 、UCSD HCI Lab 、复旦大学。

[职位描述]

  1. 使用 Flutter / React Native / Swift 进行 IOS 应用前端开发, 确保优质的用户体验和性能优化；
  2. 与产品、设计团队协作, 快速实现高质量产品功能；

[职位要求]

  1. 良好的编程习惯, 代码结构清晰, 命名规范；
  2. 熟练掌握 App 开发的主流框架和开发模式；
  3. 具备 3 年+ IOS 开发经验, 能独立开发 iPhone App 者优先；
  4. AI-native ，擅长使用 AI coding 工具提效开发；
  5. 对 GenAI 创业有兴趣，对技术有热情和好奇心，愿意探索 AI 前沿技术并在产品中落地，有长期合作意向优先。
  6. 产品语言为英文，团队成员在国内（上海）、美国（湾区），时间灵活、有一定英文读写能力、人在上海或美国优先。
  7. 团队风格为敏捷开发、快速迭代，需要有较强的协作和沟通能力，有全职工作经验或大厂实习经验者优先。

[薪资回报]

  * 远程工作，早期以兼职的方式双向磨合，优秀者转正
  * 薪资面议，对长期合作伙伴，提供股权激励
  * 可作为核心成员参与项目讨论，收获一段成熟的 AI 项目从 0 到 1 的经验

[投递信息]

  * 投递邮箱： zaisland2024@gmail.com
  * 简历 + 过去作品（附相关技术框架或网页链接）
  * 标题请注明 [看到的渠道] - [公司&岗位&工作经验] / [学校-专业-年级] eg. V2EX- 字节 IOS 工程师 3 年 / 复旦 CS 大四
  * 简要说明你为什么想加入团队，或对相关产品的理解（非必需）

postTitle: 远程 PHP 高级开发工程师（Laravel / Hyperf）：需求 4 名
jobTitle: PHP 高级开发工程师（Laravel / Hyperf）
descContent:
区块链项目  
薪资范围：15-22K （优秀另议）  
  
岗位职责：  
1\. 负责公司核心业务系统的后端设计与开发，参与需求评审、技术方案制定与评  
估；  
2\. 使用 **Laravel 或 Hyperf**（至少精通其中一种）进行业务模块开发、重构与优  
化，保证代码质量与可维护性；  
3\. 参与高并发、高负载场景下的系统设计与性能优化，包括数据库、缓存、队列、  
服务拆分等；  
4\. 编写高质量、可读性强、可扩展的面向对象代码，遵循良好的编码规范及设计模  
式；  
5\. 负责接口设计与开发，编写接口文档，配合前端、测试、运维等同事完成产品迭  
代和上线；  
6\. 对线上系统进行监控与问题排查，快速定位并解决性能瓶颈与线上故障；  
7\. 持续关注并学习业界新技术，在团队内进行技术分享，推动整体技术能力提升。  
  
任职要求：  
1\. 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业优先；**5 年及以上 PHP 后端开发经验**；  
2\. 熟练掌握 PHP7+ / PHP8 语言特性，深谙 **面向对象编程思想**，熟悉常见设计  
模式（如工厂、策略、依赖注入、仓储模式等）；  
3\. 精通 Laravel 或 Hyperf 任意一种主流框架，了解其核心机制（如中间件、IOC 容  
器、事件机制、协程等）；  
4\. 有 高并发、高可用系统设计经验 优先，例如：  
* 使用 Redis / MQ （如 Kafka 、RabbitMQ 、RocketMQ 等）进行削峰填谷、异步  
解耦  
* 掌握分布式锁、限流、熔断、降级等常用高并发解决方案  
5\. 熟悉 MySQL ，具备良好的数据建模能力；掌握索引优化、执行计划分析、SQL 性  
能调优；  
6\. 熟悉常用缓存技术（如 Redis ）、搜索引擎（如 Elasticsearch ）和队列机制；  
7\. 熟悉 Nginx 、Linux 基础操作，有实际线上部署与调优经验；  
8\. 具备良好的代码习惯：有单元测试 / 自动化测试意识，熟悉 Git 工作流，了解 CI/  
CD 者优先；  
  
加分项：  
1\. 有参与或主导 高并发电商、金融、营销活动、风控、实时数据处理 等项目经验；  
2\. 有微服务 / 分布式系统经验，了解 Docker 、Kubernetes 等容器化与编排技术；  
3\. 有前后端协作经验，了解基础的前端技术（如 Vue / React ）更佳；  
4\. 有开源项目、技术博客、GitHub 作品或在技术社区活跃者优先；  
5\. 对代码质量有执念，习惯用文档、注释、评审等方式沉淀经验。  
  
\----  
添加 TG：Skyewen20251  
有意向投递简历到 Email 邮箱： [zygs2151@gmail.com](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
jobCategory: 后端开发,区块链

postTitle: 视觉算法工程师（车载设备方向）
jobTitle: 视觉算法工程师（车载设备方向）
descContent:
1. 指导和参与商用车车载场景下核心算法的设计、开发与迭代优化，覆盖相机标定、目标检测、跟踪、多传感器融合（如摄像头 + 毫米波雷达）等关键技术；
2. 负责算法数据标注规范制定、训练数据集构建与优化，完成模型训练、验证及效果调优，确保算法在复杂路况（雨雾、强光、夜间）下的高可靠性与实时性；
3. 车载视觉算法实战经验丰富，必须有 BSD 或 ADAS（如 LDW、FCW）等算法独立开发与落地案例；
4. 深入理解嵌入式算法部署流程，具备车载芯片适配、模型量化 / 剪枝、推理性能优化实战经验；
5. 熟悉商用车车载场景特性（车身尺寸、视野盲区、复杂路况适应性），能针对性解决算法在实时性、低功耗、抗干扰等方面的核心问题；
6. 具备扎实的 C/C++/Python 编程能力，熟悉 Linux 开发环境，能独立完成算法工程化实现与问题排查；
7. 合作方式灵活，线上或线下兼职，长期或按项目
jobCategory: 算法,AI

postTitle: The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency
descContent:
Calling all current and aspiring digital nomads: your dream opportunity is
waiting!

SafetyWing is funding one persons next global adventure with up to $4,000 in
reimbursements to help you on your journey as a digital nomad.

Whether you are a seasoned world explorer or someone who has always dreamt of
far-off places, this could be your moment! The only requirement to apply is a
deep desire to travel widely and live freely.

### Who is SafetyWing?

SafetyWing envisions a world where borderless living is accessible and safe.
We want to unlock your global aspirations by helping you explore the world,
with the peace of mind that comes with knowing you’re in good hands.

### What’s in it for you

  * Support to build your ideal version of freedom worth US$4,000 (think flights, accommodations, skill building and more)

  * Mentorship from the SafetyWing team (learn from other nomads!)

  * Guidance on visas, insurance, budgeting, and logistics

  * Access to our global community

**  
**

### What your US$4,000 reward could cover

Reimbursed only — you must show proof of every expense.

  * Flights to your chosen destination 

  * Accommodation for your first month 

  * Coworking pass or workspace setup 

  * Local transport, SIM card, and basic setup costs 

  * Skill-building or career growth 

  * Work tools/equipment needed to support your nomad adventure 

  * Visa fees or document renewals

  * Any practical relocation cost directly tied to starting or upgrading your nomad life 

### Important guidelines

  * No cash is given directly

  * We reimburse up to US$4,000 only for approved, proven costs. Anything above $4,000 and/or anything without proper receipts will not be reimbursed

  * You must keep all receipts

  * Everything must be tied to starting or sustaining your digital nomad life

### How to apply

Tell us your story!

Submit:

  1. A 1–2 minute long video to introduce yourself, and tell us why we should fund your adventure. Post the video to any of your socials (LinkedIn, Instagram orTikTok), tag us, and link it below. Don’t submit the application without linking to your video. Some things you might want to tell us:

  * Why you’re excited about the The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency (required)

  * What’s your “I need a new life” moment?

  * Why are you drawn to the digital nomad lifestyle?

  * What’s the funniest, weirdest, or most chaotic sign the universe gave you to apply?

  * What version of you are you trying to unlock with this opportunity?

  * What would winning this unlock that you can’t unlock alone right now?

  * If your future self could send you one message, what would they say?

  * Which part of your story makes you think: “Yeah… they should pick me”?

  * Why do you think the world needs your story right now?

  * What’s the most chaotic thing about you that secretly makes you a great nomad candidate?

Answer a few written questions

Tell us how you’d spend $4,000 towards your dream life

Upload a resume

### How will we choose the winner?

We are looking for someone who’s not afraid of getting vulnerable and sharing
their story with the SafetyWing community and beyond. If you have always
dreamt of sustaining a digital nomadic lifestyle, we want to hear from you!

**  
**

### Requirements

You should:

  * Be 18+

  * Be available to travel in 2026

  * Have a story, not a résumé — we want your honesty, not perfection

  * Be willing to share parts of your journey (photos, reflections, updates)

  * Be comfortable being featured in SafetyWing content (social, blog, newsletter)

  * Have the ability to take time off / work remotely during the project period

  * Hold a passport valid for at least 6 months

**  
**

### How We’ll Choose the Winner

We will look for someone who:

  * Has a clear “why.” A genuine desire for change, adventure, or reinvention

  * Shows vulnerability. We want to hear your story!

  * Shows commitment to embarking on this digital nomad journey

  * Has a story that resonates. Something others can see themselves in

  * Has curiosity. People who think deeply about life, who question norms

We’re not picking the person with the most likes or the prettiest video.  
We’re picking the one whose story moves us, and the one we can genuinely help
take their next step.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Please mention the word **REFUNDED** when applying to show you read the job
post completely (#RMzkuNTEuNTMuMTEz). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$10,000 — $10,000/year
jobCategory: 内容创作,项目管理,市场营销,咨询,教育

postTitle: 资深Rust开发工程师-P7-remote
descContent:
工作职责：
主导基于 Rust 的跨平台核心组件架构设计与开发，确保系统具备卓越的性能、安全性与可靠性。
构建高扩展、易维护的跨平台系统，支持多样化的操作系统与硬件架构部署。
建立并推行代码规范、测试体系与 CI/CD 流程，持续提升代码质量与工程效能。
设计并维护共享组件库，赋能各产品线与平台的高效开发与迭代。
攻克 FFI 绑定、系统集成、平台适配等高复杂度技术难题，保障系统的兼容性与性能优化。
作为关键技术负责人，推动系统在性能、稳定性与可扩展性方面的持续进化。
密切关注 Rust 生态、跨平台工具链及前沿开发实践，推动技术方案创新落地。
通过技术指导、架构评审与最佳实践分享，帮助团队工程师成长，提升整体技术水位。
协同跨职能团队，参与制定公司技术战略，并对工程文化与团队协作模式产生积极影响。

职位要求：
计算机科学、软件工程或相关专业本科及以上学历。
6 年以上软件开发经验，其中至少 3 年专注于 Rust 语言开发，并有大规模复杂系统交付经历。
精通 Rust 语言特性与生态，包括所有权/借用、生命周期、异步编程、unsafe Rust 及 FFI 等。
熟悉 Rust 编译工具链、WebAssembly（WASM）及相关性能调试与优化方法。
具备扎实的系统编程能力，深入理解并发模型、内存管理、CPU 架构与性能调优。
具备优秀的数据结构、算法与操作系统基础知识。
具备出色的技术领导力、沟通协作能力，有带领技术项目或 mentoring 经验。

优先考虑条件（加分项）：
在 Rust 开源社区有持续贡献或参与过知名开源项目。
具有区块链、智能合约、密码学协议或金融系统开发经验。
有高性能系统、嵌入式开发或底层调优相关经验。
熟悉交易系统、金融科技平台或高并发分布式系统架构。
jobCategory: 后端开发,客户端开发,区块链,DevOps/MLOps

境界加成；炼气期不自动挂机，筑基后才可自动涨经验。 手动修炼：炼气期点击获得快速修为，可选消耗灵石/丹药提升效率。 境界突破：炼气需满 10 层 +

postTitle: Security Compliance Specialist at LiveKit
descContent:
LiveKit is revolutionizing the AI landscape by providing the network
infrastructure that powers multimodal AI interfaces, enabling seamless audio
and visual interactions. Founded in 2021, LiveKit has rapidly grown to support
over 3 billion calls annually, 200,000+ developers globally, and industry
leaders like OpenAI, Salesforce, Spotify, and Meta.

We are a company of builders creating software stacks for other builders. Our
infrastructure underpins products that must be secure, reliable, and compliant
from day one.

**You'll thrive at LiveKit if you:**

  * obsess with crafting code that is fast, reliable and practical for the problem

  * are known as the go-to person for tackling tough technical problems

  * work hard and can build _and_ ship fast

  * can clearly explain complex technical concepts to others

  * are a fast learner, frequently picking up new languages and tools

The best way to impress us is with thoughtful Issues and/or PRs on our Github
repos 😊

About This Role:

We are hiring a **Security Compliance Specialist** to **own our compliance
function end-to-end** and bring structure to a landscape that has been shared
across multiple teams so far. This role is focused on **GRC and compliance
operations**.

You will:

    * Lead and mature LiveKit’s security and privacy compliance programs (SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001, PCI DSS).

    * Own the day-to-day operations of our compliance workflows, from evidence collection to endpoint and access hygiene.

    * Partner closely with Security and IT Engineers who own architecture, segmentation, logging, and technical controls, while you focus on **controls design, documentation, governance, and audits**.

This is an **individual contributor role** with significant ownership and the
ability to grow with the business as we scale our certification footprint and
enterprise customer base.

What You'll Do:

Security Compliance and Governance

    * Own our security and privacy compliance programs across frameworks such as **SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001, and PCI DSS** , and help prepare the organization for future frameworks.

    * Translate regulatory and framework requirements into clear, pragmatic controls that fit LiveKit’s engineering culture and infrastructure.

    * Build and maintain the compliance roadmap and calendar, including audits, renewals, evidence collection cycles, and internal reviews.

    * Lead customer and third-party **security questionnaires** , DDQs, and compliance reviews, partnering with Sales, Legal, and Engineering to respond efficiently and consistently.

    * Maintain and continuously improve our **policy set** , including access control, asset management, vendor risk, incident response, and related governance documents.

    * Track and report on compliance health, gaps, and remediation progress to leadership.

    * Identify operational gaps and lead projects to close them, such as new approval flows, access reviews, or better documentation of data flows and responsibilities.

Cross‑Functional Partnership and Risk Management

    * Act as the **primary point of contact** for external auditors, assessors, and compliance vendors, coordinating walkthroughs, evidence requests, and responses.

    * Partner with the Security Engineer and infra team on:

      * Scoping and documenting systems, data flows, and segmentation decisions for PCI and other frameworks.

      * Ensuring technical controls (EDR, FIM, logging, vulnerability management) are mapped to compliance requirements, while keeping technical ownership with engineering.

    * Work with GTM teams and leadership to **champion compliance as a business enabler** , helping unlock deals and maintain customer trust.

    * Advise on risk, surface critical issues early, and drive remediation projects to completion with clear owners, timelines, and success criteria.

Who You Are:

    * **5+ years of experience** in security compliance, GRC, or a closely related function, ideally with experience at a startup or in an early-stage environment.

    * Deep familiarity with at least several of: **SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001, PCI DSS** , and an interest in newer or more advanced regimes.

    * Demonstrated experience **running audits end to end** : planning, evidence, walkthroughs, findings, and remediation.

    * Strong project management skills: you can juggle multiple frameworks, vendors, and internal stakeholders and keep everything moving without micromanagement.

    * Excellent written and verbal communication skills. You can explain complex requirements in clear, approachable language and adapt your message to engineers, leadership, and customers.

Bonus points for:

      * Strong foundations in technical concepts: you are comfortable talking about infrastructure, logs, endpoints, identities, and segmentation even if you are not the one writing production code.

      * Opinions about building efficient, low-friction, high-signal IT and compliance processes in a remote-first company.

      * Experience writing code in personal or professional contexts (for example scripting, automation, or light development), even if you are not a full-time engineer.

      * Prior experience supporting PCI, healthcare, or other highly regulated environments.

**We offer**

      * The opportunity to build a foundational compliance function at a company that is defining how AI-powered applications are built

      * A chance to shape how security, compliance, and IT work together from the ground up, in partnership with engineering and leadership

      * Competitive salary and equity package

      * Health, dental, and vision benefits

      * Flexible vacation policy
jobCategory: 安全,项目管理,法务,技术支持

postTitle: 远程岗位： cocos creator H5 游戏二次开发方向
jobTitle: cocos creator H5 游戏二次开发工程师
descContent:
远程 cocos creator H5 游戏二次开发方向  
薪资范围 15-20K （优秀另议）  
岗位职责  
  
负责基于 Cocos Creator 的 H5 游戏二次开发、功能扩展与维护，包括玩法逻辑、UI 动效、资源替换、性能优化等。  
  
根据产品需求快速实现轻量级 2D 玩法（卡牌、休闲、对战、一局一局的回合类）。  
  
与前端 Web 壳应用进行集成：  
  
设计并实现 JS/TS 侧的通信接口  
  
完成游戏与外部 Vue/HTML 前端的互调、消息处理及事件管理  
  
对接后端 API：  
  
调用登录、用户信息、投注/结算接口  
  
实现游戏结果上报、数据埋点、风控流程等业务逻辑  
  
配合产品、设计、测试团队，确保游戏功能、体验、性能满足上线要求。  
  
参与已有游戏源码分析、拆解、适配、复用（会接触大量外包/开放源码项目）。  
  
对游戏加载速度、内存占用、弱网体验等进行常规优化。  
  
任职要求  
必备能力  
  
熟练使用 Cocos Creator （ 2.x / 3.x 皆可），掌握引擎 API 、组件系统、资源管理、事件机制等。  
  
扎实的 JavaScript / TypeScript 基础，熟悉模块化、异步处理、数据结构等。  
  
有 H5 游戏项目经验，能独立定位并解决渲染、加载、适配类问题。  
  
具备 与前端页面（ Vue / 原生 HTML ）集成的经验：  
  
iframe 通信  
  
window.postMessage  
  
或直接嵌入 canvas 的方式  
  
能理解后端业务逻辑，熟悉 HTTP 请求、token 、API 对接流程、加解密/签名 等常用接口规范。  
  
加分项  
  
有二次开发、源码逆向理解能力（可快速读懂别人写的游戏代码）；  
  
熟悉简单的 UI 动画（ Tween 、Animation ）；  
  
熟悉 WebGL / Canvas 渲染机制，有性能优化经验；  
  
有过棋牌、卡牌、回合制、休闲类游戏开发经验；  
  
有独立上线过完整 H5 游戏项目经验；  
  
了解常见的前端框架（ Vue/React ）或 Node.js 更佳；  
  
具备良好的自驱力与沟通能力，能与产品、前端、后端高效协作  
\----  
添加 TG：Skyewen20251  
有意向投递简历到 Email 邮箱： [zygs2151@gmail.com](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
