postTitle: Senior Front-End Engineer at Offchain Labs
jobTitle: Senior Front-End Engineer at Offchain Labs
descContent:
At Offchain Labs, we aren’t just building products: we’re leading a movement.

  

As pioneers in blockchain scalability and security, we're at the forefront of
transforming how the world interacts with decentralized applications. We're
laying the foundation that will define the next generation of digital
commerce, governance, and human interaction. This involves tackling real-world
challenges that come with scaling blockchain technology, without compromising
on its core principles: decentralization, security and transparency.

  

At the center of this vision is our people. Our team is made up of thinkers
and doers that embrace new challenges and seek solutions that push existing
boundaries. If you’re energized by solving unprecedented problems, and believe
in the role that decentralized systems will play in creating a more equitable
digital future, then we want to hear from you.

  

**Why Offchain Labs?**

  

Offchain Labs is setting the pace for the entire Ethereum ecosystem. We built
the Arbitrum stack that powers Arbitrum One, the most widely adopted Ethereum
scaling solution that exists today.

  

Arbitrum’s ecosystem is undergoing tremendous growth with hundreds of projects
and dApps on Arbitrum One today. Over 100 different teams have used Offchain
Labs technology to build their own Arbitrum chains. Major players in the
space, Robinhood, BlackRock, Ethena Labs, Securitize, Aave, and Apechain are
all using the Arbitrum stack.

  

Arbitrum’s thriving ecosystem wouldn’t exist without our advanced technology
stack. Arbitrum, Prysm, ZeroDev. These aren’t just product names. These are
tools that are actively reshaping what's possible on Ethereum and advancing
its core infrastructure.

  

To top it all off? We’re backed by $124 million in funding. We’ve demonstrated
consistent execution with billions in secured value, thousands of supported
projects, and infrastructure processing millions of transactions seamlessly.

At Offchain Labs, we aren’t just building products: we’re leading a movement.

  

As pioneers in blockchain scalability and security, we're at the forefront of
transforming how the world interacts with decentralized applications. We're
laying the foundation that will define the next generation of digital
commerce, governance, and human interaction. This involves tackling real-world
challenges that come with scaling blockchain technology, without compromising
on its core principles: decentralization, security and transparency.

  

At the center of this vision is our people. Our team is made up of thinkers
and doers that embrace new challenges and seek solutions that push existing
boundaries. If you’re energized by solving unprecedented problems, and believe
in the role that decentralized systems will play in creating a more equitable
digital future, then we want to hear from you.

  

**Why Offchain Labs?**

  

Offchain Labs is setting the pace for the entire Ethereum ecosystem. We built
the Arbitrum stack that powers Arbitrum One, the most widely adopted Ethereum
scaling solution that exists today.

  

Arbitrum’s ecosystem is undergoing tremendous growth with hundreds of projects
and dApps on Arbitrum One today. Over 100 different teams have used Offchain
Labs technology to build their own Arbitrum chains. Major players in the
space, Robinhood, BlackRock, Ethena Labs, Securitize, Aave, and Apechain are
all using the Arbitrum stack.

  

Arbitrum’s thriving ecosystem wouldn’t exist without our advanced technology
stack. Arbitrum, Prysm, ZeroDev. These aren’t just product names. These are
tools that are actively reshaping what's possible on Ethereum and advancing
its core infrastructure.

  

To top it all off? We’re backed by $124 million in funding. We’ve demonstrated
consistent execution with billions in secured value, thousands of supported
projects, and infrastructure processing millions of transactions seamlessly.

### The Role

* At Offchain Labs, we steward the giant technical ecosystem around Arbitrum technology bridging across a broad variety of products and use cases. As part of the Full Stack Engineering team at Offchain Labs, you'll be leading the effort to develop and optimize our tech, including services powering our consumer-facing apps, internal services, various developer tools, and more, using your expertise in React and TypeScript. We’re looking for someone who is genuinely excited about blockchain, has excellent communication abilities and is enthusiastic to learn more from the team, including our CTO.

### What you'll do:

* Collaborate directly with designers to bring creative visions to life, including animations and interactions
* Develop performant, accessible UIs using React, [Next.js](http://Next.js), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern CSS
* Integrate analytics platforms (Google Analytics, PostHog) and CRM systems (HubSpot) into web applications
* Implement and maintain headless CMS solutions for content-driven websites
* Build marketing websites and landing pages based on Figma designs, delivering pixel-perfect, responsive implementations
* Build consumer-facing web applications in the blockchain and Ethereum scaling space
* Optimize websites for performance, ensuring high Lighthouse scores and fast page load times
* Keep up-to-date on the latest technologies and developments in the space

### What you’ll need:

* 5+ years of front-end engineering experience
* Proven track record of building production websites from Figma designs to deployment
* Strong expertise in responsive design and cross-device and cross-browser compatibility
* Deep understanding of web performance optimization, including Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse scoring, and PageSpeed best practices
* Hands-on experience integrating analytics tools and CRM platforms
* Experience working with headless CMS platforms like Sanity, Contentful, or similar
* Expert-level proficiency in CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and [Next.js](http://Next.js)
* You care deeply about crafting high-quality user experiences and pay attention to design details
* Animation implementation skills (Framer Motion, GSAP, or similar)
* Interest in or experience with blockchain technology and web3 development
* Security-conscious approach to code development with rigorous QA and testing practices
* You have excellent communication skills and thrive on collaboration and feedback

### Perks:

* Remote-first global workforce + NY office
* Annual company offsite + team onsites
* Professional reimbursement program (facilitates industry conference attendance, certifications, and more)
* Medical, dental & vision coverage (US + some other countries)
* 401k retirement plan + company match (US only)
* Wellness stipend
* Home office set up / ergonomic equipment program

**Attention Offchain Labs Job Seekers:**

  

This role cannot be performed in California, or Colorado.

  

Please be advised that there has been a rise in fraudulent recruiter
activities, particularly within the Web3 space. If you would like to confirm
whether someone is an OCL employee or the legitimacy of an offer you received,
please email [jobs@offchainlabs.com](mailto:jobs@offchainlabs.com)

  

At Offchain Labs, we are committed to building a welcoming and supportive
workplace for all employees, regardless of their background or identity. We
strive to create an environment where everyone feels valued and has an equal
opportunity to succeed and thrive. We encourage candidates from all walks of
life to apply and join our team.
jobCategory: 前端开发,全栈开发,区块链

postTitle: Federal Pre-Sales Solution Architect at Istari
jobTitle: Federal Pre-Sales Solution Architect at Istari
descContent:
[ABOUT ISTARI DIGITAL]

Istari is a digital engineering software company enabling our customers to
turn the physical world into the digital to accomplish their specific mission
or business objectives.

  

Istari was founded with the vision of making open, scalable digital
engineering ecosystems a reality – where new technologies and systems are
created digitally, free from the real-world constraints of costs and
schedules. We are creating the world’s best engineering model sharing
platform, allowing our customers to simply and securely integrate their models
across different engineering disciplines, organizations, and security levels.

  

At Istari, we are passionate about our mission of creating the world's first
open and scalable industrial metaverse. Whether our customers are designing
prototypes, performing virtual testing, or training AI and autonomy for
complex systems, we know that going digital will save them time, resources,
and reduce their environmental impact.

  

While we are a distributed team with most team-members working remotely, we
place an emphasis on staying connected and collaborative, prioritizing in-
person opportunities to build trust as a team. At Istari, we still believe
that trust is best built in-person. To do this, we have an engineering
headquarters in Cambridge, MA for focused technical development and several
times per year we gather for an off-site that allows us to develop our
professional skills and our team relationships.

  

[VALUES]

At Istari, we live by our values, which include:

  

**Purposeful Autonomy**

We value letting people self-organize and self-motivate.

Our flat structure and lack of meeting clutter are meant to empower
individuals and teams to be proactive.

Our autonomy is measured, goal-oriented, and results-driven – not meandering.

Clear objectives help us prioritize our time.

  

**Smart Transparency**

We believe in honest-but-kind communication, transparency, and open-door
policies.

We love learning about challenges and tackling them early, not hearing good or
bad news late.

We share work-in-progress across our team.

Fast feedback keeps autonomy purposeful.

  

**Continual Curiosity**

At Istari, we love learning to do things ourselves.

We ask, read, share, teach – even watch YouTube videos – to learn new skills
to solve problems.

When we make breakthroughs, we write them down.

Writing focuses ideas, helps us learn, and helps us share.

  

**Equal Opportunity**

Istari is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified
applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race,
color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national
origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.

  

  

The **Federal Pre-Sales Solution Architect** serves as the technical leader
and trusted advisor in our federal sales cycles. You will partner closely with
Federal Account Executives, Sales Leadership and the Executive team to conduct
discovery, design secure deployment architectures, craft compelling value
narratives, and ensure the feasibility and success of Istari implementations
across DoW and federal civilian missions.

  

You will translate complex engineering workflows, data ecosystems, and
security boundaries into scalable Istari architectures spanning cloud and on-
prem environments across classification levels. Your work accelerates customer
understanding, reduces technical risk, and drives confidence in the path from
proof of value to production to enterprise adoption.

  

  

This role is foundational to our federal GTM motion:

  

\- **Federal AEs** lead commercial/account strategy, opportunity
qualification, and the sales cycle from prospecting through contract close.

\- **Federal Solution Architects** ensure technical alignment, solution
viability, and deployment clarity to win the technical decision.

  

Together, these roles form the Federal growth engine for Istari.

The **Federal Pre-Sales Solution Architect** serves as the technical leader
and trusted advisor in our federal sales cycles. You will partner closely with
Federal Account Executives, Sales Leadership and the Executive team to conduct
discovery, design secure deployment architectures, craft compelling value
narratives, and ensure the feasibility and success of Istari implementations
across DoW and federal civilian missions.

  

You will translate complex engineering workflows, data ecosystems, and
security boundaries into scalable Istari architectures spanning cloud and on-
prem environments across classification levels. Your work accelerates customer
understanding, reduces technical risk, and drives confidence in the path from
proof of value to production to enterprise adoption.

  

  

This role is foundational to our federal GTM motion:

  

\- **Federal AEs** lead commercial/account strategy, opportunity
qualification, and the sales cycle from prospecting through contract close.

\- **Federal Solution Architects** ensure technical alignment, solution
viability, and deployment clarity to win the technical decision.

  

Together, these roles form the Federal growth engine for Istari.

### Key Responsibilities

* **Technical Discovery & Mission Understanding: **Lead technical discovery sessions to understand mission requirements, engineering workflows, data flows, and infrastructure constraints. Evaluate cross-program collaboration needs, security boundaries, classification requirements, and deployment feasibility. Map customer challenges to Istari’s architecture, capabilities, and value.
* **Architecture Design & Deployment Planning: **Design deployment architectures using Istari’s control plane, data plane, and agent frameworks. Architect solutions for a variety of customer environments (e.g. AWS GovCloud, Azure, on-prem HPC environments, containerized platforms (EKS, ECS, K8s), and multi-tenant deployments). Produce architecture diagrams, configuration specifications, and implementation guidelines. Ensure designs support cross-domain workflows, engineering automation, and ROI from digital engineering modernization.
* **Demo Delivery, Technical Storytelling & Value Translation: **Own end-to-end demo preparation and delivery for federal prospects. Tailor demos to mission-specific scenarios, data flows, engineering tools, and classification requirements. Build repeatable demo environments and customize them for unique use cases across DoD, IC, and federal civilian agencies. Collaborate with AEs to craft compelling technical narratives that articulate the “why,” not just the “how,” of Istari. Capture demo feedback to refine content, improve demo flows, and influence roadmap priorities.
* **Pre-Sales Engagement & Technical Validation: **Lead whiteboarding sessions, workflow walkthroughs, and integration deep dives. Develop small-scale proofs of concept to validate integrations, data orchestration, and engineering automations.
* Partner with AEs to quantify value, support ROI models, and articulate the technical pathway to successful production deployments.
* **Security, Compliance & Infrastructure Expertise: **Advise customers on cloud security posture, Zero Trust patterns, enclave design, and network segmentation. Support ATO-related discussions, boundary definitions, and infrastructure alignment. Work with Istari technical leadership (Cybersecurity, Engineering, Product, Customer Success) to ensure solutions meet IL2–IL6 and agency-specific security requirements.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Partner with Cybersecurity, Product, Engineering, and Customer Success to translate customer needs into roadmap inputs and deployment patterns. Collaborate with Sales Operations & Strategy on qualification, solution design, and repeatable playbooks. Contribute reusable documentation, demo content, and technical assets to scale the federal GTM motion.

### Required Qualifications

* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related technical field (or equivalent experience). 
* 5–10+ years in pre-sales engineering, solutions architecture, systems engineering, or technical consulting for complex enterprise or infrastructure software.
* Experience supporting federal missions—DoD, intelligence community, national labs, or defense primes.
* Hands-on experience with AWS GovCloud and secure cloud/on-prem hybrid architectures.
* Prior ownership of technical demos, ideally for infrastructure, data, or engineering platforms.
* Strong technical storytelling and demo delivery skills—able to translate complex concepts into intuitive, mission-relevant narratives.
* Ability to architect secure, distributed systems across classification levels and network boundaries.
* Proficiency with containerized deployments, networking, cloud security, and systems integration.
* Skilled at diagramming, documenting, and communicating architectures with clarity.
* Excellent collaboration skills across sales, engineering, and product.
* Must be a US citizen living within the United States.

### Preferred Qualifications

* Background in aerospace, defense, digital engineering, or mission-critical infrastructure software with a solutions sales model. 
* Experience with CAD/CAE, PLM, MBSE, or engineering data pipelines.
* Familiarity with ATO processes and cross-domain workflows.

**Why Join Us?**

\- Shape the future of digital engineering across the DoD and national
security ecosystem.

\- Lead the technical motion at the intersection of AI, engineering
infrastructure, and multi-domain collaboration.

\- Work directly engineering leadership and mission stakeholders on high-
impact deployments.

\- Influence the product roadmap through real mission needs and demo feedback.

\- Join a high-trust, mission-driven team building transformative technology.

  

  

BENEFITS

We offer highly competitive benefits, including:

  

Health and Family

\- Medical/Dental/Vision

\- Employee Premiums are 100% Company Paid

\- Life Insurance

\- Flexible Work Hours

\- Unlimited Paid Time Off (PTO) with federal government holidays

  

Financial

\- Competitive Compensation

\- 401k

\- Company Stock Options

\- Home Office Setup Budget

  

Learning

\- Reimbursement for approved trainings and subscriptions

\- Conferences (travel, lodging, and fees)

  

Note - some benefits are not available to interns or contractors.

  

Thank you for your interest in Istari. Expect to hear back from us soon with
next steps.

[ABOUT ISTARI DIGITAL]

Istari is a digital engineering software company enabling our customers to
turn the physical world into the digital to accomplish their specific mission

At Istari, we are passionate about our mission of creating the world's first

At Istari, we live by our values, which include:

Our flat structure and lack of meeting clutter are meant to empower
individuals and teams to be proactive.

Our autonomy is measured, goal-oriented, and results-driven – not meandering.

Clear objectives help us prioritize our time.

  

**Smart Transparency**

We believe in honest-but-kind communication, transparency, and open-door

**Continual Curiosity**

We ask, read, share, teach – even watch YouTube videos – to learn new skills

Writing focuses ideas, helps us learn, and helps us share.

  

**Equal Opportunity**

Istari is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified

origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.

The Commercial Account Executive (A&D) is responsible for driving new business
and expansion across commercial aerospace and defense markets—including
primes, tier 1/2/3 suppliers, high-growth defense technology companies, and
adjacent industrial engineering organizations serving national security
missions.

  

You will own the full sales cycle, from prospecting and multi-stakeholder
discovery through technical evaluations, pricing, and close. Istari’s sales
motion is highly consultative and technical; successful AEs deeply understand
engineering workflows, digital transformation pain points, and the operational
pressures facing A&D hardware producers.

  

You will collaborate closely with Solution Architects, Demand Generation, and
Sales Operations to build pipeline, qualify opportunities, shape technical
evaluations, and drive meaningful revenue growth.

The Commercial Account Executive (A&D) is responsible for driving new business
and expansion across commercial aerospace and defense markets—including
primes, tier 1/2/3 suppliers, high-growth defense technology companies, and
adjacent industrial engineering organizations serving national security
missions.

  

You will own the full sales cycle, from prospecting and multi-stakeholder
discovery through technical evaluations, pricing, and close. Istari’s sales
motion is highly consultative and technical; successful AEs deeply understand
engineering workflows, digital transformation pain points, and the operational
pressures facing A&D hardware producers.

  

You will collaborate closely with Solution Architects, Demand Generation, and
Sales Operations to build pipeline, qualify opportunities, shape technical
evaluations, and drive meaningful revenue growth.

This role will also qualify for a variable incentive plan.

### Key Responsibilities

* **Pipeline Generation & Territory Ownership: **Build and execute a territory strategy focused on A&D primes, tiered suppliers, and advanced hardware companies. Drive outbound prospecting to engineering, program, and digital transformation stakeholders. Partner with Demand Gen and BDRs to build predictable, high-quality pipeline. Qualify opportunities based on technical fit, value potential, and organizational readiness.
* **Sales Execution & Deal Management: **Own the full sales cycle from first meeting to close. Conduct discovery to uncover engineering bottlenecks, data fragmentation issues, supplier coordination challenges, and digital engineering priorities. Partner with Solution Architects to scope architectures, plan proofs of value, and deliver compelling demos. Build ROI models and business cases that show impact on design cycle time, supplier integration, cost reduction, and engineering throughput. Navigate complex stakeholder landscapes across engineering, IT, digital transformation teams, and procurement. Lead pricing, contracting, and commercial negotiations.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Work closely with Solution Architects on technical validation strategy. Provide market, customer, and competitive insights to Product and Engineering. Collaborate with Sales Operations & Strategy on forecasting and territory planning. Contribute to A&D-specific GTM plays, case studies, outreach messaging, and market content.
* **Customer Relationship Building & Expansion: **Build trusted relationships with engineering directors, digital engineering leads, program managers, and supply-chain transformation teams. Identify multi-program and multi-business-unit expansion opportunities to accelerate enterprise penetration. Support Customer Success during onboarding to ensure a smooth transition and long-term value realization. Position Istari as the foundational infrastructure for boundaryless digital engineering, not a feature vendor.

### Required Qualifications

* 4–8+ years of quota-carrying enterprise software or technical B2B sales 
* Experience selling into aerospace & defense / industrial / manufacturing customers.
* Proven success navigating complex multi-stakeholder sales cycles with engineering, operations, IT, and procurement.
* Experience selling infrastructure, data platforms, engineering software, or cloud/SaaS into technical buyers.
* Excellent discovery, qualification, and consultative selling capabilities.
* Ability to translate technical workflows into compelling business value for engineering-centric organizations.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills; exceptional presenter and storyteller.
* High ownership, persistence, and comfort operating in a dynamic, early-stage environment.
* Strong outbound prospecting skills and ability to build a territory from the ground up leveraging existing use-cases / connections at Istari
* Team Player
* Willing to travel 25-50%
* Must be a US citizen living within the United States.

### Preferred Qualifications

* Prior experience selling to A&D primes (e.g., Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman, Boeing, Raytheon, GE Aerospace, L3Harris).
* Experience selling into tiered supplier ecosystems and hardware manufacturing programs.
* Familiarity with digital engineering, model-based engineering, CAD/CAE, PLM, or engineering automation workflows.
* Background in aerospace, defense, hardware engineering, or industrial software.

**Why Join Us?**

\- Shape the future of digital engineering across the DoD and national
security ecosystem.

\- Lead the technical motion at the intersection of AI, engineering
infrastructure, and multi-domain collaboration.

\- Work directly engineering leadership and mission stakeholders on high-
impact deployments.

\- Influence the product roadmap through real mission needs and demo feedback.

\- Join a high-trust, mission-driven team building transformative technology.

  

  

BENEFITS

We offer highly competitive benefits, including:

  

Health and Family

\- Medical/Dental/Vision

\- Employee Premiums are 100% Company Paid

\- Life Insurance

\- Flexible Work Hours

\- Unlimited Paid Time Off (PTO) with federal government holidays

  

Financial

\- Competitive Compensation

\- 401k

\- Company Stock Options

\- Home Office Setup Budget

  

Learning

\- Reimbursement for approved trainings and subscriptions

\- Conferences (travel, lodging, and fees)

  

Note - some benefits are not available to interns or contractors.

  

Thank you for your interest in Istari. Expect to hear back from us soon with
next steps.

[ABOUT ISTARI DIGITAL]

Istari is a digital engineering software company enabling our customers to
turn the physical world into the digital to accomplish their specific mission
or business objectives.

  

Istari was founded with the vision of making open, scalable digital
engineering ecosystems a reality – where new technologies and systems are
created digitally, free from the real-world constraints of costs and
schedules. We are creating the world’s best engineering model sharing
platform, allowing our customers to simply and securely integrate their models
across different engineering disciplines, organizations, and security levels.

  

At Istari, we are passionate about our mission of creating the world's first
open and scalable industrial metaverse. Whether our customers are designing
prototypes, performing virtual testing, or training AI and autonomy for
complex systems, we know that going digital will save them time, resources,
and reduce their environmental impact.

  

While we are a distributed team with most team-members working remotely, we
place an emphasis on staying connected and collaborative, prioritizing in-
person opportunities to build trust as a team. At Istari, we still believe
that trust is best built in-person. To do this, we have an engineering
headquarters in Cambridge, MA for focused technical development and several
times per year we gather for an off-site that allows us to develop our
professional skills and our team relationships.

  

[VALUES]

At Istari, we live by our values, which include:

  

**Purposeful Autonomy**

We value letting people self-organize and self-motivate.

Our flat structure and lack of meeting clutter are meant to empower
individuals and teams to be proactive.

Our autonomy is measured, goal-oriented, and results-driven – not meandering.

Clear objectives help us prioritize our time.

  

**Smart Transparency**

We believe in honest-but-kind communication, transparency, and open-door
policies.

We love learning about challenges and tackling them early, not hearing good or
bad news late.

We share work-in-progress across our team.

Fast feedback keeps autonomy purposeful.

  

**Continual Curiosity**

At Istari, we love learning to do things ourselves.

We ask, read, share, teach – even watch YouTube videos – to learn new skills
to solve problems.

When we make breakthroughs, we write them down.

Writing focuses ideas, helps us learn, and helps us share.

  

**Equal Opportunity**

Istari is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified
applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race,
color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national
origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.

The Demand Generation & Marketing Lead is responsible for building the top-of-
funnel growth engine for Istari. You will own multi-channel demand creation,
product and technical marketing, content strategy, and targeted account based
marketing (ABM) campaigns across federal, commercial, and supplier segments.
This is a cross functional role that works across Sales, Government Relations
and Product Management to refine messaging. This role will work in tight
partnership with the Sales Operations & Strategy Manager to form the backbone
of Istari’s growth engine:

  

\- Demand Generation → attracts and engages high-quality prospects through
outbound campaigns, targeted events and account based marketing practices

\- Sales Operations & Strategy → ensures pipeline is targeted, qualified,
measurable, and converts efficiently.

  

You will jointly refine ICPs, personas, messaging, targeting, funnel
analytics, campaign performance, and the overall GTM process. While Sales Ops
drives internal efficiency and clarity, Demand Gen drives external activation
and market pull. The two roles operate as a unified growth engine.

The Demand Generation & Marketing Lead is responsible for building the top-of-
funnel growth engine for Istari. You will own multi-channel demand creation,
product and technical marketing, content strategy, and targeted account based
marketing (ABM) campaigns across federal, commercial, and supplier segments.
This is a cross functional role that works across Sales, Government Relations
and Product Management to refine messaging. This role will work in tight
partnership with the Sales Operations & Strategy Manager to form the backbone
of Istari’s growth engine:

  

\- Demand Generation → attracts and engages high-quality prospects through
outbound campaigns, targeted events and account based marketing practices

\- Sales Operations & Strategy → ensures pipeline is targeted, qualified,
measurable, and converts efficiently.

  

You will jointly refine ICPs, personas, messaging, targeting, funnel
analytics, campaign performance, and the overall GTM process. While Sales Ops
drives internal efficiency and clarity, Demand Gen drives external activation
and market pull. The two roles operate as a unified growth engine.

### Key Responsibilities

* **Demand Generation & Pipeline Creation: **Build multi-touch campaigns aligned to priority segments. Architect Istari’s demand generation engine across email, webinars, technical events, ABM, social, and targeted paid media. Partner with Sales Ops on account segmentation, lead scoring, campaign routing, and pipeline analytics. Generate predictable, high-quality top-of-funnel pipeline. Drive experimentation across channels.
* **Product Marketing & Technical Narrative: **Translate complex engineering and infrastructure workflows into compelling value narratives. Build sales and marketing assets. Create technical content with engineering and product teams. Work cross functionally w/ product stakeholders. 
* **Content Strategy & Market Leadership: **Own the content roadmap. Produce technical and thought leadership content. Align content with the Sales Ops, Director of Government and External Relations, Director of Sales and Product Management stakeholders
* **GTM Alignment and Analytics :** Align on ICPs, personas, and segments. Coordinate dashboards and campaign ROI. Ensure clean integration with HubSpot and GTM processes. Co-develop ABM programs and GTM plays.
* **Marketing Operations:** Own HubSpot marketing automation. Use data to refine targeting and messaging. Manage landing pages and tracking.

### Required Qualifications

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or Engineering.
* 5-10+ years of experience in demand generation, growth marketing, or product marketing for a software company (preferably Defense Technology) 
* Proven success in technical B2B software.
* Strong collaboration experience with Sales Ops/RevOps.
* Strong technical storytelling ability.
* Hands-on HubSpot experience.
* Must be a US citizen living within the United States.

### Preferred Qualifications

* Background in aerospace, defense, digital engineering, or cloud infrastructure.
* Enterprise sales cycle support.
* Event marketing experience.

**Why Join Us?**

\- High-impact role.

\- Deep technical exposure.

\- Strategic GTM leadership.

\- Mission-driven environment.

\- High-trust, collaborative culture.

  

  

BENEFITS

We offer highly competitive benefits, including:

  

Health and Family

\- Medical/Dental/Vision

\- Employee Premiums are 100% Company Paid

\- Life Insurance

\- Flexible Work Hours

\- Unlimited Paid Time Off (PTO) with federal government holidays

  

Financial

Learning

\- Reimbursement for approved trainings and subscriptions

\- Conferences (travel, lodging, and fees)

postTitle: Security Analyst for Infected Websites (Contract)
descContent:
We're seeking a Security Analyst to work on an hourly contract basis from your
home office, with 100% availability during that time.

**The following shifts are available:**

  * Weekdays: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM ET (40 hrs/wk)
  * Weekends: Saturday-Sunday, 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM ET (16 hrs/wk)

Candidates in regions where these hours strongly align with their normal
business hours are encouraged to apply. You do not have to be based in the
USA.

**The contract rate for this role is $35+ USD per hour, depending on
experience.**

**Job Description**

We are looking for Security Analysts to join our Care and Response Team. You
will assist our customers and investigate site intrusions, as well as repair
their sites and remove all traces of compromise.

Additionally, you will collect and process evidence from intrusions that will
help improve our threat detection. You will need to determine how the
intrusion occurred, collect all IOCs (indicators of compromise), and work with
our Threat Intelligence team on vulnerability research and malware signature
development.

In your downtime, you will triage and validate vulnerability reports submitted
through our Bug Bounty Program. You’ll assess impact to prioritize
submissions, reproduce and analyze vulnerabilities in controlled environments,
and identify root causes in source code. You will document findings, recommend
fixes or custom firewall rules, and propose bounty amounts based on severity
and impact.

You will collaborate with developers, customer support, and disclosure teams,
as well as validate that patches are sufficient once released.

General requirements:

    * Highly technical and comfortable with a wide range of open source tools such as grep, find, etc
    * Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
    * Ability to interact with customers professionally.
    * Work well in a team and work independently without additional guidance.
    * Excellent analytical ability, ability to think outside of the box, and an eagerness to learn. 
    * Must have attention to detail.

The specific skills we require for this position are:

  * 3+ years of experience with WordPress required.

  *     * Technical experience with common web application based vulnerabilities in WordPress plugins and themes.

  *     * A solid understanding of WordPress hooks, how they are used, and how they can lead to vulnerabilities.

  * Experience with administering multiple Linux stacks. (We don’t support Windows.)
  * Experience with MySQL.
  * 2+ years of experience conducting remediation of compromised websites, including analysis of how the intrusion occurred, removing the intrusion vector, and restoring the site to a fully functional state.
  * Experience in vulnerability research is a plus, which includes:

  *     * Ability to develop proof of concepts programmatically or conceptually to test the exploitability of vulnerabilities, and the general ability to read/understand programmatic and conceptual proof of concepts.

  *     * Ability to replicate the exploitability of vulnerabilities in a test environment.

  *     * Ability to review source code changes to determine if a vulnerability was patched and what the patch was for.

  *     * Experience generating/modifying HTTP requests.

  *     * Experience working with BURP suite or similar proxy software and a PHP debugger.

  * A solid understanding of regular expressions. Must be able to write expressions on the fly to match and remove only malicious code (often polymorphic) without affecting any legitimate code and to write malware signatures for our products.
  * Ability to write and read PHP, regular expressions, cron jobs, and JavaScript.  
Understanding of all major vulnerability types and the ability to explain them
to a customer in terms they can understand.

  * Ability to analyze log files and determine how an intrusion occurred.
  * Certifications in penetration testing or forensics are a strong plus.
  * Assist other teams during downtime.

### Hiring Process

We review all applications submitted and respond to all candidates usually
within one to two weeks.

  1. Please fill in the form provided in this application. The hiring team will look at this first. The way you answer our form will determine if your application moves to the next step. Please note that we read every answer and this form is a critical part of our hiring process.
  2. Candidates who appear to have the right skills from the initial application will be sent a more detailed Assessment Test to further assess skills.
  3. Candidates who successfully pass the Assessment Test will be invited to participate in a series of phone interviews. We are respectful of your time and keep the number of interviews you will need to attend to a minimum. This is usually two or three interviews. All interviews are done remotely with no travel involved.
  4. All contracts and offers of employment are contingent on the successful completion of a background check. The results of the background check are considered as they relate to the position and do not automatically disqualify someone from a contract or employment with the company.
  5. All positions require a trial period of approximately 2-3 weeks with a minimum commitment of 10 hours per week. You will be paid for this short-term contract, and it will be used to evaluate whether both parties want to pursue an ongoing, regular employment relationship.

### Benefits

Full-time telecommuting with a company that has been 100% remote for over 8
years.

###

### **Diversity at Defiant**

We value diversity and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion or
creed, national origin or ancestry, sex, age, physical or mental disability,
military or veteran status, gender identity or expression, marital status,
sexual orientation, political ideology, economic status, parental status, or
any other non-performance-related status.

* * *

postTitle: Python Developer (US Only)
descContent:
Lincoln Freedom Group, LLC is hiring a Python Developer on behalf of a growing
client expanding into multiple new markets. This is a full-time 1099 contract
role (40 hours/week) for someone who can take well-defined stories and deliver
clean, reliable code.

**What You'll Do:** You'll work from Jira tickets with clear acceptance
criteria, building and maintaining network-focused applications, so
telecom/networking context is helpful but not mandatory. This role emphasizes
independence - you'll own your stories from pickup to completion, with senior
developer support available when needed. Code quality matters more than raw
velocity.

**The Tech Stack:**

  * Python (Django, FastAPI)
  * SQLAlchemy
  * REST/SOAP API clients
  * Kafka
  * PostgreSQL and other standard infrastructure

**The Environment:** The team is collaborative but self-directed. Management
is hands-off, trusting developers to manage their work. You'll be joining a
team that's building out formal QA processes, so attention to detail and clean
code practices are valued.

**What We're Looking For:**

  * Professional Python development experience
  * Ability to work independently and own stories end-to-end
  * Django or FastAPI experience
  * Comfort working with APIs and data systems
  * Networking or telecom background is a plus
  * Strong communication skills for a collaborative remote environment

**Compensation:** Rate is negotiable based on experience. Submit your proposed
rate with your application.

**To Apply:** Send your resume to
[jobs@lincolnfreedomgroup.com](mailto:jobs@lincolnfreedomgroup.com). Please
include a cover letter explaining why you're interested in this specific role
and what qualities would make you a strong fit.

* * *
jobCategory: 后端开发,数据开发

postTitle: 招聘全职 全栈 Laravel PHP工程师， 6个月项目，12K/月
descContent:
1.熟练使用PHP，熟悉LAMP架构，熟练使用Laravel开发框架, 有wordpress开发经验加分。

2.熟练使用MySQL并具有优化经验。

3.能够独立完成项目，具备从0到1的项目开发经验。

5.熟悉redis有并发项目经验

6.具有良好的沟通能力。有admin 电商系统开发经验

7.兼职，远程办公，每周汇报工作情况

8. 业务范畴，行业电商订单管理SAAS工具功能开发以及维护。进销存app，含排产，工序等轻生产，简单数据可视化 echarts
9. 
9. 薪资范围， 12K CNY/月，5天8小时，纯远程
10. 面试方式，远程生产功能


### Laravel 后端开发

*   使用 **Laravel** 开发和维护后端系统
    
*   设计并实现库存、订单、翻新流程、报表等 **REST API**
    
*   编写结构清晰、可维护、可测试的代码
    
*   参与代码评审，遵循团队编码规范
    

### 库存与流程逻辑

*   实现设备生命周期状态：
    
    *   收货 / 测试 / 分级 / 入库 / 发货 / 退货 / 报废
        
*   支持**批量处理**高数量设备
    
*   确保库存流转与状态变更的准确性
    
*   避免重复库存、丢失库存和数据不一致问题
    

### 数据库与性能

*   设计并优化 **MySQL / PostgreSQL** 数据结构
    
*   熟练使用 **Eloquent / Query Builder** 编写高效查询
    
*   使用 **Laravel Jobs / Queues** 处理批量和异步任务
    
*   优化 API 性能以适配仓库场景
    

### 第三方系统集成

*   协助对接：
    
    *   Amazon Seller Central / FBA 报表
        
    *   物流平台（ShipStation、各类承运商）
        
*   编写稳定的数据同步与对账逻辑
    
*   实现 API 异常处理、重试与日志记录
*   熟悉：
    
    *   Eloquent ORM
        
    *   Migration / Seeder
        
    *   Jobs、Queues、Scheduler
        
    *   认证与权限控制（Policies / Gates）
        
*   扎实的 **MySQL / PostgreSQL** 基础
    
*   有 **RESTful API** 开发经验
    
*   熟悉 **Git** 及远程协作流程
    

### 加分项（非必须）

*   有库存 / 仓储 / ERP 系统经验
    
*   有 Amazon FBA / Seller Central 集成经验
    
*   了解 RFID 或条码系统
    
*   使用过 Redis / Horizon
    
*   有 Vue / React 后台管理系统经验

postTitle: Associate Web Merchant (Full-Time, Remote)
descContent:
## About the Role

Awe Inspired is seeking a highly detail-oriented Associate Web Merchant to
support product data, merchandising execution, and optimization of the onsite
experience.

## SITE WORK

  * Support and execute all product launches, ensuring complete accuracy in data, imagery, and site placement.

  * Own PLP remerchandising and ongoing category optimizations to improve product discovery and conversion.

  * Drive onsite merchandising, including Frequently Bought Together, Complete the Look, and other cross-merchandising strategies to increase AOV and expand basket size through cross selling and upsell merchandising. 

  * Establish and refine product data attributes to fuel site placements, filters, and sales recaps.

  * Collaborate with the site and digital teams to support storytelling, promotions, and seasonal initiatives.

  * Execute retail updates and assist with maintenance of collections, categories, and navigation flows.

  * Beyond the Awe site, this role will support merchandising and vendor management as we expand into additional online and wholesale channels

  * Manage the image catalog, including organizing assets, ensuring naming accuracy, and performing light Photoshop work on product composites when needed.

## MERCHANDISING WORK

  * Support creation of new product lists for site initiatives, wholesale partners, and brand events.

  * Assist in basic merchandising logic—identifying strong product pairings and cohesive storytelling opportunities.

  * Learn to create and edit BOMs in Cin7 and maintain accurate product component data.

  * Support the product development process through tagging, early data setup, and organization of product attributes.

  * Execute and QA product data across Cin7, PDM, Shopify, and internal systems.

## GENERAL EXPECTATIONS

  * Own assigned tasks end-to-end with reliable follow-through, attention to detail, and clear communication.

  * Maintain exceptional accuracy across all product information, attributes, and site merchandising elements.

  * Ask questions early, seek clarification, and show eagerness to learn new tools, processes, and merchandising skills.

  * Collaborate effectively with cross-functional partners, including merchandising, creative, digital, and operations.

  * Bring a proactive mindset and readiness to take on additional responsibility as skills grow.

## **QUALIFICATIONS** :

  * Experience: Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in an e-commerce role.

  * Education: Bachelor's degree required in a relevant field such as Business, Marketing, Merchandising, or Product Development.

  * Ability to work in Cin7 and PDM, or strong willingness to learn quickly.

  * Familiarity with retail math and Excel. 

## GROWTH PATH

  * Begin by developing mastery of product data accuracy, merchandising basics, and site execution.

  * Learn retail math, core e-commerce processes, and how systems interconnect across the business.

  * Grow into owning a smaller category (e.g., Ritual) end-to-end—data setup, merchandising, storytelling, and performance insights.

  * Progress to managing additional categories (e.g., Bracelets) with full-cycle responsibility as experience deepens.

## ROLE DETAILS

  * Full-time

  * Remote (international candidates welcome)

  * Reports to: Merchandise Manager

  * Strong opportunity for growth within merchandising and e-commerce

* * *
jobCategory: 运营,市场营销,数据分析

postTitle: [远程]  [AI Video/Music ] 海外内容运营负责人 & 创意剪辑师
jobTitle: 海外内容运营负责人 & 创意剪辑师
descContent:
我们是一支拥抱 AIGC 浪潮的创业团队（Team base 新加坡），专注于AI 视频生成与 AI 音乐创作领域。我们的产品旨在打破创作门槛，让每个人都能通过 AI 生成好莱坞级别的视频片段和大师级的音乐Demo。

目前产品已处于快速迭代期，我们需要一位懂海外文化、懂视频剪辑、懂社媒增长的伙伴，来帮助我们在海外市场（US/EU)，通过优质内容引爆增长。

工作性质： 全职远程（Remote） 
薪资待遇： 具有竞争力的薪资（依能力面议


💼 你要做的事 (Responsibilities)

这是一个 “内容创作 + 社媒运营”的复合型岗位。你既是我们的首席创作者，也是海外增长的操盘手。

1.  AI 内容魔术师（视频剪辑 & 二创）：
    
深度使用我们的 AI 产品生成素材，结合 CapCut/AE 等工具，制作具有病毒传播潜力的短视频（TikTok, Reels, Shorts）。紧跟海外 Meme、热梗和流行音乐趋势，将我们的 AI 技术与热点结合，产出高质量的 Demo 视频。
        
2.  海外社媒操盘 (Social Media Growth)：
    
 负责 TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter (X) 等官方账号的 0-1 搭建与日常运营。    
 熟悉各平台算法机制，制定发布节奏，对视频的完播率、互动率负责。
        
3.  社区与用户互动 (Community)：
    
 运营 Discord 社区，与早期硬核用户（Designers, Creators）保持高频互动，收集反馈反哺产品。用 Native 的英语口语/书面语回复评论，建立品牌“活人感”。
        

期望 (Requirements)

1. 5年以上海外留学或工作经验（必须）：拥有 Native 级别的英语语感。你必须真正理解欧美文化语境，能精准通过内容击中海外用户痛点。
    
2. 熟练的视频剪辑能力：熟练使用 Final Cut / 剪映专业版，有良好的审美和节奏感。如果不精通剪辑，请勿投递。
    
能力要求

极强的网感：TikTok/YouTube/X/Instagram 重度用户，对 AI Video（如 Veo, Runway, Sora）和 AI Music（如 Suno, Udio）有浓厚兴趣，甚至你自己就是这些工具的付费用户。
    
自驱力与闭环思维：远程工作需要极强的自律性。不需要我每天盯着你发几条推文，你需要自己发现运营数据的问题，并提出解决方案（比如：为什么这条视频没火？下一条怎么改进？）。
    
AI 工具流： 能够熟练使用 ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude 等工具提升工作流效率。
    

加分项 (Bonus Skills)

1. 有海外百万粉账号运营经验，或打造过 10w+ 播放量的爆款视频。
2. 有音乐制作或者设计背景，或者对视听语言有独到理解。
3. 熟悉 Growth Hacking，懂得如何利用低成本获取流量。有Google/Facebook Ads经验。
   

Don't just watch the AI revolution. Be the one who edits it.🚀
jobCategory: 内容创作,市场营销,用户增长,视频剪辑,运营

postTitle: Business Development Manager
descContent:
**The Opportunity**

This is an opportunity to shape the growth of a search firm redefining what
excellence looks like in deep-tech recruitment. You’ll drive client
acquisition and build partnerships that power tomorrow’s technologies —
semiconductors, photonics, lasers, robotics, and advanced electronics. You’ll
work directly with Chris Thiel, Co-Founder and Head of Business Development,
to expand Insight’s reach and reputation across Europe, Asia and North
America. We don’t chase volume; we build trust, momentum, and meaningful
relationships that last. At Insight, we’re not interested in clock-watching —
we care about outcomes. You’ll have the freedom to own your market,
experiment, and make visible impact in a firm where results, relationships,
and integrity come first.

**Your Impact**

In your first 12–18 months, you will:

-Define and execute a growth plan that expands Insight’s footprint in high-value deep-tech markets.

\- Build a qualified pipeline of new clients and convert leads into retained
search partnerships.

\- Represent Insight at key industry events, developing lasting relationships
with founders and leaders.

\- Collaborate with marketing to co-create outreach campaigns and thought-
leadership initiatives. - Establish Insight’s voice on LinkedIn through
content, engagement, and authentic conversation.

\- Use automation and AI tools to enhance, not replace, human connection —
ensuring efficiency with empathy. You’ll be trusted to experiment, refine, and
deliver — your success will directly shape how Insight grows.

**About You**

You’re a connector and a closer — disciplined, focused, and commercially
sharp. Structure and routine help you thrive, and you use them to stay
persistent, organized, and effective. You spot opportunities others miss,
follow through reliably, and make smart adjustments when needed.

You’re an exceptional communicator who thinks on your feet, expresses ideas
clearly, and genuinely enjoys conversations, presenting, and building
meaningful relationships. Your energy is positive and contagious — you
naturally get others excited about what you’re working on.

Trust matters to you. You enjoy working hard with others to reach shared
goals, and your ability to form deep, authentic connections turns every
conversation into momentum.

You’ll thrive here if you:

-Love building networks and transforming conversations into strong partnerships.

-Lean into routine, structure, and focus to stay consistent and results-driven.

-Combine commercial drive with emotional intelligence and confident communication.

-Are digitally fluent and comfortable using LinkedIn for social selling and visibility.

-Embrace AI and automation to streamline outreach while keeping relationships at the centre.

-Work autonomously, taking direction well while proactively finding creative ways to open doors. -Believe in quality over quantity — you’d rather build five deep partnerships than fifty surface-level ones.

-Bring enthusiasm and positivity that elevates the people around you.

**Your Background**

\- 3+ years in business development, client acquisition, or consultative sales
(executive search, professional services, or B2B preferred).

\- Proven track record managing the full sales cycle — from outreach to close.

\- Confident communicator (written, spoken, and digital) who engages senior
stakeholders naturally.

\- Skilled in content-driven outreach and engagement — especially on LinkedIn.

\- Experienced with cold outreach across multiple channels: phone, email, and
social. - Strong organization and ownership in a remote, asynchronous
environment.

\- Fluent in English; proficiency in German or French is highly desirable
(other languages a plus). - Exposure to or curiosity about deep-tech
industries is a strong advantage.  
\- Familiarity with CRMs preferred.

**Key Outcomes**

\- Pipeline coverage of at least 3× annual revenue target.

\- Conversion of new retained client partnerships within 3–6 months.

\- Tangible contribution to group revenue and client diversity.

\- Increased market visibility and measurable inbound activity from digital
engagement.

\- Active collaboration with marketing to generate sustained lead flow.

**Working at Insight Technology Search**

We’re a small, sharp, collaborative team with over 35 years of combined
experience and 99% of our work retained — proof that clients trust us with
their most important hires. We operate remotely by design, built on trust,
autonomy, and results. Our core values guide everything we do:

_Customers First_ – anticipate needs, deliver quality, build trust.
Collaborative – communicate openly and share generously.

_Growth-Oriented_ – seek feedback, stay curious, improve continuously.

_Solutions-Focused_ – bring proposals, not problems.

_Tenacious_ – persist through challenges and own outcomes.

We invest in our people with tailored training, opportunities to travel, and
in-person team meetups across Europe. You’ll find genuine balance here —
freedom to work flexibly, support to grow, and the satisfaction of seeing your
impact.

**Compensation, Benefits & Perks**

-€50,000 base salary with uncapped commission. On-Target Earnings (OTE) of €100,000+ based on achieving performance targets.

\- Fully remote — complete home office setup provided

\- Flexible schedule — autonomy to design your day around outcomes, not hours

\- Generous paid time off

\- Professional development budget for courses and growth goals

\- Annual team meetups and client travel opportunities across Europe and the
US

\- A culture built on trust, collaboration, and real work-life balance

**Our Hiring Process**

We believe recruitment should be transparent and thoughtful — designed to help
you assess us as much as we assess you.

1\. Application Review – Every application is reviewed for alignment with our
goals and values.

2\. Skills Challenge (role-dependent) – A short, practical exercise reflecting
real work.

3\. Interviews (3 total) - Technical Interview – Experience, pipeline
approach, and results. - Values & Culture – Communication, curiosity, and team
fit. - Final Interview – Alignment on expectations and growth goals.

4\. Assessments (if applicable) – Kolbe and CliftonStrengths for understanding
how you work best.

5\. Reference Checks – Validation from a former manager and peer.

6\. Offer & Onboarding – A clear, supported 30-60-90 day ramp-up plan.

 _**We anticipate conducting interviews starting in mid-January 2026.**_

**How to Apply**

Instead of a traditional cover letter, please provide your CV/ Resume, your
LinkedIn profile and answers to the questions below.

1\. What most excites you about this role and our focus on the deep-tech
sector?

2\. Tell us about a time you built a client relationship from scratch — what
was your approach and what was the result?

  
You may complete our application here: <https://tally.so/r/rj5Wgo>

Not sure you meet every requirement? Apply anyway. We value potential,
mindset, and learning agility as much as experience.

* * *
jobCategory: 销售,市场营销,咨询,项目管理

postTitle: Remote Sales Representative
descContent:
## Remote Sales Representative (US Market)

**Location:** Remote (Worldwide)  
**Type:** Full-time  
**Compensation:** Base + Uncapped Commission (USD)

* * *

### About Credit Joy

**Credit Joy** helps people overcome credit challenges and take control of
their financial future. We’re a remote-first company serving clients across
the United States and are growing our inbound sales team.

We’re looking for **experienced, English-fluent remote sales professionals**
who are confident on the phone, disciplined with follow-ups, and motivated by
performance-based earnings.

* * *

### What You’ll Do

  * Handle **20–30 inbound calls per day** with qualified leads

  * Run structured sales conversations and close consistently

  * Average **3+ sales per day**

  * Follow proven scripts, processes, and CRM workflows

  * Work closely with your sales coach to hit weekly and monthly goals

* * *

### What We’re Looking For

  * Sales, call center, or commission-based experience

  * **Excellent spoken English** (clear, professional, confident)

  * Strong closing ability and comfort with phone-based sales

  * Reliable high-speed internet (cabled) and quiet workspace

  * Laptop or desktop computer (8GB RAM minimum) and headset with mic

  * Self-motivated, coachable, and consistent

Remote sales experience is a plus, but not required

* * *

### Compensation & Growth

  * **Base pay + uncapped commission (USD)**

  * Top performers earn **$3,000–$5,000+ USD/month**

  * 100% remote, work from anywhere

  * Ongoing sales training and one-on-one coaching

  * Clear path to advancement - we promote from within

postTitle: 招募高级全栈兼职--用AI增强重新定义营销体系新时代
descContent:
#### 公司介绍&业务产品：
    我们是一个目前拿到美元天使轮的海外营销SAAS产品的初创公司，用AI增强的爬虫技术颠覆国际营销体系，专注于 B2B 营销与销售领域的创业公司，面向全球市场提供端到端的AI Agent应用服务。  
在这里，我们不只是做一款产品，而是在重构全球商业交易的未来基础设施。

该岗位主要工作是构建AI Agent数字员工，使其自主完成高价值工作任务，包含前后端开发、基础设施管理等，涉及RAG、Prompt Engineering、ReAct、TypeScript、Python等相关技术

任职要求：
1. 3年以上工作经验，计算机专业本科以上（能力特别突出可适当放宽要求）
2. TypeScript（React/Next.js）、Python (FastAPI / Celery) /、AWS / Postgres / Docker / Kubenetes)、等前后端技术栈，前后端各一种以上，能力突出、经历对口优先
3.有大型分布式系统设计及工程实现经验，熟悉Kafka、RabbitMQ、Redis等消息中间件的高并发场景下疑难杂症处理
4. 日常熟练使用Cursor、GitHub Copilot等AI开发工具进行工程实现和测试，习惯使用突破性思维提高开发效率（需提供代码示例）
5. 对新技术有敏感度，能适应初创公司工作节奏，快速迭代、快速验证

- 核心素质
  - 善于利用AI工具提升开发效率（需提供代码示例），对自动化开发有强烈兴趣
  - 具备快速学习新技术的能力
  - 有开源项目贡献或技术博客者优先

postTitle: [有偿求助] 诚寻 TK 逆向 / 数据抓取 / 验证码解码技术伙伴
jobTitle: TK逆向/数据抓取/验证码解码技术伙伴
descContent:
各位技术大神好！  
本人目前有一批 TikTok 相关的技术需求亟待解决，现诚心寻找精通 TK
逆向、数据抓取、验证码解码的技术人才合作，酬劳丰厚，具体可根据技术难度和完成质量商议，有意向的朋友欢迎私聊！  
  
具体需求如下  
TK 店铺后台达人数据获取：能够逆向解析 TK 店铺后台接口，实现达人合作数据（包括达人账号信息、合作订单数据、佣金结算明细等）的稳定抓取与导出；  
站内信相关逆向与数据提取：突破平台限制，获取店铺 / 账号的站内信内容、发送方信息、时间戳等数据，并支持结构化整理；  
验证码解码能力：针对 TK 各类场景下的验证码（包括滑块验证、点选验证、图形验证等），提供高效的自动识别或解码方案，满足批量操作需求。  
  
我们希望你具备  
有扎实的逆向工程功底，熟悉 Web/ 安卓 /iOS 端 APP 逆向、协议分析，能独立处理加解密逻辑；  
精通网络抓包、接口调试，对 HTTPS/HTTP2 协议有深入理解；  
有验证码识别、爬虫对抗相关实战经验者优先；  
具备良好的沟通能力，能及时反馈技术进展，确保需求落地。  
  
合作说明  
纯技术合作，全程保密，数据仅用于合法合规的业务分析；  
酬劳结算灵活，可按项目打包付费，也可按阶段验收结算；  
长期有效，若合作愉快，后续可建立稳定的技术合作关系。  
  
有相关技术能力或资源的大神，欢迎直接私信我，附上你的技术案例或过往经验，期待与各位大佬携手解决问题！
salary: 酬劳丰厚，按项目或阶段结算

postTitle: PHP Laravel Developer Needed ROCKSTARS ONLY
jobTitle: PHP Laravel Developer Needed ROCKSTARS ONLY
descContent:
# If you are looking for a comfy gig that doesn't challenge you to think
differently and get creative...please do not apply for this role.

WE ARE LOOKING TO HAND SELECT A SKILLED DEVELOPER TO REPORT DIRECTLY TO OUR
CTO AND CEO!

Details around this role can be found below.

In order to be considered for this role, please include one of your favorite
jokes!!! That way we know you read through the entirety of this job posting!

# **About Agent Legend**

Agent Legend is a fast-growing SaaS company building advanced AI-driven
communication tools that help businesses connect with their customers in
smarter, more personal ways. Our platform powers automated conversations
across SMS, email, voice, and more — enabling small businesses to scale
without losing their personal touch.

We’re looking for a skilled PHP/Laravel Developer to join our team and help us
build scalable backend systems, API integrations, and real-time messaging
services.

**What You’ll Do**

  * Develop, maintain, and optimize our Laravel-based backend applications.
  * Work with queues (Beanstalkd, Redis, Supervisor) to manage large-scale workloads.
  * Build and integrate APIs (internal + 3rd-party like CRMs, messaging platforms, payment systems).
  * Write clean, efficient, and testable code following modern PHP best practices.
  * Collaborate with our AI and frontend teams to deliver new features.
  * Troubleshoot production issues and optimize for performance and scalability.  

**What We’re Looking For**

✅ Strong experience with PHP 8+ and Laravel (5+ years preferred).

✅ Experience with queues (Beanstalkd, Redis, Supervisor, Horizon).

✅ Solid knowledge of MySQL (indexes, performance optimization, migrations).

✅ Experience with RESTful APIs, webhooks, and integrations.

✅ Familiarity with Vue.js or modern frontend frameworks (bonus).

✅ Comfortable with Git, Docker, and Linux servers.

✅ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

✅ Self-starter who thrives in a remote, collaborative environment.

  

**Nice-to-Haves**

  * Experience with CRM integrations (HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.).
  * Background in AI/ML-driven applications.
  * Experience scaling high-concurrency systems.
  * Familiarity with telephony (Twilio, Plivo) or messaging APIs.

Submit your resume (& your joke) to careers@agentlegend.com if you are
genuinely excited to join our team!

Please mention the word **DEVOUT** when applying to show you read the job post
completely (#RMTE4LjEwMC45NS4xODE=). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$50,000 — $70,000/year
jobCategory: 后端开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: Business Operations Manager (Commercial Operations) at Metabase
jobTitle: Business Operations Manager (Commercial Operations) at Metabase
descContent:
Metabase is the easiest way for people to get insights from their data, from
tiny startups who get up and running quickly to major corporations with tens
of thousands of users. That's why people [love
us](https://www.metabase.com/love).

  

We bring data tools with the elegance and simplicity of consumer products to
the crufty world of enterprise business intelligence. We provide an
opinionated open source starting point for how companies should measure,
analyze and share their data, which is used by tens of thousands of companies.

  

Metabase’s BizOps & Finance team is a small, high-leverage group that builds
the systems keeping the company running smoothly behind the scenes. We cover a
wide range of areas — finance and accounting, sales operations, legal
operations, compliance, and account management — but we treat them all as
flavors of operations. Whatever the task, we take a systems-driven approach —
design it, build it, and run it (ideally, automatically). Our goal is to free
the rest of the company to focus on building great software.

  

We’re looking for a high-powered generalist with strong verbal and analytical
reasoning skills to own and run our **commercial operations**. In this role,
you’ll be responsible for the systems and processes that underpin how we
contract with customers and manage commercial risk, helping us close deals
efficiently and serve a broader range of customers. You’ll manage contracting,
partner closely with internal teams and external counsel to make business
decisions on risk, and lead key compliance initiatives, translating complex
requirements into practical, scalable processes. This role is well-suited to
someone who is comfortable moving between big-picture thinking and detailed
execution, and who enjoys turning ambiguous problems into working systems that
reduce friction and help the business grow.

Metabase’s BizOps & Finance team is a small, high-leverage group that builds
the systems keeping the company running smoothly behind the scenes. We cover a
wide range of areas — finance and accounting, sales operations, legal
operations, compliance, and account management — but we treat them all as
flavors of operations. Whatever the task, we take a systems-driven approach —
design it, build it, and run it (ideally, automatically). Our goal is to free
the rest of the company to focus on building great software.

  

We’re looking for a high-powered generalist with strong verbal and analytical
reasoning skills to own and run our **commercial operations**. In this role,
you’ll be responsible for the systems and processes that underpin how we
contract with customers and manage commercial risk, helping us close deals
efficiently and serve a broader range of customers. You’ll manage contracting,
partner closely with internal teams and external counsel to make business
decisions on risk, and lead key compliance initiatives, translating complex
requirements into practical, scalable processes. This role is well-suited to
someone who is comfortable moving between big-picture thinking and detailed
execution, and who enjoys turning ambiguous problems into working systems that
reduce friction and help the business grow.

### Responsibilities

* Partner with external counsel and our Sales team to identify and mitigate business risks during contract reviews
* Maintain and update contract templates, terms of service, privacy policies, and related documents
* Improve and maintain systems that support our commercial operations (e.g. routing contract reviews, implementing and building-out our contract management system)
* Drive compliance-enhancement projects to reduce risk and expand our ability to serve regulated and enterprise customers.
* Note that this is not a people-management role

### About you

* You come from either a generalist business background (e.g. consulting, operations) or a legal background and are excited to expand beyond a purely legal role into commercial and operational decision-making
* You are a structured, analytical thinker with strong verbal reasoning skills, comfortable working with complex written materials and ambiguous problems
* You are comfortable working with numbers and have the ability and interest to learn financial concepts
* You can reason through business processes end-to-end and have the aptitude to improve or automate them over time
* You collaborate effectively with internal stakeholders and external experts (e.g. lawyers, customers)
* You are organized, able to manage multiple projects in parallel, and reliably drive work to completion
* You have demonstrated sound judgment, ownership, and a bias for action in fast-paced environments
* You bring a low-ego attitude — no job is too small or too large
* Strong academic background with evidence of analytical rigor
* Nice-to-have: MBA

We're a global team (50% outside the US), fully distributed (from Thailand to
California), who get things done asynchronously, with plenty of uninterrupted
time, supporting each other to do the best work of our careers. We offer
flexibility (define your own schedule and work from wherever you want),
autonomy, and an environment that fosters growth, learning, and development.
We're relentlessly user-focused and believe in building long-term value, not
short-term hacks. And we raised a $30M Series B to take our approach to the
next level for years to come.

  

For U.S. applicants: Metabase participates in the federal E-Verify program,
which confirms employment authorization of newly hired U.S. based employees.
E-Verify is not used as a tool to pre-screen candidates and is only initiated
upon hire.

  

[E-Verify Participation
Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/EVerifyParticipationPoster.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

[Right to Work
Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/IER_RightToWorkPoster%20Eng_Es.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

Metabase is the easiest way for people to get insights from their data, from
tiny startups who get up and running quickly to major corporations with tens
of thousands of users. That's why people [love
us](https://www.metabase.com/love).

  

We bring data tools with the elegance and simplicity of consumer products to
the crufty world of enterprise business intelligence. We provide an
opinionated open source starting point for how companies should measure,
analyze and share their data, which is used by tens of thousands of companies.
jobCategory: 运营,法务,财务,项目管理,咨询

postTitle: SENIOR HR ASSISTANT (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
jobTitle: SENIOR HR ASSISTANT (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
descContent:
**Wishpond Technologies currently has the position of Senior Human Resources
Assistant available, and we’re excited to tell you about it !**

**Please note, this position is expected to work an 8-hour day shift (Pacific
time zone, GMT-8). The business language used in this position is English, so
please ensure your resume is in English, as well as your answers to any of the
questions we have included as part of the application process.**

**OVERVIEW**

We are excited to welcome a new Senior Human Resources Assistant to join us on
a full-time basis, in this 100% remote position. You will work with a small
but amazing remote team servicing and building relationships with 200+ global
Team Members. This is a supervisory role overseeing the HR Assistants while at
the same time equally contributing to a highly administrative department. The
successful applicant must be extremely confidential, given the nature of the
data and information collected within the department. In collaboration with
the HR Team and all departments, the Senior HR Assistant is responsible for
the success of Wishpond Technologies Ltd.

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

• Assist with and oversee the daily administration of the department,
including requests from both internal and external customers and stakeholders

• Oversee, mentor, and coach the HR Assistants (2-3 Team Members), ensuring
assignment of tasks, completion of tasks and their personal development

• Ensure alignment with overall goals while promoting cross-team collaboration
and continuous improvement.

• Create policies, procedures and processes, ensuring alignment with internal
and external requirements

• Oversee recruitment, onboarding and offboarding programs and processes

• Process Team Member’s requests and provide relevant information on the
resolution of concerns and a clear understanding of processes, while referring
special communications to the appropriate person

• Prepare reports and documentation for internal communications within the HR
department

• Verify employment background checks by contacting references (via email)

• General administration, including file maintenance, data entry, control and
verification, and preparation and distribution of reports

• Perform other leadership duties as required to support departmental
efficiency, employee development, and organizational success.

• Other duties as assigned.

**QUALIFICATIONS**

• 2-3 years of experience in administration, preferably within an HR-related
environment

• Experience with team leadership, training and task assignments

• Ability to handle sensitive and highly confidential information

• Solid data entry experience with a minimum of 50wpm typing

• Passionate about HR policies and procedures and wants to help create a
nourishing workplace

• PC literacy and experience with MS Office applications

• A degree or diploma that contributes to the organization or role is
considered an asset

• Must be very detail-oriented, creative, and have a passion for helping
others achieve their goals

• Self-motivated with the ability to establish and maintain solid
relationships through a client-first mentality

• As part of a diverse team, the ability to work both independently and
collaboratively in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment

• Must be technical and analytical, and have the ability to manage complex
projects seamlessly

• Organized, administratively strong, great time management, and have solid
writing, phone, and general communication skills

• Fluent in English (spoken and written). Knowledge of a second language is
considered an asset

**WORK ENVIRONMENT**

• This is a 100% remote position, and the individual could be based anywhere
outside of Canada

• Given the nature of this role, it is expected that the successful candidate
will provide their own workstation, computer, and headset and have a fast and
reliable internet connection. Certain roles will be required to utilize and or
download company-approved software.

• The individual must be prepared to work standard business hours in the
Pacific Time Zone

• Due to the nature of this role, we may verify backgrounds, including
conducting employment references, criminal records, and credit checks.

• Once hired, the successful candidate must provide a governmental photo ID
and proof of residential address as part of the onboarding process

**GREAT REASONS TO APPLY FOR THIS ROLE**

• Fully remote position allowing you to work from your home anywhere in the
world!

• Exciting and dynamic environment with a great leadership team

• Comprehensive training program and regular performance reviews to facilitate
your success

• Competitive compensation based on experience and proven abilities

• Great referral programs with incentives and bonuses

• Unbelievable product discounts when you use our products for your own
business

• A global workforce of multicultural and talented colleagues

• A close-knit operation with amazing growth opportunities for your personal
development

• A high-growth SaaS technology company publicly traded on the TSX Venture
Exchange

• Corporate headquarters in beautiful Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

• Access to our education credits program and so much more!

**ABOUT US**

Founded in 2009, Wishpond is a rapidly growing technology company providing
digital marketing solutions targeted at small businesses. The cloud-based
platform includes landing pages, social promotions, website pop-ups, online
forms, and lead activity tracking. Wishpond has a dedicated team of
professional project managers, designers, copywriters, and developers who
provide marketing services tailored to our individual clients.

Wishpond serves over 3,000 customers in various industries and sizes, from
startups to large Fortune 500 companies. Wishpond has a rapidly growing global
headcount and continues to hire dedicated and qualified employees and
contractors who have what it takes to scale a successful software company.

To learn more about Wishpond Technologies, please visit our website or any of
our social media platforms:

Website: [www.wishpond.com](http://www.wishpond.com/)

Instagram: @wishpondofficial

Twitter: Wishpond

YouTube: Thewishpond

LinkedIn: Wishpond

**APPLICATION PROCESS**

**If you are interested in applying for this exciting opportunity, please
provide an updated resume IN ENGLISH (PDF or Word formats only), quoting the
position title in the subject line of your cover letter**

Wishpond Technologies is an equal-opportunity employer committed to hiring a
diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture that does not
discriminate on the basis of disability, status or any other basis protected
under legislation.

We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position;
however, due to the volume of applications we receive, we are unable to
respond to phone, email or agency inquiries.

  

**Internal applications for this role must be submitted no later than December
19, 2025**
jobCategory: 人力资源

postTitle: 招聘远程兼职有经验的产品经理，产品原型设计和优化，可长期合作
descContent:
产品经理（远程兼职-按项目付费）
职位类型：远程兼职，按项目付费（Case by Case）  
薪资范围：3k-8k/项目（根据原型复杂度及调整范围协商）  
工作周期：灵活，以交付结果为导向（通常1-4周/项目）  
交付内容

1.  原型优化与细化：基于已有产品原型，结合用户需求及业务目标，调整功能逻辑、交互流程及界面布局，输出高保真原型及详细需求文档。
    
2.  需求分析：深度理解客户需求，识别原型中的逻辑断点并提出优化方案，确保设计符合业务场景及技术可行性。
    
3.  跨团队协作：与设计、开发团队紧密沟通，跟进原型落地，解决实施过程中的问题，确保交付质量。
    
4.  数据驱动优化：根据用户反馈及测试结果，持续迭代原型设计，提升产品用户体验。
    
任职要求

1.  经验与技能：
    
    *   4年以上产品经理经验，独立完成过至少3个完整项目原型设计及迭代；
        
    *   精通Axure、墨刀、Figma等原型工具，熟练输出交互流程图及PRD文档；
        
    *   熟悉B端/C端产品设计逻辑，有电商、SaaS、工具类产品经验者优先。
        
2.  核心能力：
    
    *   逻辑清晰，能快速抽象业务需求并转化为标准化方案；
        
    *   具备较强的沟通能力，适应远程协作模式，能高效管理项目进度。
        
3.  加分项：
    
    *   了解AI工具（如大模型应用），能结合技术趋势优化设计；
        
    *   有良好审美能力，原型设计时能做出简洁美观的高保真原型。
        
薪酬与福利

按项目付费：根据原型复杂度及交付周期阶梯定价，单项目结算；
    
灵活合作：支持全远程办公，无固定坐班要求，每周确保2次以上远程沟通，
    
长期机会：优秀者可转为长期合作，参与更多高价值产品规划及商业化项目。
    
自有项目：我们不是第三方外包公司，项目都是自己的，如果合作很契合，可以深度参与项目中
jobCategory: 产品经理,UI&UX,项目管理
