postTitle: Product Manager
descContent:
Zencargo is looking for an experienced Product Manager to work in one of our
cross-functional Experience Teams.

  

The role works alongside our other Product Managers to deliver our product
strategy which will help us realise our vision of a world with smarter trade,
and our mission of making our customers’ supply chain their competitive
advantage.

  

Our platform is a web application with features that enable customers to
capture their products and suppliers; plan and book their shipping; track
shipments to arrival; pay for shipping; and analyse their supply chain
performance. We provide the platform, combined with our freight services, to
major retailers across the globe, with a particular focus on the UK and EU. We
have an exciting vision for the platform over the coming years so there will
be opportunities to build market-leading and market-first features that
satisfy and delight our users.

We are looking for candidates who

  * appreciate complexity and love distilling vast information down to its essence
  * value outcomes over outputs and adapt to what they learn
  * love building relationships with a squad to form a high-performing team
  * take ownership and are comfortable working with stakeholders across seniority levels

  
  

  
  

Key Responsibilities

  * Carry out user research and analyse opportunities by staying close to our customers, suppliers, and competitors
  * Work with the wider business to understand requirements and facilitate product launches
  * Collaborate with designers & software engineers to develop solutions that meet users’ needs and further the aims of the product strategy
  * Support engineers to iteratively deliver releases based on feedback led by you
  * Communicate progress and promote your team’s efforts to all stakeholders internally 
  * Define and track the metrics which show the impact of your team’s work
  * Act as the customer’s voice in prioritisation

  

  
  

Skills, Knowledge and Expertise

  * Worked as a product manager or adjacent role in a software organisation
  * Demonstrable passion for solving customer problems
  * Focused on delivering and measuring outcomes
  * An ability to translate user needs and product strategy into successful solutions
  * A curiosity to explore and communicate new problem spaces
  * Excellent collaboration skills both leading execution across teams and influencing across the organisation
jobCategory: 产品经理,项目管理,UI&UX,运营,数据分析

postTitle: Content Producer
descContent:
##  

[**Original job post link**](https://garden3d.notion.site/Content-Producer-
Part-Time-2a6131fea2c780a696f0ec3dfbfa7ac8?pvs=73)  

## 🌎 About garden3d

We are worker owned creative collective, innovating on everything from brands
and IRL communities to IoT devices and cross platform apps. We share profit,
open source everything, spin out new businesses, and invest in exciting ideas
through financial and/or in-kind contributions.
([garden3d](https://garden3d.net/))

Our client roster includes [Google](https://www.google.com/),
[Stripe](https://stripe.com/), [Figma](https://www.figma.com/),
[Hinge](https://hinge.co/), [Black Socialists in
America](https://blacksocialists.us/), [ACLU](https://www.aclu.org/),
[Pratt](https://www.pratt.edu/),
[Parsons](https://www.newschool.edu/parsons/),
[Mozilla](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/), [The Nobel
Prize](https://www.nobelprize.org/), [MIT](https://www.mit.edu/),
[Gnosis](https://www.gnosis.io/), [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/) &
[Gagosian](https://gagosian.com/). We’re the software team behind innovative
products like [The Light Phone](https://www.thelightphone.com/) &
[Mill](https://www.mill.com/), and we a global, decentralized community space
collective called [Index Space](https://www.index-space.org/).

We think of our garden3d as collective for creative people, prioritizing a
happy, talented, and diverse studio culture. We offer competitive pay,
comprehensive benefits, and progressive policies. We work on projects that
bring value to our world, and we balance deep care for the work we do with a
genuine curiosity about life outside of our jobs. (And, yes, we can back all
of that up!)

**Sanctuary Computer — Development**

At [Sanctuary Computer](https://www.sanctuary.computer/) we’re building a
different type of technology shop – one that prioritizes close collaboration
between the client and the craftsperson. Our projects range from design-
forward websites, to robust web apps, to native mobile development.

**XXIX — Design**

When we started [XXIX](https://www.xxix.co/) in 2013, we set out to create a
different kind of design studio and we’ve thrived because we continually ask
what a creative practice can be. We’re building a radically different kind of
organization that values autonomy, growth, transparency, and shared
responsibility.

**Index Space — Community**

A network of physical spaces all around the world, [Index](https://www.index-
space.org/) provides space for the exchange of knowledge and tools. We nurture
trust within the creative community through generosity and abundance of ideas
and care.

**Seaborne — Sustainability**

[Seaborne](https://www.seaborne.nyc/) work withs purpose driven companies that
want to take meaningful action on contemporary social and environmental
issues, guiding them through each step of the way from strategy to
storytelling.

## ⛰️ The Content Producer role

We're seeking a Content Producer to transform raw audio, video, and other
materials into compelling short-form videos, polished audio assets, and
interactive content for garden3d. You'll identify the most impactful
soundbites and moments, then craft them into narratives that authentically
represent our collective across social media, long-form platforms, and
interactive experiences.

Your editorial eye and taste are key. We need someone who instinctively
recognizes what resonates. What stops the scroll, builds connection, and feels
distinctly garden3d. You'll develop a cohesive visual and sonic signature
while working autonomously to bring stories to life with strong pacing,
composition, and narrative sensibility.

Technically, you should be proficient in video editing, audio production,
color grading, and motion graphics using tools like Adobe Premiere, After
Effects, and audio editing software like Ableton Live or similar. You'll add
transitions, effects, and captions to deliver professional-grade content
optimized for each platform, working efficiently across formats and technical
requirements.

## **Responsibilities:**

  * **Content Strategy & Curation**
    * Review and audit raw video, audio, and multimedia assets from across garden3d studios
    * Identify standout moments, quotes, and visual elements that align with brand voice and platform best practices
    * Develop content calendars and storylines that showcase our work, culture, and values
    * Stay ahead of platform trends and algorithm changes to maximize reach and engagement
  * **Brand Voice & Creative Direction**
    * Develop and maintain a cohesive visual and sonic identity across all content
    * Exercise strong editorial judgment to ensure content authentically represents garden3d's values and aesthetic
    * Experiment with new formats, styles, and approaches to keep content fresh and engaging
    * Balance creativity with strategic goals to drive awareness, engagement, and community building
  * **Video Production & Editing**
    * Edit short-form video content optimized for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube Shorts, and other platforms
    * Apply color grading, motion graphics, transitions, and effects to create polished, on-brand content
    * Add captions, subtitles, and text overlays for accessibility and engagement
    * Ensure proper aspect ratios, file formats, and technical specifications for each platform
  * **Audio Production**
    * Clean, mix, and master audio from interviews, podcasts, and internal recordings
    * Create audio snippets and soundbites for social media, podcasts, and promotional use
    * Add music, sound design, and audio effects to enhance storytelling
    * Optimize audio levels and quality for various distribution channels
  * **Collaboration & Communication**
    * Work closely with leadership and team members to understand project goals and messaging priorities
    * Provide creative input and recommendations on how to best capture and share our work
    * Communicate progress, timelines, and deliverables clearly and proactively
    * Operate autonomously while remaining open to feedback and iteration
  * **Performance & Optimization**
    * Monitor content performance metrics and audience engagement across platforms
    * Use insights to refine content strategy and improve future output
    * Test different formats, hooks, and storytelling approaches to maximize impact
    * Archive and organize assets for future use and reference

## Qualifications

This is a great opportunity for someone looking to make a significant impact
in a growing, dynamic company. You’ll be a key partner in shaping our
financial future while ensuring we remain a sustainable and thriving
organization.

Based on the responsibilities of this role, we think the right candidate has
at least 5+ years in a similar role, sporting the following experience and
skills:

**🔑 Must have:**

  * 5+ years of experience in video editing and content production, with a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in short-form video for social media platforms
  * Advanced proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and other industry-standard video editing tools
  * Strong audio production skills, including experience with mixing, mastering, and audio editing software (e.g., Ableton Live, Adobe Audition, or similar)
  * Demonstrated editorial judgment and ability to identify compelling moments and narratives from raw footage
  * Deep understanding of platform-specific best practices and content optimization for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube Shorts, and emerging platforms
  * Experience with color grading, motion graphics, and visual effects to create polished, professional content
  * Strong storytelling abilities with excellent pacing, composition, and narrative sensibility
  * Ability to work autonomously while managing multiple projects and deadlines efficiently
  * Exceptional analytical skills with attention to detail and accuracy
  * Able to be online between Pacific Standard Time (UTC-8) and Central European Time (UTC+2).

**🧁 Nice-to-have:**

  * Fluency in AI tools like RunwayML, Midjourney, Fuser Studio, etc
  * Fluency in node-based tools like TouchDesigner, MaxMSP
  * Experience with OBS, live streaming and real-time content production
  * Knowledge of 3D animation, CGI, or immersive media production
  * Background in documentary filmmaking or long-form storytelling
  * Experience working with creative agencies, design studios, or technology collectives
  * Proficiency with additional creative tools such as DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, or Blender
  * Background in photography or graphic design to complement video work
  * Experience creating content for creative audiences, strategy consultancies, and/or thought leadership platforms
  * Ability to create interactive content or experiences for web and mobile platforms
  * Experience with community management and audience engagement strategies
  * Understanding of content performance metrics and data-driven optimization strategies

## 🧗 Who you are

The person we’re looking for is happy, relaxed and easy to get along with and
appreciates a commitment to a culture of transparency, non-dictatorial
leadership styles, and alternative methodologies. They’re flexible on anything
except conceits that will lower their usually outstanding work quality. They
work “smart” by carefully managing their workflow and team.

## 🎤 **How we interview**

After you submit your application, a member of our team will reach out. Our
interview process starts with an intro call to answer any questions you have
about the role and to learn a bit more about your experience and interests.

From there, we’ll follow up with a panel interview call where you get to meet
a few members of our team, to openly discuss some of our challenges and ensure
your skills and interests align with where we’re going as a business.

For qualified candidates, the process wraps with a reference call, and an
offer to follow.

## 👩‍🏭 **How we work:**

We believe that there’s a better balance between the poles of freelancing &
full time, and for that reason Sanctuary works differently to most shops:

  * [**Transparency & Ownership:**](https://sanctucompu.substack.com/p/our-open-source-2020-profit-and-loss) We release out Profit & Loss statements to the community each year, open source our best ideas, and talk business & money with everyone in the company. We’re proud to run our business with integrity, and for that reason we share everything with our team & community.
  * [**150% Carbon Negative** :](https://negative.sanctuary.computer/) Our studio offsets 150% of the carbon we use to do business each year, dated back to our founding in 2015. We turn down work that is not in-line with our morals, and we encourage our peers to do the same. [We have been certified climate neutral since 2021](https://twitter.com/sanctucompu/status/1385282161197060100).
  * [**Strong Morals:**](https://sanctucompu.substack.com/p/our-moral-compass) Since our founding, we've turned down somewhere between $1mm - $2mm of work that didn't meet our moral standards. (Most of that was DTC brands that can't show a valid sustainability initiative).
  * **Async & Decentralized:** We use tools optimized for calm, thoughtful communication, and opt for async whenever possible. We fight hard to maintain our focus time.
  * **Remote Friendly:** Our company is fluent in remote work, making our workplace more decentralized, and democratized in the process.
  * **Ideas & Products:** In our spare studio time, we work to build our own open source or internal products to diversify & bolster our income. We create amazing technology products for our clients, so why not for the studio?

**→ Read more on our[Substack, over here](https://sanctucompu.substack.com/),
or our [Medium, over there](https://medium.com/sanctuary-computer-inc).**

**Quick tip!** Adding a **Loom recording** to your profile in our form to
showcase your skillset can really make your application stand out!

  

Please mention the word **RESPONSIVE** when applying to show you read the job
post completely (#RMTU3LjUwLjE0My4yMQ==). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$40,000 — $60,000/year  
  

## Benefits

🌎 Distributed team

⏰ Async

📆 4 day workweek
jobCategory: 内容创作,视频剪辑,市场营销,设计,运营

Redpanda Data | REMOTE | Full-time

Redpanda is pioneering the Agentic Data Plane (ADP) - a new category in AI
infrastructure that makes it simple and secure to connect AI agents with
enterprise data and systems. Built on a multi-modal data streaming engine,
Redpanda empowers agentic applications that reason and act in real-time with
speed, autonomy, and precision. Global leaders including Activision Blizzard,
Cisco, Moody's, Texas Instruments, Vodafone and 2 of the top 5 banks in the
U.S. rely on Redpanda to process hundreds of terabytes of data a day. Backed
by premier venture investors Lightspeed, GV and Haystack VC, Redpanda is a
diverse, people-first organization with teams distributed around the globe.

postTitle: 多岗位
descContent:
公司介绍：  
公司总部位于成都，是一家专注于技术服务与创新的科技企业，主要提供技术开发、咨询、转让及信息技术服务，涵盖计算机软件销售运营、造价咨询等多个领域。公司致力于为客户提供专业、高效的数字化解决方案，助力企业实现技术升级与业务增长。

1、必须有白帽经验，google实施经验

关键词在百度等搜索引擎的排名；  
3、对运营工作进行数据跟踪，定期分析运营效果

1个

postTitle: [北京]AI 电力运维初创公司，找全栈、算法等合伙人（或者能长期合作的兼职）
jobTitle: 全栈、算法等合伙人或长期合作兼职
descContent:
背景：  
\- 项目：为清洁能源提供智能运维解决方案，包括但不限于[机器狗巡检、预测性维护工业算法、AI 大模型]等解决方案；这是个封闭且看重资源的行业，这方面有优势  
\- 创始人：之前在头部互联网公司，有成功创业融资的经验（但最终失败了）  
  
现状：  
\- 产品：部分产品已有 MVP  
\- 经营：与业内头部公司有密切合作，已有几个订单交付，且未来预期良好（不是画饼）  
\- 资本化：获得了北京政府支持，正在推进在北京的落地，但需要 6-12 个月的周期  
\- 办公：目前 0 员工，预计明年初会在北京有固定办公地点  
  
寻找：  
\- 算法：有电力行业[设备预测性维护]经验的工业算法、图像识别等其他传统机器学习算法、AI 大模型经验  
\- 全栈：基于 Web 的前后端开发、熟悉私有化部署  
\- 其他：对电力巡检有垂直经验的技术人员、市场或融资相关人员  
\- **理想合伙人是 1 人同时有机器学习、大模型、全栈经验，实际执行人手不够我们可以再招聘  
  
希望你在以下观念与我契合  
\- 做人：诚信、真诚、有毅力、心里还有点小火苗  
\- 创业：先以最小成本实现最大收益，不得不增加成本时再考虑  
\- 做事：合伙人要身兼数职，不可避免的要做各种脏活累活  
  
我能给的  
\- 股份：合伙人会有原始股，且分成比例>股权比例；特意强调股份，是因为这个项目的资本化不是画饼，第一笔融资已经确定  
\- 薪资：融资发放前无薪资，但有订单分成，不会亏待合伙人的  
\- 政策：北京政府引进的企业，在住房、落户等各方面都有政策和补贴  
  
  
*当然也欢迎长期合作的兼职，在合适的时机也可以转成全职员工  
  
感兴趣请解码并联系：SmFjb2IzMDMw 希望我们可以从一段自我介绍开始
salary: 融资前无薪资，有订单分成
jobCategory: 全栈开发,算法,AI,运维

postTitle: 【远程全职】策略开发工程师2名、区块链工程师1名、PHP/React全栈开发2名
jobTitle: 策略开发工程师、区块链工程师、PHP/React全栈开发
descContent:
简历投递邮箱: 见帖子联系方式或留言自荐

邮件标题格式: 岗位 + 城市 + 姓名 + 工作年限
~~~~
[FrontierFund.io](https://frontierfund.io/) 专注于通过量化策略和风控系统为加密货币市场提供专业投资和流动性解决方案。我们管理超过2亿美元资产，日交易量超3亿美元，提供加密资产流动性研究和策略服务。我们致力于打造开放协作的工作环境，欢迎富有激情的人才加入！
~~~~
**策略开发工程师**
**岗位职责**
*   负责量化策略代码编写、部署、运维、迭代；
*   与需求人员保持良好沟通，充分理解策略需求；
*   不断提升策略代码执行效率、优化策略实现逻辑。

**岗位要求**
1.  3年以上开发经验，精通以下至少两种编程语言：Python/Rust/Java/Golang；
2.  熟悉掌握Linux、MySQL或PostgreSQL数据库、Redis缓存、消息队列、容器等基础组件；
3.  精通并发编程和异步编程，能够处理高并发场景下的技术挑战；
4.  熟悉各大CEX/DEX的RESTful API和WebSocket等接口对接，有丰富的集成经验；
5.  熟悉数据分析和处理，能够进行指标计算、统计分析等数据相关开发工作；
6.  具备良好的沟通、学习和表达能力，善于使用AI提升效率，能够编写高质量的文档和代码；
7.  有分布式系统开发经验者优先，熟悉微服务架构者优先。
*   岗位月薪：15K~25k

**区块链工程师**
**岗位职责**
*   负责以太坊/Solana等智能合约开发、部署、迭代、安全；
*   与需求人员充分沟通，负责链上策略的研究、编写、运行。

**岗位要求**
1.  3年以上前端(React/Next.js)、后端、数据库(MySQL/PostgreSQL)经验；
2.  2~3年Solidity/Rust/Move智能合约开发经验；
3.  熟悉并掌握Ethereum/Solana/Aptos等公链，并理解常见协议；
4.  熟悉Web3工具(web3.js/ethers.js/Hardhat/Foundry/Anchor等)；
5.  熟悉gas优化技术及其权衡；
6.  具有部署到公共测试网/主网的经验，并能管理合约地址、验证和ABI；
7.  熟练使用Git、代码审查和协作工作流程。
*   岗位月薪：15K~25k

**PHP/React全栈开发**
**岗位职责**
*   负责公司风控管理端系统的开发与维护，提供稳定、可靠的系统服务；
*   与需求团队保持良好沟通，理解实现业务需求；
*   与技术同事共同维护研发规范、组件等公共代码库；

**岗位要求**
1.  熟练使用Git/GitHub，Git工作流；
2.  较强的学习能力、文字表达能力；
3.  3年～5年开发经验，技术独立；
4.  2年以上前端经验，系统学习并掌握JavaScript / TypeScript基础知识；
5.  2年以上后端经验，系统学习并掌握PHP、MySQL、Redis等基础知识；
6.  前端要求掌握React/ Next.js / Tailwind CSS 等框架和样式库；
7.  后端要求掌握Laravel框架，熟练使用Laravel生态各项开发模式及工具；
8.  加分项：有金融相关知识或业务研发经验；
*   岗位月薪：13K~16k
    

**薪酬与待遇**

*   全职远程 & 8小时工作制
    
*   周末双休 & 法定节假日
    
*   MacBook Pro
    
*   Claude Code Max

postTitle: Client Engagement Specialist at Hcfraudshield
descContent:
We are looking for someone to provide Customer Service support as needed via
phone, web-based and/or email.

  
  

Key Responsibilities

  * Develop an extensive working knowledge of the FWAShield product suite
  * Design, develop and maintain job aides: FAQs, reference sheets, manuals, etc.
  * Maintain and update software help manual and release documents
  * Provide end-user application support (end user support requires access to customer data which includes protected health information) provide Customer Service support as needed via phone, web-based and/or email
  * Understands and complies with all company Privacy and Security standards
  * Employee may not use or disclose any protected health information, except as otherwise permitted, or required, by law
  * Analyze daily news articles and accurately input relevant data into the software
  * Perform other duties as required

  

  
  

Skills, Knowledge and Expertise

  * A good working knowledge of web applications is essential to this role. Experience in healthcare IT, clinical informatics, or Healthcare Fraud, Waste and Abuse (FWA) is strongly desired.
  * Analytical troubleshooting skills and approach to work
  * Ability to absorb complex technical information and communicate the information clearly
  * Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written)
  * Excellent problem-solving skills
  * Experience working on SLAs and deadlines
  * Proven customer service skills
  * Ability to work under pressure
  * Ability to explain technical elements in a manner easily understood by those without a technical background
  * Advanced knowledge using web-based applications
  * Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office products – Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint
  * This job requires access to confidential and sensitive information, requiring ongoing discretion and secure information management

  

  
  

Benefits

  * Medical, Dental & Vision insurance
  * 401(k) retirement savings with employer match
  * Vacation and sick paid time off
  * 8 paid holidays
  * Paid maternity/paternity leave
  * Disability & Life insurance
  * Flexible Spending Account (FSA)
  * Employee Assistance Program (EAP)
  * Free on-site fitness center (for local employees)
  * Professional and career development initiatives
  * Remote work eligible

  

**Remote Work Requirements**

  * Must have high speed Internet (satellite is not allowed for this role) with a minimum speed of 25mbs download and 5mbs upload.

  

  

_Healthcare Fraud Shield is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to
diversity, and values the ways in which we are different. All qualified
applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race,
color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin,
disability, veteran status, or other characteristic protected by applicable
law._
jobCategory: 客户服务,技术支持,咨询

postTitle: [远程] SEO 专员｜新加坡直播项目

postTitle: 学术管培生 远程办公
jobTitle: 学术管培生 远程办公
descContent:
公司简介  
我们是一家专注于高端学术服务的科技创新企业，深耕考博科研领域多年，与多所高校及科研机构保持深度合作。团队采用先进的远程协作模式，为学术工作者提供全链条支持服务。现开放管培生岗位，诚邀有志于学术产业化的青年加入。  
岗位亮点  
1.三年定向培养:学术管理双通道发展2.灵活办公:全国范围远程协作  
3.资源赋能:接触顶级学术项目与专家  
4.快速晋升:优秀者3年可晋升管理岗  
岗位职责  
1.参与学术产品研发全流程，包括课题申报支持、科研数据分析等  
2.协助管理线上科研团队，优化远程协作流程跟踪学科前沿动态，建设学术资源数据库  
3.参与重点客户服务，提供专业学术解决方案定期输出标准化工作手册，推动知识体系迭代  
任职要求(必须符合)  
1.硕士及以上学历(教育学、管理学、理工科优先2.参与过完整科研项目，熟悉学术规范  
具备远程协作经验，熟练使用Git/Obsidian等工具  
3.每周可保证40小时专注工作时间  
4.自备安静办公环境及稳定网络  
加分项:  
1.有学术期刊运营/科研项目管理经验  
2.掌握Python/SPSS等数据分析工具  
3.发表过核心期刊论文(需提供佐证)

postTitle: 远程CRA
descContent:
1、根据试验方案、SOP和GCP的要求进行研究中心的筛选、启动、监查和关闭工作。  
2、对所负责的研究中心进行方案和研究相关的培训，与研究中心进行定期沟通。  
3、负责监查研究中心的入组进度、临床研究质量、临床试验工作协调，确保临床试验严格遵循  
4、GCP等相关法规及试验方案的要求开展。  
5、负责数据核查及时发现试验中的问题，跟进数据疑问产生和解决的情况，管理所负责研究中心的项目进展。并记录提交监查报告。  
6、监查研究中心风险、分析、监测项目的执行情况  
7、创建和维护与研究中心管理、监查访视的发现以及行动计划相关的文件，递交访视报告和其他所需研究文件。  
8、负责相应研究中心的研究财务管理。  
9、完成直线经理和/或项目经理（PM）分配的其他工作。  
任职要求:  
1、良好的临床研究相关知识，了解适用的法规要求。  
2、良好的计算机技能，包括熟练应用微软Word、Excel和PowerPoint。  
3、良好的人际沟通和组织协调能力。  
4、医学、药学或相关专业本科及以上学历。  
5、1年及以上CRA工作经验，或2年以上CRC工作经验。  
6、大学英语四级及以上水平。
jobCategory: 项目管理,咨询

postTitle: 国内农业销售（河北/远程办公）
jobTitle: 国内农业销售（河北/远程办公）
descContent:
一、岗位职责  
1、了解公司农业机械产品的特点、优势及应用场景，为客户提供专业、精准的产品咨询和解决方案。

3、定期开展市场调研，收集区域内农业机械市场动态、竞争对手信息以及客户需求反馈，为公司产品研发、市场策略制定提供有力依据。  
4、协同公司内部各部门，如技术支持、售后服务等，确保客户购买产品后的安装、调试、培训及售后维护等工作顺利进行，提升客户满意度和忠诚度。  
5、参与公司组织的各类产品推广活动、展会等，积极宣传公司产品和品牌形象，提升公司在区域内的市场影响力。  
6、负责销售合同的谈判、签订及执行跟进，确保合同款项按时收回，有效控制销售风险。  
二、任职要求  
1、大专及以上学历，专业不限，市场营销、农业机械、农学等相关专业优先考虑。  
2、3年以上销售工作经验，有农业机械销售资源者优先。熟悉农业机械行业市场特点、客户群体和销售渠道，能够快速适应并有效开拓区域市场。  
3、具备出色的沟通能力和谈判技巧，能够与不同类型的客户建立良好的合作关系，准确把握客户需求并提供针对性的解决方案。  
4、结果导向，具备较强的抗压能力和自我驱动力，能够在高强度的销售任务下保持积极的工作状态，勇于挑战高目标并努力达成。  
5、具备良好的市场分析能力和应变能力，能够根据市场变化及时调整销售策略，把握市场机会。  
6、熟练使用办公软件，具备基本的数据统计和分析能力，对销售数据进行有效的整理和分析，为销售工作提供决策支持。  
7、工作认真负责，具备良好的团队协作精神，能够与公司内部各部门密切配合，共同推进业务发展。  
8、适应出差，能够深入区域内各地开展销售工作，了解当地农业生产实际情况和客户需求。
jobCategory: 销售

postTitle: 爬虫/数据采集工程师
descContent:
工作方式：全职｜远程

地点：【远程】｜薪资：【10000-15000】｜招聘人数：【2】

面向**公开可访问**的流量来源，打造一套“Spy”类数据采集与变更监控能力：稳定抓取 → 结构化 → 差异比对 → 告警与回放；沉淀可复用的**采集接口/SDK**，与内部系统打通形成**可观测、可回滚、可审计**的数据中间层。

说明（合规与边界）

仅采集**公开可访问**的信息，**尊重 robots.txt 与站点条款**；不绕过登录/付费墙/访问控制；不采集个人敏感信息；使用合规代理与存储；对网站友好地控制频率与缓存；所有抓取在**获得授权的环境与合法范围**内进行。

你将负责

*   **Playwright 采集引擎**：基于 Chromium/WebKit/Firefox 通道，设计可插拔采集任务（并发/队列/重试/退避/节流），在**无头/有头**模式下都稳定运行。
*   **Spy 接口研究**：用 DevTools/Tracing/HAR 复盘页面行为，梳理公开接口（URL/参数/时间戳/签名字段等），沉淀为 Postman/OpenAPI/SDK。
*   **结构化与去重**：DOM/JSON 抽取、指纹与去重、版本化快照与变更日志，支持字段级 diff 与回放。
*   **变更检测与告警**：对核心字段（如标题、素材、价格、投放参数等）进行规则/阈值触发，推送告警、支持回滚。
*   **任务编排与健康检查**：调度（Cron/消息队列）、分布式执行、健康探针与自动恢复（异常隔离、断路器/熔断）。
*   **数据出入口**：提供对内检索/分析的 API/消息流；保证可查询、可追溯。
*   **工程化**：容器化（Docker）、CI/CD、日志/指标/追踪（Observability），以及权限与数据脱敏。

我们希望你具备

*   **主力技术栈（二选一）**
    *   Node.js 方向：Node.js（18+），Playwright（@playwright/test、Trace Viewer、`route()`/请求拦截、持久化上下文）、TypeScript 更佳。
    *   Python 方向：Python（3.10+），Playwright for Python（同步/异步 API 熟悉）、pytest 更佳。
*   **HTTP/浏览器基础**：HTTP/1.1/2、缓存/压缩、Cookie/SameSite、CORS、TLS；熟练使用 DevTools（Network/Elements/Recorder）、能导入导出 **HAR** 并复现请求。
*   **并发与稳态**：任务队列与并发模型、限流/重试/指数退避/熔断；超时与幂等；异常归因与失败自动恢复。
*   **解析与抽取**：Playwright Selectors、Locator、评估脚本；CSS Selector/XPath、正则与文本清洗；了解 GraphQL/SSE/WebSocket 其一更佳。
*   **数据与存储**：PostgreSQL/MySQL 其一；Redis/消息队列（RabbitMQ/Kafka 任一）用于排队与去抖；基本的数据建模与索引优化。
*   **可观测性**：结构化日志、指标（Prometheus/Grafana 或 ELK 任一），能快速定位失败样本、支持数据回放。
*   **文档与沉淀**：把“网页操作 → 接口调用”反推成**可复用文档/SDK**，字段、限流与异常说明清晰完整。
*   **AI 编程工具**：会用 Copilot/Cursor/LLM 助手做样板生成/单测补全/重构建议，并**对 AI 产出做人工审查与许可证合规校验**。

与“Playwright + HTML/HTTP 提取 API”相关的必备点

*   熟悉 **浏览器上下文隔离**、持久化登录（`storageState`）、设备/区域/语言/时区模拟（用于合法实验与对照）。
*   会用 **network interception**（`page.route`）与 **request/response** 钩子做请求观测与最小可行复现。
*   能从前端脚本定位关键参数（token/nonce/timestamp/签名字段等），写出**最小可行调用示例**（仅限公开或授权接口）。
*   能将流程沉淀为 **OpenAPI/TypeScript/Python** SDK 的封装与示例。
*   熟悉缓存控制、友好处理 429/403 等站点保护信号（退避、降频、缓存命中提升），避免对目标站点造成压力。

加分项（写能力，不写具体业务名）

*   做过**DOM/字段级 diff**、快照与回放；有“变更 → 告警 → 回滚”的闭环实践。
*   任务编排与容灾：蓝绿/灰度、健康检查、自动回滚；分布式执行与节点健康度治理。
*   代理与出口治理（合规供应商）：可用性与成本平衡、IP 健康度度量。
*   数据合规：PDPA/GDPR 与数据最小化；写过**数据字典/数据血缘**。
*   将 AI 引入工程流程：失败样本自动归因/聚类、生成埋点/单测、PR 评审建议等。

投递材料（帮助我们快速判断）

*   1–2 个相关项目（Playwright 采集/接口还原/变更监控/可观测），写清你的**角色与指标变化**（如“成功率 92%→99%”）。
*   任意代码片段或仓库（可去敏），展示并发抓取、限流/退避、变更 diff 或“从 HAR/cURL 复现接口调用”。
*   （如有）你整理过的 **OpenAPI/Postman** 示例与字段字典（可去敏）。
*   到岗时间与合作形式（全职/外包/驻场）。
jobCategory: 数据开发,DevOps/MLOps,后端开发,数据分析

postTitle: DevOps 实习生｜加入硅谷初创，共建下一代 Data Lake for Full-Text Search（可远程 / 可转正）
descContent:
我们是一家位于硅谷的早期初创公司，专注构建下一代 cloud-native data lake for full-text search
。团队小而精：核心成员在搜索引擎与分布式系统深耕近 20 年、合作近 10 年，曾将上一个项目成功推向收购。我们崇尚信任、协作与工程效率。  
  
在这里，你将亲历一家技术驱动型公司从 0 → 1 的全过程——你的代码与想法可以对产品发展产生直接影响。  
  
工作内容：  
  
\- 维护与演进基于 OpenSearch 的 fork ，参与核心组件的设计与优化（如索引管理、查询路由、可观测性等）。  
\- 设计与优化 CI/CD 流水线（自动化构建/测试/发布），持续提升稳定性与交付速度。  
\- 协助管理 多云环境（ AWS / Azure / GCP ）与 私有云 Kubernetes ，保障系统可用性与性能。  
\- 开发与完善 内部自动化工具/脚本（一键环境、基准测试、故障注入等），显著提升研发效率。  
  
  
岗位要求：  
  
1\. 技术基础:  
\- 熟悉 Linux 常用命令与基本运维操作；  
\- 至少掌握一门脚本语言（ Python / Bash ）；  
\- 至少掌握一门后端语言（ Java / Go ）；  
\- 熟练使用 Git ；  
\- 具备 Docker / Kubernetes 初步实践；  
\- 了解 CI/CD 工具（如 GitHub Actions ）基本配置。  
  
2\. 综合能力:  
\- 英语读写流畅，能阅读英文文档与社区讨论；  
\- 快速学习 + 主动探索，乐于钻研系统性问题；  
\- 善用 AI 工具（代码补全、日志分析、文档生成等）提升效率与质量。  
  
3\. 加分项  
\- 本科 211 大学以上  
\- 有公有云（ AWS / GCP / Azure ） 实操；  
\- 了解 Prometheus / Grafana / OpenTelemetry 并有部署或使用经验；  
\- 有开源贡献 或高质量技术博客/项目  
  
面试不“卷”算法；我们会给一个小而完整的工程项目，考察问题拆解、工程实现与质量意识。  
  
  
实习安排与发展:  
  
\- 工作方式：远程友好；与硅谷团队有部分时区重叠更佳（可错峰协作）。  
\- 周期与投入：建议 4-6 个月，每周 ≥4 天。  
\- 转正机会：表现优秀者可 返聘/转正（参与核心项目，明确成长路径与职责晋级）。  
\- 支持与资源：提供必要云资源额度与付费工具授权。  
\- 实习津贴：¥250–¥300/天，视投入与经历而定  
  
  
投递方式:  
  
请发送至 [hr@idias.io](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) （标题：[DevOps
实习生]_学校_姓名_每周可投入天数），并附：  
  
1\. 简历与代表性项目/开源链接；  
2\. 你做过的最有工程含金量的一件事（ 50–200 字）；  
3\. 可到岗时间与实习周期。
jobCategory: DevOps/MLOps,运维,后端开发,数据开发

postTitle: 🎯 在招：AI 基础设施方向的全栈工程师（早期创业 / 远程友好）
descContent:
🎯 在招：全栈工程师（早期创业 / 远程友好）
我们在做一个AI 基础设施方向的新项目（智能体交互与调用相关），处于 0→1 阶段。想找能独立把原型从无到有跑起来的工程师一起共建。方向前沿、节奏快、边做边验证。

你会做什么（MVP 期 2 周）
1. 做一个最小可用的 Web 应用：注册/管理“能力模块”、一键调用演示页（含流式输出）。
2. 搭一套轻后端：统一的 resolve → invoke 接口；把不同大模型/工具封装成“可调用单元”。
3. 接入/实验多端入口：Chat 侧的 Action/Recipe、Telegram 机器人、简单的目录页 & 调用排行榜。
4. 基础可观测：调用日志、失败重试、限流、基础监控（不用过度工程）。
  

核心技术栈（优先这些，不强制全会）
• 前端：React / Next.js、TypeScript、TailwindCSS；SWR/React Query；必要时 SSR。
• 后端：Node.js + Express（或 Python FastAPI/Flask 也可）；SSE/WS 流式返回；RESTful。
• 数据库：PostgreSQL（Supabase/Neon 皆可）；Prisma / SQL 其一。
• 部署：Vercel（前端）、Render/Fly/Hetzner（API）；Docker 基础；GitHub Actions 做 CI。
• AI/LLM：OpenAI/Anthropic 官方 SDK；Prompt 设计；（可选）LangChain / Autogen 基础。
• 集成：Telegram Bot API；（可选）Stripe/支付宝收款；OAuth / API Key 管理。
• 其他（加分）：Cloudflare（边缘路由/CDN）、Redis（限流/队列）、日志（Sentry/Logtail）。

我们理想的你
• 能独立把东西上线：给一句话目标→自己定接口、搭脚手架、部署、演示。
• 写过/上线过自己的Side Project 或开源作品（哪怕小也行）。
• 英文文档无障碍（API 文档、GitHub issue、社区讨论）。
• 习惯小步快跑：一周一个里程碑，能快速做“能用的”版本再打磨。
• 对 AI 应用/Agent 生态有好奇心，愿意试新工具、做对比实验。

加分项
• 做过 ChatGPT 插件/GPTs、MCP、多模型编排、RAG/向量库（FAISS/Milvus/Pinecone）。
• 有前后端性能/稳定性/成本意识：限流、重试、灰度、观测、降级。
• 埋点、基础漏斗、复用度/留存的工程实践。
  
合作方式
• 兼职 / 项目制：4k–8k RMB/月，1 个月冲 MVP；表现好可继续。
• 办公地点不限，异步协作（日更进度、周更里程碑）。

为什么可能适合你
• 不是大厂流程活，是真正的 0→1：你做的每一行代码都会被真实用户用到。
• 方向足够新，能接触多模型、多入口、多工具链的组合实践。
• 团队扁平，直接对话产品与增长，一起做决策。

怎么聊（请尽量附作品/仓库/链接，哪怕是小 demo）
• Wx: @chaiehuang 直接发「1-2 项你最自豪的上线作品 + 你想怎么切 MVP 的思路
• 也欢迎发你最熟悉的技术清单（栈/部署/监控）+ 你做过的小而美的工程决策。

一句话：
我们需要的是会造东西的人：能把想法迅速变成可用的产品。如果你正好想做一件可能影响下一代 AI 使用方式的小事，来聊聊。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps,前端开发,后端开发

postTitle: 💻 [远程全职前端] ：即将逃离坐班开启远程办公的我！给北美一家爆炸有钱的 AI 团队找前端啦！
descContent:
很久没活跃了，V2EX 的老朋友和新朋友们，最近有一些新的变化🌟

过去的 2 年里，我上班做互联网公司全职 hrbp 的工作，下班和周末就忙碌于我的远程兼职～对的，是一个区块链和 ai
业务交付的技术工作室，负责团队招聘/团建/薪酬核算的事情。

**但是全职工作性价比太太太太低了，在今年 11 月结束前我会离开并且全面进入远程办公的“数字游民”状态!**

为了确保我不会因为 quit 了一份相对稳定的工作而导致收入不稳定，我又接了一份远程招聘的合作 hhh

我跟新团队的联合创始人在线下见过，很快聊好了，初期先帮忙搭建前端团队（ 3-4 个远程全职），顺利的话以后也可以稳定在这边兼职。
目前了解到这个团队的业务和实力实在太强了，也是非常纯粹、专注于技术和产品的团队，赶紧来 V 站广而告之！

### 首先，再和大家交个底儿：超级爆炸有钱的北美 AI 团队（省流不看版）

  * 他们是谁？ 一个今年 1 月才成立的美国 AI 公司，CEO 是前英伟达高级工程师，团队约 20 人，全是精兵强将。
  * 业务稳不稳？ 非常稳。从 1 月到 11 月，收入从年化 20 万美元涨到了约数百万美元，已经实现了收支平衡，并且在硅谷持续融资。明年目标是几千万美金，潜力巨大。
  * 在做什么？ 业务很前沿：既有面向开发者的 AI 语音基础设施，也有面向 C 端的角色扮演聊天机器人，同时还在研发下一代 AI 社交产品。
  * 团队氛围？ 用他们自己的话说：“倾向一线实干且学习能力强的人员，不倾向大厂高 P 及有黑话、PUA 倾向、向上管理倾向的人员。” 光这一点，就值得鼓掌。

* * *

### 本次重磅招募：高级前端工程师 （远程全职）

**岗位核心：** 你将主要负责公司核心产品线（包括 AI 语音服务和社交机器人）的前端开发，用你的技术能力和产品审美，直接塑造下一代 AI
产品的用户体验。

我们需要这样的你：

  * 技术过硬： 主力技术栈是 React 和 React Native ，希望你对此有扎实的理解和丰富的实践经验。
  * 具备产品思维和审美： 你不只是一个执行者，需要能理解产品意图，关注代码质量的同时，也关注你做出来的东西是否好用、好看。
  * 主动沟通，踏实靠谱： 远程协作，沟通至关重要。我们希望你遇到问题能主动提出，同步进度，而不是一个人闷头苦干到最后。
  * 学习能力强： 业务处在 AI 前沿领域，变化快，需要你能快速学习并应用新技术。
  * 加分项：对 AI 领域有好奇或兴趣，有自己折腾的 side project 。

### ⚠️ 坦诚相告，以下几种情况可能不太合适：

❌ 追求大厂光环和稳定层级体系的。

❌ 擅长“向上管理”但实际输出跟不上的。

❌ 有严重“道德洁癖”，在技术讨论中难以合作的。

### 合作模式 & 我们提供的硬核保障

这是我们讨论得非常细的部分，也是我觉得他们非常靠谱的地方：

💻 工作模式： 全职远程。你可以安心在任何地方工作。

📝 合同与社保： 可以签署正式的劳动合同，公司会为你正常缴纳社保（也支持劳务合同形式，可灵活选择）。

💰 薪酬回报：月薪范围在 2 万 - 4 万元 人民币，具体根据你的能力定。

🌟特别要提一下：对于能力突出、并能承担更多产品/设计职责的同学，有机会进入一个“高激励库”，月收入上限可以非常高（参考值：20 万人民币+）。

⏰ 工作与考核：

  * 没有打卡，但要求自觉工作 8 小时。
  * 通过 Linear 系统 管理任务和追踪工作量，非常透明。
  * 考核核心就两点：工作效率和代码质量。简单直接。

### 🎉为什么我觉得他们值得推荐？

业务驱动： 收入实打实，不是烧钱讲故事，你的工作能直接产生价值。

技术尊重： 老板和负责人都是技术/产品出身，懂行，沟通顺畅。

远程友好： 流程、工具、文化都为远程协作优化，不搞形式主义。

保障到位： 合同、社保、薪酬发放都非常规范，让人安心。

### 🔰 面试流程是怎样的？

  * 投递简历后，初步沟通（我会先和你简单聊聊,包括介绍具体的团队信息）

  * 首轮技术面试：简历通过技术侧筛选，可通 Lark 或 GoogleMeeting 进行线上面试

  * 一个付费的测评任务：我们会给你一个真实的小页面或组件开发任务，并为你花费的时间支付费用。你可以使用任何 AI 工具辅助，我们看重最终完成的质量。

##
如果你对我们描述的团队感兴趣，渴望在一个专注技术、氛围纯粹、业务高速增长的环境里施展拳脚，欢迎你把简历和简单的个人介绍发给我。期待能与优秀的你，一起加入这个激动人心的旅程。

#### 📮 欢迎投递简历至我邮箱： yao@anz.io （这是我即将去当全职远程 hr 的团队）

#### 📱 也可以直接添加我的个人微信：MTg3MDI1MTY3Mzk= (备注“北美 AI 全职前端”即可)

### ❤️让靠谱的人，和靠谱的团队相遇。❤️
jobCategory: 前端开发,AI,全栈开发

descContent:
One2X 是一家 AI 初创公司，由红杉等顶级风投投资。目前团队 30 人左右。初创团队来自月之暗面、字节、蚂蚁等公司。我们在做多款 AI 产品，其中一个产品是让 AI 来做需求分析、自动生成偏互联网应用类型的网站/app 。技术上已经完成 MVP ，现在正在招聘懂编程的产品经理或者有产品能力的工程师加入我们，一起推动矩阵式产出 app 。

1. 寻找流量方向，独立设计产品，利用内部产品快速产出网站/app。
2. 协助参与 context engeering 。
3. 协助寻找国内替代模型。

要求：
1.  有一线互联网公司产品工作经历或者自己有过独立上线产品。
2. 能独立做产品分析、设计，能挖掘流量方向。
2. 具备一定的编程能力，能看懂代码，在 AI 协助下排查问题。
3. [加分] 有 agent 等使用、开发经历
3. [加分] 有创业经历

薪资与工作方式：
工作地点: 远程/北京/上海/杭州
薪资: 20k~40k * 14。期权示具体情况而定。

postTitle: Staff Software Engineer
descContent:
ShiftUp | Staff Software Engineer | Remote | <https://shiftupai.com>

Hiring for a full-time, 100% remote role (entire company is remote) for a
Staff Software Engineer, working on the ShiftUp platform stack (Python,
Pydantic AI, GCP, Temporal Workflows, Turbopuffer, Postgres). You will be one
of the first five engineering hires, and you will have the ability to grow and
shape your own role.

We need someone with solid experience designing and implementing systems with
many moving parts, who can easily shift between systems design, writing and
reviewing code (or, let's face it, supervising Codex/Cursor/Claude Code),
working with the team to design features, and talking to customers to gain
feedback and insights.

You'll be working to build all kinds of agents, workflows, and other
components to support our features. Our research agents are truly deep,
sometimes spending upwards of an hour searching and analyzing information for
a single prospect or strategy. Our RAG pipeline is focused on quality,
leveraging LLM chunking, metadata and graph generation, and contextual
embeddings.

If this sounds like fun, let's chat: you won't be asked to regurgitate
leetcode solutions, we'll simply have a conversation and see if there's a
mutual fit. Our interview process is lightweight, respectful and moves fast.
Competitive salary, equity and full benefits.

You can email me directly: ben@shiftupai.com

\---

About the company: ShiftUp is a new kind of intelligence-driven sales platform
that identifies emerging demand and drives revenue. Built from scratch to
leverage LLM-driven agentic workflows, ShiftUp deeply researches prospects,
identifies the highest-value opportunities, and provides targeted sales
strategies to execute on them.

ShiftUp is delivered as a native app on Salesforce AppExchange, providing our
platform to sellers where they already are. Our Salesforce app talks to a
cloud-native stack that uses Python services, durable workflows, and SQL +
vector databases.

We're well-funded, having recently closed a $3M seed round. We're building out
a small team of highly talented, well-rounded engineers to deliver on our
vision. Our company is 100% remote, and we use SoWork to help build our
culture. As a small startup, everyone is highly motivated and focused on
moving quickly, but we also place importance on a sustainable work-life
balance so that you can continue to do your best work.
salary: 竞争性薪资+股权+全额福利
jobCategory: 后端开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps,算法,全栈开发

postTitle: MLE/Full-stack
descContent:
Renaissance Philanthropy | MLE/Full-stack | Remote (worldwide)

Renaissance Philanthropy's aim is to activate a virtuous circle of increasing
ambition and impact between philanthropists and innovators: by identifying
frontier experts both in science and in new ways of solving problems; by
tapping into the growing number of emerging philanthropists; and by building
multi-sector initiatives that can harness the power of philanthropy, markets,
and governments.

RenPhil's Engineering Hub supports mission-driven, grant-funded educational
technology projects that seek to improve educational outcomes in fundamental
skills like math and reading. The Engineering Hub consists of data scientists,
machine learning engineers, and full-stack developers who collaborate with
researchers and entrepreneurs to build scalable, measurably effective tools
for teachers and students.

We’re looking for folks who:

\- can speak the languages of both research and engineering

\- are creative problem solvers

\- are comfortable with navigating ambiguity

\- want to help create a world where all children receive a high-quality
education.

If this sounds like you, please apply!

<https://www.renaissancephilanthropy.org/careers>

experiment: grow our YouTube channel by focusing only on intermediate-to-
advanced topics.

Class Central helps tens of millions of learners find the best courses. Small
team (6 people), profitable, independent, 13+ years.

This is genuinely experimental. You plan and lead live workshops on subjects
you know deeply. Any domain works. We promote them to our audience, and we
figure out together what clicks.

I would like to skip the content farm tactics and beginner stuff. I just want
to offer solid teaching for people ready to learn challenging subjects.

careers@classcentral.com

We do this through a unique edge-deployed architecture that provides real-time visibility and control across every customer journey.

We’re a VC-backed startup of 35 people, with engineering and product based in
Sydney. The founding team previously built and exited companies in the fraud
and security space (including billion-dollar outcomes).

The role: We’re looking for a senior fullstack engineer who enjoys working
across boundaries from TypeScript frontends and backend services to data
pipelines and distributed systems. You’ll work closely with our platform and
product teams to build the tools that power customer fraud detection and
orchestration. Someone who has built vscode extensions or has worked closely
in the fraud or security space would be a bonus

Our stack: Rust for the engine, ClickHouse for persistence, TypeScript (React
+ Node) for frontend and ancillary services, deployed globally at the edge.

and Temporal. No requirements to have previous Typescript experience, but need
to be willing to learn.

Join us if you love building for scale, value craftsmanship, and want to shape
the backend foundation of a fast-growing product used by the world’s best
product teams.

We’re automating web scraping at scale with AI. Web scraping used to be the
same for decades (writing and maintaining rule-based scripts for each source),

and the customers who use it. We iterate to greatness :)

postTitle: C Programmer for Photon-Pathway Simulation
descContent:
Deep States LLC | Photon-pathway-simulation for analog 35mm movie-film emulation | Florida, U.S.A | Part-time | REMOTE or local.

Deep States LLC is building the most realistic analog film-emulation system
ever created. We're bringing back the classic 35mm film stocks that defined
cinema in the 1980s.

We're modelling photon-pathways on superchip systems; to simulate the
sophisticated light-interactions between the layers in real film. We aim to
perfectly digitally-replicate the unique photo-chemical properties of
celluloid.

We're looking for self-taught C programmers with wild-eyes and a thirst for
breaking new ground. Can you perfectly model "Kodak Eastman Color Negative II
100T 5247" film stock on a rack of superchips? Let's find out.

Contact us if you want to be part of the first team to crack-the-code of
celluloid. We seek renegade coders who want to make a dent in the universe,
and have the intellectual-firepower to deliver the holy-grail: Digitally
modeling photon-pathway interactions in REAL analog film strata.

More about the project, here: <https://deepstates.io/> Email us:
us@deepstates.io
jobCategory: 算法,AI,后端开发,视频剪辑

descContent:
大家好，我是一名大厂程序员，平时在业余时间做一些 AI 相关的小项目，已经有 prototype 跑通，目前正和几位伙伴在用 **Vibe Coding** 的方式快速推进。

现在希望找一位 **海外运营专员（兼职/远程）** 一起来 vibe，一起推动项目成长。


#### 💼 你要做的事

*   参与项目的日常运营工作：内容发布、社群管理、用户反馈收集与整理
*   跟进产品迭代节奏，协助制定与执行推广计划
*   利用 AI 工具（如 ChatGPT、Claude、Notion AI 等）提升运营效率
*   优化项目展示页、社区曝光、公众号/平台内容发布节奏
*   定期总结项目数据并提出改进建议
*   如果你熟悉 AI Agent、AI 创作生态（如 Lovart等），那将是加分项～
    

#### ✅ 我对你的期望

*   对内容、社群、项目管理有基本的理解
*   善于沟通，有海外留学经历，英文能力强，懂得海外用户
*   能自驱、有责任心，能独立推进任务
*   懂得使用各类 AI 工具辅助工作（或愿意学习）
*   能科学上网（工具需自备）
*   如果你之前有做过 AI 运营、内容运营、项目管理类工作，将非常加分
    

#### 🎁 我能提供的

*   清晰方向：项目原型已跑通，目标明确
*   灵活合作：远程 + 兼职，沟通高效
*   工具支持：我提供主要的 AI 工具账号供你使用
*   一起学习成长：我会手把手教你如何用 AI 提效（包括如何“PUA AI”😆）
*   合理回报：薪资面议（根据投入时间与熟练度）
   
* * *

📍**面试方式**：线上  
💰**薪资待遇**：50人民币每小时  
📨 有兴趣的朋友欢迎私聊我，一起 vibe 一下 
📮 **联系方式**：电一下，联系方式里写的qq
jobCategory: 运营,市场营销,内容创作,项目管理,AI

postTitle: Marketing, Communications & Engagement Manager at International Geosynthetics Society
jobTitle: Marketing, Communications & Engagement Manager at International Geosynthetics Society
descContent:
Marketing, Communications & Engagement Manager  
  
Contract Type: Contract (remote) - 4 days/week (0.8 FTE)  
Location: Remote; US Central time or within GMT +2 Hrs with occasional travel
for international events (pre-approved).  
Salary: Compensation will vary based on the location of work  
Reports to: Executive Director  
Travel requirements: Comfortable to travel internationally  
Hours: 4 days/week ≈ 32 hours/week  
Contract length: 12 months  
Payment terms: Monthly invoicing; 30 days net. Pre-approved travel & supplier
expenses reimbursed on receipt.

Role summary  
The Marketing, Communications & Engagement Manager is responsible for growing
IGS’s visibility, member value and commercial impact through integrated
digital, CRM and event programmes.

You will design and deliver measurable campaigns for our Handbook, courses and
Sustainability Calculator, manage LinkedIn and website content to drive
traffic and enquiries, and coordinate member communications that increase
retention and advocacy.

You will also act as the operational lead for corporate members and sister
society partnerships, and provide practical event support to capture leads and
convert interest into membership or sales. Ultimately, you will safeguard and
amplify the IGS brand while translating technical benefits into clear,
persuasive messages for both members and wider industry audiences.

Key responsibilities

Co-operative marketing & member relationships

  * Maintain and grow operational relationships with the PR and marketing teams of IGS sister societies and support aligned messaging and cross-promotion of events.

  * Act as primary operational comms and marketing contact for Premium Corporate Members (PCMs) and Corporate Members (CMs): maintain PR/marketing contacts, produce PCM spotlights and CM profiles, and ensure PCM/CM listings are current and effective. Escalate strategic partnership opportunities to the Executive Director.

Digital channels & content

  * Implement and optimise our LinkedIn content strategy and run a schedule of content themes (Did You Know, case studies, member stories, benefits).

  * Manage PR/marketing content on the website and maintain the editorial calendar.

  * Operate CRM for external audiences (segmentation, campaign set up, tracking) and partner with the Executive Director and Secretariat Manager to improve CRM processes.

  * Produce monthly dashboards measuring socials & web performance and recommend optimisation actions.

  * Identify and coordinate non-IGS placement opportunities and outreach.

Events & presence

  * Plan, attend and execute IGS presence at three or more non-IGS in-person events per year (booth staffing coordination, speaker support, collateral).

  * Coordinate booth logistics and vendor relationships; brief external suppliers and outsource large-scale logistics where required.

  * Liaise with PR leads for IGS 4-yearly and regional conferences to add value via IGS channels.

  * Capture leads/metrics at events for timely follow-up.

Product & campaign marketing

  * Plan and execute campaigns for the Geosynthetics Handbook, professional development courses, and the Geosynthetics Sustainability Calculator.

  * Run membership recruitment campaigns promoting benefits to non-members and support conversion tracking and reporting.

  * Write and distribute press releases in line with product launches. 

Brand stewardship & design

  * Ensure consistent application of the IGS brand across all outputs.

  * Produce or coordinate new brand collateral and brief/manage external designers for complex work; perform occasional document/layout design.

Member communications

  * Deliver or coordinate the delivery of member communications on a weekly basis, including blogs, newsletters, announcements, targeted campaigns.

Please note the duties and responsibilities set out are not exhaustive and the
postholder may be required to undertake other duties commensurate with the
role.

–

Skills & experience

  * 3–5+ years professional or volunteer experience in digital marketing/communications with evidence of cross-functional delivery.

  * Fluent English (written and spoken).

  * Interest or experience in scientific, engineering, sustainability or technical sectors.

  * Strong LinkedIn and content execution experience.

  * CRM experience (ToucanTech, HubSpot, Salesforce, or similar) or ability to learn quickly.

  * Event marketing and/or logistics experience.

  * Excellent stakeholder and relationship management; comfortable liaising with corporate partners and volunteers.

  * Strong writing, copyediting and design/layout skills (InDesign/Canva/PowerPoint).

  * Comfortable building and presenting analytics and monthly dashboards.

  * Proactive, organised, able to work independently in a distributed team.

Nice to have

  * Previous experience in membership bodies or B2B professional societies.

  * Experience running product sales campaigns for publications or training.

  * Basic SEO and website CMS experience.

  * Additional languages are welcome.

Inclusive hiring & accessibility  
IGS welcomes applications from candidates of all backgrounds. We are committed
to making our recruitment accessible, please let us know if you require any
adjustments to the application or interview process.

How to apply  
Please submit a CV and short cover letter (no longer than two pages of A4)
tailored to the job description to
[john.kraus@geosyntheticssociety.org](mailto:john.kraus@geosyntheticssociety.org).
Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis; we aim to respond to all
applicants within two weeks of receipt.
jobCategory: 市场营销,内容创作,项目管理,运营,咨询

postTitle: Sales Representative at Skrapp.io
descContent:
Skrapp.io, a leading SaaS provider specializing in B2B search solutions, is
seeking an enthusiastic and results-driven **Sales Representative** to join
our expanding team. In this role, you will be responsible for representing our
product to potential clients and helping them understand how our solutions can
enhance their lead generation, outreach, and overall efficiency in acquiring
new business.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * **Prospecting:** Collaborate with GTM team to setup effective outreach strategy.
  * **Sales Presentations:** Conduct compelling product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the value and benefits of Skrapp.io to potential clients.
  * **Relationship Building:** Build and nurture relationships with prospects and existing clients to understand their needs and tailor solutions accordingly.
  * **Sales Strategy:** Collaborate with the outreach team to develop and implement effective sales strategies and tactics to meet and exceed sales targets.
  * **Negotiation:** Manage the sales process from lead generation to closing deals, expertly negotiating contracts and agreements with clients.
  * **Reporting:** Track and report on key sales metrics, including leads, opportunities, and sales pipeline status, using CRM tools.
  * **Customer Feedback:** Gather client feedback to contribute to product improvements and marketing strategies.
  * **Market Research:** Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitor offerings, and changes in the market that may impact sales efforts.

**Requirements**

  * Proven experience as a Sales Representative or similar role, 3-6 years preferably in a SaaS or technology-driven environment.
  * Strong understanding of the sales process, from prospecting to closing.
  * Excellent communication skills with the ability to engage and persuade diverse audiences.
  * Familiarity with CRM software and sales analytics tools.
  * A results-oriented mindset with a passion for achieving and exceeding targets.
  * Strong organizational skills and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment.
  * Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
  * A bachelor's degree in a relevant field is preferred, but not required.

**Benefits**

**Contract**

We only offer contractor/freelancer contracts to our team members.

Package: 30K - 36K USD / Year + Sales Commissions.

Contracts come with the following benefits:

  * Observance of 5 public holidays as per the contractor's country of residence. 
  * Annual paid leave: 25 days. 
  * Monthly coworking space stipend of $100.
  * Fixed salary + commissioned based on closed deals. 

You will be responsible for paying for your local health insurance, and
retirement plan if you wish to have one.  
  
**Work Environment  
** We are a team of young professionals working remotely from Spain, France,
UK, and the US. The position is fully remote; you will enjoy flexible working
hours from anywhere in the world.
jobCategory: 销售

postTitle: Astronomy Expert at Mercor
descContent:
This description is a summary of our understanding of the job description.
Click on 'Apply' button to find out more.  
  

Role Description

Mercor is collaborating with a leading AI research lab on a project to advance
**frontier astronomy problem-solving** . We are seeking **astronomy experts**
with **International Astronomy Olympiad (IAO)** experience — including
participants, medalists, problem setters, coaches, graders, or selection
committee members.

The goal of this project is to create **novel, clear, and challenging
Olympiad-style astronomy problems** that cause frontier AI models to fail
(i.e., generate an incorrect response) and to support the training of cutting-
edge AI reasoning systems.

This is a **short-term, high-impact, remote opportunity** for those excited
about applying their expertise to frontier AI research, with the possibility
of extension based on performance.

Key Responsibilities

  * Write original & advanced **IAO-style astronomy problems** to challenge frontier AI models 
  * Evaluate AI-generated solutions for correctness, clarity, and reasoning quality, and identify where models fail 
  * Identify logical flaws, incomplete reasoning, or insufficiently rigorous derivations 
  * Provide clear, concise, and correct **solutions and reasoning** , formatted in **LaTeX**
  * Maintain extremely high standards of precision, scientific rigor, and problem difficulty 

Qualifications

  * Highly proficient in writing and formatting documents using **LaTeX**
  * Olympiad medalist, problem setter, coach, or selection committee member in **IAO (preferred)** or equivalent competitions ( **RAO, CAO, IAO TST, AAO, EuAO, USAAO, BAO, INAO, JAO, UAC, IAYPT, CAUT** , etc.) 
  * Graduate researcher or educator experienced in designing advanced conceptual or quantitative problems in astronomy, astrophysics, or related physical sciences 
  * Deep understanding of **core theoretical and observational concepts** in astronomy and astrophysics 
  * Ability to articulate reasoning and derivations clearly in written form 
  * Strong ability to evaluate the rigor and complexity of astronomy problems 
  * Rigorous attention to detail in verifying solutions 

Requirements

  * Expected commitment: 20 hours/week minimum; up to 40 hours/week available 
  * Project length: ~2 months, with potential for extension 
  * Rolling start dates; setup typically within 1–2 days of approval 

Compensation & Contract Terms

  * $60–80/hr, dependent on experience and performance 
  * Open to contributors **worldwide** (English proficiency required) 
  * **Independent contractor** engagement 
  * Payments issued weekly via Stripe Connect 

Application Process

  * Submit your **resume or CV** highlighting your astronomy background and relevant achievements 
  * Complete a brief **interview (20–30 minutes)**
  * Submit a **short form** detailing your experience writing problems and competing in astronomy or related Olympiads 
  * Selected applicants will be contacted within a few days with next steps
jobCategory: AI,教育,内容创作

postTitle: Senior IT Operations Specialist
descContent:
**The Role:  
**  

At Apryse we rely on IT systems to power the solutions that help consumers
around the world. We’re seeking an experienced senior IT operations specialist
who has the technological skills to help solve the toughest challenges. This
person will analyze current systems and assets, analyze, diagnose and solve
complex user issues, and help manage our internal SaaS systems. The ideal
candidate has extensive knowledge to handle complex problems, security,
migrations, and advanced industry knowledge to keep us on the cutting edge.
The senior IT operations specialist will have an immediate impact on the day-
to-day effectiveness of our employees.

  * Advanced user problem diagnosis within EMEA and APAC regions
  * Root cause analysis of user issues
  * Purchases, Intune/Jamf setups, configures and maintains devices
  * Take responsibility for projects and solutions within the larger business initiative
  * Research and evaluate emerging technologies, hardware, and software
  * Track and maintain hardware and software inventory (MDM)
  * Coordinates equipment shipments and receivables, as well as processes surplus equipment in accordance with ITS procedures.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Analyze departmental needs, and boost productivity, efficiency, and accuracy to inform business decisions
  * Train employees to use software and hardware; troubleshoot issues and provide technical support when needed
  * Maintains Department IT inventory system by keeping up-to-date and accurate records of serialized asset information.
  * Plans and executes user office moves, adds and changes as required. This may include the involvement of ITS and local administration for large scale moves.
  * Maintains and updates user IAM, account information and group permissions.
  * Corresponds with users and staff concerning issue status, resolution and task completion with little need for escalation.
  * Ensures docket monitor systems are functioning properly including maintenance, upgrades, and replacements as needed.
  * Works with vendors to determine warranty or repair status.
  * Assists in monitoring ITSM queue, verifying that issues are handled in a timely manner according to SLA guidelines; identifies trends with customer tickets; assists with escalated service tickets and complicated situations.
  * Develops and assists with technical and operational solutions through collaboration with other technical services staff. Assisting with troubleshooting systems and computer root cause analysis by working with other technical services team members. Documents solutions and adds them to the published knowledge base. Reviews knowledge base entries for accuracy and makes updates as necessary.
  * Other duties as assigned

**Requirements:**

  * Five or more years of experience in IT operations
  * Deep knowledge of management systems (ex: Microsoft Exchange, Active Directory, E5 policies), equipment and technologies, enterprise backup and recovery procedures, and systems performance monitoring
  * Ability to work independently and collaboratively
  * Expertise in implementing, configuring, and testing IT solutions
  * Strong creative and analytical thinking
  * MDM Solutions 

**Assets:**

  * Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in information technology or computer science
  * Professional certification

**Benefits**

  * Competitive salary commensurate with experience & qualifications.
  * A comprehensive extended benefits package.
  * A great team environment and resources, supporting you to do the best work of your life and providing unlimited career growth potential.
  * Highly autonomous and entrepreneurial environment.
  * On going support for learning development so you can continue to master your craft.
  * Work with the hardware you're most comfortable with (Windows or Mac)
  * Diverse and inclusive workplace where we all learn from each other.
  * Excellent work-life balance with a flexible remote work environment.**  
**

**Company Description**

As the industry-leading provider of document software development (SDK)
technology powering everything from traditional desktop software to innovative
web and mobile applications, at Apryse we are committed to delivering cutting-
edge technology solutions that empower our clients to achieve their goals.
With a broad international portfolio of combined companies, products, and
leading technologies, we are actively changing the way the world works with
documents to make work better and life simpler.

Customers like IBM, Autodesk, DocuSign, Boeing, Microsoft (and many more!)
come to us to realize their web and mobile strategies for document management,
editing, and collaboration as the #1-ranked commercial document SDK of choice
for companies worldwide. As a result, you can find our document technology in
thousands of solutions, including those of household names, used by millions
across virtually every industry. Our XODO app alone has 25M unique installs --
and counting -- and the highest ratings among PDF productivity apps on the
largest online app marketplaces.

**Ready to join our team?**

If you are interested in helping Apryse deliver on its commitments and taking
your career to the next level, we invite you to apply online now.
Additionally, we view the above section as a guide, not a checklist. We
welcome diverse and non-traditional backgrounds and encourage you to apply
even if you do not have every requirement listed.

We are committed to a work environment that is inclusive to all and free of
discrimination. It is our policy to be an equal opportunity employer without
regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual
orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic predisposition or carrier
status, veteran status, citizenship status or any other factors prohibited by
law. Apryse will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals.
jobCategory: 运维,技术支持,DevOps/MLOps,安全,项目管理

postTitle: 有没有精通 freeswitch 的大手子，公司想外包一个项目，费用 25K
descContent:
具体要求如下  
当前整体平台主要解决融合通讯，整体的系统框架 Janus Gateway(1.3.3) 和 FreeSWITCH(1.10.12)
构成融合通信主要功能，当前需要解决需要支持 WebRTC 客户端和传统 SIP/PSTN 终端的混合场景的视频画面。需要通过 Node.js(24.0.1)
作为主要开发语言，需要开发一个中间控制层来协调 Janus (SFU) 和 FreeSWITCH (MCU) 的交互  
  
具体工作内容:  
  
使用 Node.js 开发中间控制层，协调 WebRTC 和 SIP 的交互开发基于 Janus Gateway 和 FreeSWITCH 的异构会议系统  
实现 WebRTC 和 SIP 之间的媒体桥接逻辑  
设计和实现会议控制层，协调 SFU 和 MCU 的交互  
处理复杂媒体融合和媒体流转发，janus 负责 webRtc 的流转发，freeswitch 负责 sip 端的流媒体融合，包括传统传统
SIP/PSTN,对讲机网关，rtsp 摄像头流，h323 终端音视频流。  
通过 ESL 库来监听 freeswitch 的事件，根据拨号规则将 freeswitch 的流转发到 janus ，然后将 rtp 流 publish 到
janus videoroom  
通过 ELS 事件将 freeswitch 端 SIP 客户端当成 sub 订阅 janus videoRoom 的流。  
将 janus videoRoom 的流转发到 freeswitch 进行 mcu 融合，然后将 mcu 融合的流传输到 sip 终端。  
4.janus 主要负责前端 webrtc 流的发布和转发，freeswitch 负责 sip 端，对讲机网关语音流，sip 音柱语音，h323
终端的流的转发和传输。  
优化系统性能和稳定性  
编写技术文档和测试用例  
我们已完成的内容：  
Freeswitch 端的流媒体统合，sip 网关的转发，将 freeswitch 端视频流发布到 janus 。  
  
说简单点就是当前只用 freeswitch 在移动端的 mcu 的流效果不好，就是看上去视频画面很小，用 webrtc
就是来解决这个问题，要是佬友有好的建议能实现或者解决问题也可以  
  
预计开发费  
25K 时间是 2-3 周
jobCategory: 后端开发,全栈开发

postTitle: 爬虫兼职, 要求爬取一亩三分地, twitter, 知乎, 公众号等渠道的招聘和招生信息
descContent:
**职位概述**

我们正在寻找一位经验丰富的兼职爬虫开发工程师，负责从国内外多个平台自动化采集招聘和招生相关信息。该职位工作时间灵活，按项目结算报酬，合作起步价 1
万人民币。

**工作职责**

设计并实现稳定高效的网络爬虫系统，定向采集指定平台的公开信息 负责爬虫架构设计、数据采集、清洗、去重和存储全流程开发
监控爬虫运行状态，及时处理反爬机制、封禁等问题 与数据分析团队协作，确保数据质量和交付时效性 编写技术文档和操作手册

**核心技术要求**

熟练使用 Python 及 Scrapy 、BeautifulSoup 、Selenium 、Playwright 等爬虫框架 掌握 HTTP/HTTPS
协议、Cookie 、Session 、代理 IP 池等技术 熟悉常见反爬机制（验证码、IP 限制、User-Agent 检测、动态加载等）及应对策略
具备数据清洗、去重和结构化存储经验（ MySQL/MongoDB/Elasticsearch ） 了解爬虫法律法规和 robots.txt 协议

**平台特定要求**

一亩三分地： 熟悉论坛类网站结构，能处理登录态保持和权限限制 具备动态页面渲染和 AJAX 请求分析能力

Twitter： 熟练使用 Twitter API v2 或具备爬虫逆向能力 了解 GraphQL 接口调用和速率限制处理 能够模拟真实用户行为规避检测

知乎： 熟悉知乎反爬策略（如滑块验证、IP 封禁等） 能够处理动态加载内容和登录状态管理

**加分项** 有招聘/招生类信息爬取项目经验 具备分布式爬虫（ Scrapy-Redis ）和云端部署经验 熟悉 Docker 、Kubernetes
等容器化技术 有自然语言处理基础，能进行简单文本分类和实体提取

**申请说明** 请将简历和爬虫项目案例（ GitHub 链接或代码片段）发送至招聘邮箱`[samuel.gao023@gmail.com](/cdn-
cgi/l/email-protection)`，并说明擅长和可以开始兼职的时间。
jobCategory: 数据开发,后端开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps,运维

postTitle: 帮朋友公司寻找 wp 开发人员，要求如下
jobTitle: 资深 WordPress 独立站开发工程师
descContent:
# 资深 WordPress 独立站开发工程师（定制化电商+AI 导购方向）

## 核心诉求

基于现有「 WordPress+Elementor
」独立站，无需从零搭建，聚焦完善全流程电商功能，开发支持用户提交姓名、照片等信息的定制化购物模块（含可视化自主设计交互），整合 AI
导购功能，长期负责站点迭代、维护与问题排查。

## 岗位职责

  1. 优化 WooCommerce 核心功能，覆盖商品管理、订单流程、支付对接、物流同步、会员体系，保障电商链路顺畅。
  2. 开发定制化信息收集与可视化编辑功能，支持用户自主设计预览，确保信息与订单精准关联、安全合规。
  3. 对接 AI 模型，落地智能商品推荐、定制需求咨询、订单进度解答等导购场景。
  4. 负责站点 Bug 修复、性能调优、安全防护，优化前端交互与多设备响应式适配。
  5. 配合产品、运营团队，将业务需求转化为技术方案并落地。

## 任职要求

  1. 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业优先，5 年+开发经验，3 年+WordPress 电商项目实战经验。
  2. 精通 PHP 、HTML5 、CSS3 、JavaScript ，熟练使用 Elementor ，掌握 Fabric.js 等至少一种可视化开发技术。
  3. 擅长 WooCommerce 二次开发、AI 模型 API 对接，具备定制化电商功能落地与站点长期维护经验。
  4. 责任心强、沟通清晰，自主学习能力突出，重视代码可维护性与数据安全。

## 加分项

定制礼品/服饰电商开发、Elementor Pro 深度使用、跨境电商合规经验者优先。

## 投递说明

postTitle: Multigres Deployment Engineer at Supabase
descContent:
Supabase is the Postgres development platform, built by developers for
developers. We provide a complete backend solution including Database, Auth,
Storage, Edge Functions, Realtime, and Vector Search. All services are deeply
integrated and designed for growth.

We're looking for an engineer to own the deployment and operational
infrastructure of Multigres, our distributed Postgres platform. You'll be
responsible for building and maintaining the Multigres Operator, ensuring
reliable cloud deployments, and creating the tooling that powers our
Kubernetes-based infrastructure.

### What You’ll Be Responsible for:

  * **Build and maintain the Multigres Operator** \- Maintain our Go-based Kubernetes operator that orchestrates distributed Postgres deployments

  * **Architect cloud deployment infrastructure** \- Design and implement robust deployment patterns for EKS and other Kubernetes platforms

  * **Manage storage and networking layers** \- Work with CSI drivers, persistent volumes, and cross-cloud networking to ensure data reliability and connectivity

  * **Develop deployment tooling** \- Create internal tools and automation for provisioning, scaling, and managing Multigres clusters

  * **Ensure operational excellence** \- Build monitoring, alerting, and diagnostic capabilities into the deployment layer

  * **Collaborate across teams** \- Work with database engineers, SRE, and product teams to deliver seamless deployment experiences

### **You Might Be a Good Fit If You have:**

  * **Strong systems programming skills** \- Proficiency in Go and experience building production-grade operators or controllers

  * **Deep Kubernetes expertise** \- Hands-on experience with Kubernetes internals, custom resources, and cloud-managed Kubernetes services (EKS, GKE, AKS)

  * **Database operations knowledge** \- Understanding of database deployment patterns, backup/restore, replication, and high availability

  * **Distributed systems experience** \- Familiarity with consensus protocols, failure scenarios, and designing for resilience

  * **Cloud infrastructure background** \- Experience with cloud-native deployment tooling, IaC (Terraform, Pulumi), and cloud provider APIs

  * **Production operations mindset** \- Track record of building reliable, observable, and maintainable systems

### Nice to Have:

  * Experience with CSI storage drivers and storage orchestration in Kubernetes

  * Knowledge of cross-cloud networking tools like Cilium, Istio, or similar service mesh technologies

  * Prior work with sharded query serving systems like Vitess

  * Contributions to open-source infrastructure projects

### **What We Offer**

  * **Fully Remote**

We hire globally. We believe you can do your best work from anywhere. There
are no Supabase offices, but we provide a WeWork membership or co-working
allowance you can use anywhere in the world.

  * **ESOP**

Every team member receives ESOP (equity ownership) in the company. We want
everyone to share in the upside of what we’re building together.

  * **Tech Allowance**

Use this budget to set up your ideal work environment—laptop, monitor,
headphones, or whatever helps you do your best work.

  * **Health Benefits**

Supabase covers 100% of health insurance for employees and 80% for dependents,
wherever you are. Your wellbeing and your family’s health are important to us.

  * **Annual Off-Sites**

Once a year, the entire company gathers in a new city for a week of
connection, collaboration, and fun. It’s a highlight of our year.

  * **Flexible Work**

We operate asynchronously and trust you to manage your own time. You know what
needs to be done and when.

  * **Professional Development**

Every team member receives an annual education allowance to spend on
learning—courses, books, conferences, or anything that supports your growth.

### **About the Team**

Supabase was born-remote and open-source-first. We believe our globally
distributed team is our secret weapon in building tools developers love.

  * 180+ team members

  * 40+ countries

  * 15+ languages spoken

  * $496M raised

  * 430,000+ community members

  * 30,000+ memes posted (and counting)

We move fast, build in public, and use what we ship. If it’s in your project,
we probably use it in ours too. We believe deeply in the open-source ecosystem
and strive to support—not replace—existing tools and communities.

### **Hiring Process**

We keep things simple, async-friendly, and respectful of your time:

  1. Apply – Our team will review your application.

  2. Intro Call – A short video chat to get to know each other.

  3. Interviews – Up to four calls with:

     * Founders

     * Future teammates

     * Someone cross-functional from product, growth, or engineering (depending on the role)

  4. Decision – We may follow up with a final question or go straight to offer.

All communication is remote and we aim to move fast.
jobCategory: DevOps/MLOps,运维,后端开发,数据开发

postTitle: Senior Backend Engineer at Airalo
descContent:
**About Airalo**

Alo! Airalo is the world’s first eSIM store that helps people connect in over
200+ countries and regions across the globe. We are building the next digital
service that revolutionizes the telecom industry. We are a travel-tech company
and an equal-opportunity environment that values and executes diversity,
inclusion, and equity. Our team is spread across 50+ countries and six
continents. What glues us together is our commitment to changing the way you
connect.

Check out more information about Airalo in our Public Handbook
[here](https://airalo-public.notion.site/airalo-public-handbook).

  

**About you**

We hope that you care deeply about the quality of your work, the intrinsic
worth of tasks, and the success of your team. You are self-disciplined and do
not require micromanagement in terms of your skillset and work ethic. You do
your best to flourish as an individual every day while working hard to foster
a collaborative team environment. You believe in the importance of being — and
staying — authentic, honest, positive, and kind. You are a good interlocutor
with clear and concise communication. You are able to manage multiple
projects, have an analytical mind, pay keen attention to detail, and love to
get your hands dirty. You are cognizant, tolerant, and welcoming of
vulnerabilities and cultural differences.

  

**About the Role**

**Position** : Full-time / Employee

**Location:** Remote-first

**Benefits:** Health Insurance, work-from-anywhere stipend, annual wellness &
learning credits, annual all-expenses-paid company retreat in a gorgeous
destination & other benefits

  

Are you a backend engineer with a knack for building complex, scalable
systems? Join our team as a Senior Backend Engineer, where you’ll craft
innovative features, optimize large-scale distributed systems, and shape the
future of our core product. We value expertise, creativity, and a passion for
excellence. While our primary focus is Laravel, we’re open to seasoned Symfony
developers eager to transition and make an impact.

  

### Your main responsibilities will be to:

* Design and maintain large-scale, high-performance systems.
* Develop and refine services to improve scalability and efficiency.
* Create RESTful APIs that power our front-end and third-party integrations.
* Collaborate on our migration to a service-oriented architecture (SOA).
* Write clean, maintainable, and testable code using industry best practices.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve technical challenges.
* Actively contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle.
,

### Does this sound like you?

* 5+ years of backend development experience in PHP.
* 2+ years working with Laravel to build enterprise-level applications—or equivalent experience with Symfony and a strong motivation to learn Laravel.
* Expertise in distributed systems, scalable services, and RESTful APIs.
* Familiarity with event-driven architecture and messaging systems (e.g., queues, pub/sub).
* Strong SQL/NoSQL knowledge and caching strategies.
* Proficiency in OOP, SOLID principles, and design patterns.
* Experience with AWS services (e.g., EC2, Lambda, SQS, Aurora, DynamoDB).
* Experience with monitoring tools like Datadog and Prometheus.
* Hands-on containerization skills with Docker.
* Fluent English communication skills.
,

### Bonus:

* Experience with SaaS/PaaS, SOA, or microservices architecture.
* Background in telecom, eSIM, or GSMA technologies.
* Familiarity with Traveltech solutions.

If you are interested in this position, **please apply via the link.**

  

Please note that our Engineering team works in the CET timezone, so candidates
will need to reside in countries with the same time zone or similar to it and
will need to already have permit to work in the country where they are based.

  

By applying, you acknowledge and agree that, in case of successful
application, Airalo may request to run background checks as a condition for
entering into an agreement with you. Rest assured that these checks will only
occur upon your prior consent and at the end of the selection process, and
will be strictly limited to what is allowed under the laws that are applicable
to you. All data that you share or that we collect in connection with such
checks will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy, [available
here](https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-
policy?srsltid=AfmBOooBT0rXAj1FaNelZ3VfN0wvhwzvAoxdtHnOKSVETpiSjiXVuycy).

  

To maintain transparency in our hiring process, we want to let you know that
our recruitment team may use AI-powered tools to support specific tasks, such
as assessing resumes and taking notes during interviews. We want to be clear
that these tools are used to assist our team, and AI never makes the final
hiring decision. That responsibility rests entirely with our amazing team of
recruiters.

  

We sincerely thank all applicants in advance for submitting their interest in
this opportunity. Airalo is an equal-opportunity employer and values
diversity, equity & inclusion. We do not discriminate on the basis of race,
religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status,
veteran status, or disability status. We are committed to providing reasonable
accommodations upon request for individuals with disabilities throughout our
job interview process.
